story:
We’ve all used social networks – either out of necessity or out of boredom. So it’s no secret that they’re all exactly the same; you post something, you browse through your news feed for a bit and hit the like button a few times. Nevertheless, they are considered to be one of the most important aspects of our social lives.

So why – in today’s personalized and advanced world – are social networks stuck in the past, doing the same thing over and over again? We don’t know, either.This is where Timelift comes in, to bring a new approach to the social media arena.

Music provided by Bensound.com

story:
The Pack is everything we have envisioned from a truly versatile daily bag. It offers the comfort of being carried as a backpack, while being every bit as adaptable as you need it to be. It is designed for the moments when you need a messenger, or for those meetings when you prefer to walk in with a briefcase style carry.
 


 



 

We all carry different objects, and each day requires us to pack specific stuff. That is why we created a bag that can be customised to your exact needs. The velcro protective dividers, let you organise your interior, or can be completely removed for maximum capacity.

    

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

The Pack comes with 4 interior dividers that allow you to organise your essentials just the way you want to.

By using the horizontal divider, the interior is essentially separated into two halves that can each be accessed separately. That way when you need to reach for an object in your bag, you can simply open the top or bottom half and have direct access.

You can forget about having to dig through your entire bag looking for it.

If you wish to turn your Pack into a full camera bag, there is the option of choosing the Add On dividers.
 


 


 

One of the favourite features of our previous Kickstarter backers is back! The instant access pocket means that you can grab your camera right away, even when carrying it as a backpack.




While the simplistic design of the Pack will mean that others won’t necessarily realise that it is a camera bag, we know that it is better to be on the safe side. That is why we developed a closing mechanism to decrease the ease with which the pocket can be opened. For complete peace of mind, the two zipper pulls can be secured together with a small padlock.



 







 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our aim is and has always been to create high quality leather bags that pack unmatched versatility at affordable prices. We are confident that we are creating a quality to price ratio that is hard to match, but at the same time we are aware that our leather goods are not necessarily cheap.

That is why we want you to invest in a T. Forevers bag knowing that you will get the most out of it on a daily basis. The simple, timeless design of the Pack, allows you to carry it regardless of whether you are taking it on a walk around the city, or need a professional looking bag for an event.
 



 



 

Some of us simply carry a lot of stuff, even on a daily basis. That’s why we studied duffel after duffel and realised that they are simply not designed to carry all our digital gear.




 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 




The Duffel can be attached in less than a minute to the Slim. Simply unzip the exterior cover and zip up the Slim.


 



This is the go to city bag. It connects to both the Pack and the Duffel and it has all the essential features of a standalone bag that can carry your laptop, tablet, documents and any other chargers you may need throughout your day.







 










 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 






















 

Our commitment to traditional craftsmanship is sometimes visible on the exterior of our goods, other times, it is hidden within the bag itself. That is why we want to share with our backers the process involved from sketch, to prototyping, to crafting.

Each handcrafted bag is unique in its own way to the one before it, each is imperfectly perfect. What you see and what you feel in your hands when you get your leather good is a representation of the growth and improvement of the craftsman’s set of skills throughout its career.

In other words, your Temporary Forevers bag is the sum total of every product previously created by the craftsman.


T. Forevers leather goods are handcrafted in Europe where we are proud to share workshop with some of the best known International brands.
 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are founded upon a diverse background of knowledge and design experience, because we believe that only those not aware of their industry limits can break through the known and add a new perspective to a leather making craft bound by established tradition.

With a team of born travellers, our designs are inspired by the things we see and experience on our adventures. Therefore functionality and a simplistic design are key factors that drive the handcrafting process of every leather good that we create.

 

 

 

As a backer of our project, you become part of our team and therefore we believe it is our responsibility to be transparent with you throughout the production process.

We want you to see and be by our side at every significant step from the point our campaign reaches its goal, to the moment the parcel is delivered to your door step.

That is why, just as we did in our previous projects, we want to assure you that we will keep you in the loop with regular updates. Below are some of the comments from the backers that made our previous Kickstarter projects a reality.

 

 And some more feedback...

Risks and challenges

We have learnt many valuable lessons from our 3 previous projects that we successfully funded and for which we delivered the rewards to approximately 2,000 backers. We have partnered with our two European based workshops for over 5 years and can therefore say with confidence that the craftsmen are able to create The Union Collection at the highest of quality standards. 

The same holds true for our partnering Italian and Portuguese leather tanners which over the years have worked together with us to develop a line of leather specifically tanned for us. In addition to being proud to say that we create our collections with a unique leather, this means that we can adapt the leather to best fit our designs and crafting style. 

Our experience does not necessarily mean that we may not face certain unexpected challenges or difficulties with our new project, but it does mean that we are prepared and have the knowledge to overcome them. 

Thank you for your trust and we look forward to hearing your feedback once we have delivered the Union Collection to your doorstep.

story:
Think about walking down the street in a new neighborhood not knowing where you should eat dinner or what to do. Lokaly is here to help: when you open our app, you will be faced with an ever changing dynamic list of places your friends like to hang out,  challenges that are currently in effect, and great offers in your immediate vicinity. 

You will scroll down to the restaurants section and find an interesting challenge at a restaurant that appeals to you. You then complete it (could be literally anything) Our application puts fun and savings into looking for a place to go now and it provides businesses for a way to pull in customers off the street without having to send people out shouting with a hand full of fliers.

What is Lokaly all about?

Lokaly is an application that makes it easy for people to find the best places in a city based on their fiends likes and preferences.

It is also a good way businesses to advertise and promote  to the permanent residents in their communities and people passing by. This is accomplished using a system of targeted, interactive information. It is also a fun way for people to get great discounts at nearby businesses and win prizes.

The goal here is to allow community residents or passersby to engage with local businesses in a fun, mutually advantageous way: simultaneously promoting both sales for businesses and savings for consumers. Accomplishments will themselves be shareable on social networks, providing incidental, free advertising as a further incentive for companies to participate. Points will be rewarded to app-users for sharing, can accumulate and then be used in select stores for rewards. 

The application interface will be designed with analytics in mind, logging user activity data for further processing, allowing us to refine our targeting model to best meet the demands of both business and user. 

Why is there a need for this app?

We have all spent many nights wandering city streets looking for a good place to hear live music, shop for clothes, grab a bite, catch a movie, get some coffee, or hang out with friends.

It is insurance for boredom.


For more information, visit http://lokaly.co/

story:
Each Meqnes weekend bag is expertly designed by Moroccan artisans and handcrafted with high quality European leather, to ensure that we combine the unique Moroccan look together with luxury-grade materials meant for durability. Made of vegetable-tanned calfskin, the unique hyde is high quality, durable and designed to turn heads.

Other weekend bags become worn out and lose their shape. Meqnes can withstand all of your travels, wherever you may go.

 

 

 

 

 

For months, we searched high and low for the highest quality leather we could find. We needed something that would keep its shape and was beautiful enough to turn heads. Finally, we identified and chose an exquisite calfskin leather supplier in Poland. On par with our high standards, this full-grain calfskin is vegetable-tanned for a unique look and color.

 

Most weekend bags, whether made of genuine leather or canvas, are destined to become floppy, unusable bags after time and years of use. We know we are not the first to design a beautiful leather bag, but we are confident in the fact we are the only one you will need for your weekend getaways.

The high-quality leather we chose and the way each stitch is woven is designed to keep the shape of the bag through years of use. The sides of your Meqnes bag also do not collapse so you can easily see all four inside corners of your bag. 

 

 

 

 

 

Every single one of our Meqnes bags is designed by extremely talented Moroccan artisans who understand the quality, aesthetic and promises we hold. These skilled artisans have been working for years in the traditional markets and understand the look and feel we are striving for. 

 

Every stitch, buckle, color, zipper and handle has gone through a thorough check to ensure the traditions of Morocco are visible, in these bags which have been hand made with European leather. A simple look at the details of the Meqnes bag proves this to be true. 

 

We use a three-step model to when it comes to creating and delivering our beautiful bags. First, our team hand-selects the materials for each weekender. Once the materials are selected, they are given to the skilled artisans we hire and they begin their magic. Once the bags are finished being hand-crafted, they are sent directly to you to enjoy. 

Just take a look below at everything we are cutting out compared to current luxury brands on the market. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Follows IATA size requirements 
  • 24.4 X 11.8 X 12.6 inches 
  • Full-grain calfskin leather 
  • Vegetable-tanned leather 
  • Comfortable dual handles 
  • Removable straps for convenience 
  • Warranty: These bags are handcrafted from high-quality materials meant to last. If your bag does not hold up to this standard and you find a defect, please let us know and we’ll replace it or fix it, whichever you prefer.

Follows IATA size requirements 
24.4 X 11.8 X 12.6 inches 
Full-grain calfskin leather 
Vegetable-tanned leather 
Comfortable dual handles 
Removable straps for convenience 
Warranty: These bags are handcrafted from high-quality materials meant to last. If your bag does not hold up to this standard and you find a defect, please let us know and we’ll replace it or fix it, whichever you prefer.

story:
On a Water Bottle! Seriously?

 

▲ For Optimal Performance, Space Matters!

♦ LoRa — Clear path for the antenna.

The latest and greatest in the IoT, LoRa technology with its -140dbm sensitivity uses virtually no power and even in an off-grid environment can still broadcast a signal over a very long range.

♦ GPS — Towards clear skies for avoiding blockage of the receiver.

Why a standalone GPS unit?

Simple - search and rescue can often take more than the 2-3 days of normal battery life in other GPS products, such as a cellphone, for example.

♦ Battery — A battery capacity of up to 30 days.

You might not find yourself in a dangerous situation for several days into your adventure; that’s why you need the longest battery life possible.

 

▲ Why is ​TREKr part of a water bottle and not a standalone device?

Simple - you can forget a standalone device, but you are much less likely to forget to bring along a water bottle. It is this combination of necessities, that sets TREKr apart from the competition.

 

▲ TREKr lid is compatible with all 63mm bottles of all sizes.

 

▲ Are you still risking your life with devices that work for less than 72 hours?

TREKr broadcasts your real-time locations in accuracy for more than 720 hours!!! 

Have you ever seen headlines like …

  • Missing hikers found dead after weeks long search. 

  • Hikers found dead after suffering from altitude sickness.

  • Hikers Mysteriously Disappeared!

Taking risks is exciting until it’s not. As the saying goes, “It’s all fun and games until someone loses an eye, or a leg, or an arm or their life.”

That’s why we created TREKr; to help prevent tragedies that could’ve been avoided. Nature is dangerous and everyone thinks and believes that nothing like that could ever happen to them. 

The harsh reality is this: it can happen to you or to someone you know. Why risk your life unnecessarily with inferior products that offer limited battery life, poor broadcast range and are fragile?

 

▲ Just take a look at TREKr’s specs and then compare them to other devices:

  • A  premium GPS module manufactured by the world-leading brand — u-Blox.
  • The latest wireless technology offering communication range up to 2 miles with an efficient antenna. 
  • 30 day battery life. 
  • IPx7 rated housing to make TREKr tough enough for your hardcore adventures. 
  • An additional function - the built-in LED Lantern. 
  • BPA Free bottle material. 

Any of these features could potentially save your life or that of a fellow adventurer - so how much is saving your life - or someone else’s - worth? 

 

We didn’t make TREKr to get rich - we made it so that fewer people will become just another statistic.

Or, of course, you could buy something cheap that doesn’t have any of these functions and have your last thought while alive be this: I should’ve bought a instead. Someone will eventually find your body. Maybe​.

GET (2) TREKr - SAVE UP TO 60% OFF

 

▲ About TREKr APP

♦ Build A Community:  You can see other TREKr users coordinates as well.

♦ Protect Your Teammates: TREKr excels at managing a team adventure via the alert function; you are notified as soon as a teammate is out of range.

♦ Share Your Location: As soon as you turn on TREKr and connect to a mobile device, you share your location with the other users.

♦ Call For Help In Emergencies: Press the SOS button and any TREKr users will be immediately notified of your emergency and with accurate GPS coordinates information, you can be found sooner.

 

▲ Main Features of TREKr!

♦ SOS button for emergencies: One button sends an emergency call which every TREKr user in valid range receives at once. And don’t forget that your location coordinates are broadcast constantly in real time as the moment you press the power-on.

♦ Communication works among all users: TREKr tends to make a big tent for all adventurers. Except for the private / group chat feature, all TREKr users in the world get the SOS alerts from anyone who sends an emergency call within valid range.

♦ 2 Mile Transmission Range: With the GPS module, both your location and that of other TREKr users will be accurately geopositioned.

♦ Off-the-Grid, still connected: The long-range radio technology and the premium GPS work without internet service. Just by pushing one button on the bottle, your SOS and position will be broadcast to other TREKr users within transmission range.

♦ 30 Day Battery Life: The battery lasts for up to 30 days on a single charge. Your location (and that of your friends)  is accurately and  constantly broadcast for up to 30 days in real time.

♦ Weather-Sealed IPx7 rated housing: TREKr is a GPS tracking device with a variety of inputs and outputs to cater to the most demanding applications. Its rugged housing is IPx7 rated to withstand any weather or environmental conditions, without sacrificing the performance of its tracking and other functional features.

♦ Built-in LED  as a lantern: You can also use TREKr as a light source via the lantern function.

 

▲ How Does TREKr Work for Adventurers?

♦ ANYWHERE: The possibilities are endless - No matter where you go, there you are!
With up to a 2 mile signal coverage between TREKr bottles, you can worry less and go further.

♦ ANYTIME: Outstanding battery life - You’re protected from the moment your adventure starts!
Your location (and that of your friends) is accurately and constantly broadcast for up to 30 days in real time.

♦ ANYONE: The best design is always the simplest - is intuitive and easy to operate; designed for first-time adventurers to seasoned veterans to use.

 

▲ Why TREKr? Best of all, you don’t pay any additional service fees!

 

▲ TECH & SPECS

 

▲ Future Products! The best can always get better!

Our next step is to develop further products to provide even better and more complete protection. But don’t worry - we promise that all of our future products will be compatible with TREKr.

♦ TREKr: The Original! For individual or team use.

Necessity and essential safety.

♦ Scanner:  For supervisor/leader use. 

Scanner is designed for rugged terrain that could interfere with transmission range. To help alleviate this problem, Scanner is able to be attached to, and work with, a drone which will increase the search radius and avoid the issue of no-signal or problematic areas.

♦ TREKr Pin: For kids, pets and items.

Maybe you don’t like a water bottle with real GPS. Maybe you’re not sure if your kids will be able to use it properly. Maybe you want to extend TREKr’s protection to your pets. No problem - we hear you! That’s why we’re developing TREKr pin with the same essential safety features!

 

▲ Project Timelime


 

▲ Meet the Team

Holyridge was originally created by two driven adventurers with the goal of helping people be well prepared for adventures.

Shawn and Vincent: We know that even experienced adventurers can sometimes underestimate potentially dangerous situations. We want people to have real security while adventuring but without having to constantly worry about it.   That’s why we combined security with a must-bring  item for those who share the outdoor lifestyle.

 

▲ Our Missions & Why We Need Your Support

  • To obtain the regulatory approvals & electronics testings.
  • To have the tooling made for launching the production.
  • To perfect the APP user interface.

  • To always be there for our fellow adventurers.
  • To encourage people  to challenge the unknown.
  • To significantly reduce SAR manpower and material resources.

GET (2) TREKr - SAVE UP TO 60% OFF

 

▲ Rewards

▲ FAQ

01. What is the communication range?
TREKr transmits up to 2 mile provided there are no objects to interfere with the coverage. 

02. Do surroundings such as walls, woods or other giant objects affect the communication range?
Yes – while there is tech behind the magic, there is no magic behind the tech. Factors such as terrain, air humidity etc. can influence any electromagnetic signals to varying degrees.

03. Will the TREKr base be compatible with both iPhones and Android phones (iOS and Android OS)?
Yes, TREKr will be compatible with both iOS and Android OS. 

04. How long does the battery last?
When you use TREKr as a beacon only, the battery should last up to 30 days. The battery duration will decrease if used for Wi-Fi connection or the lantern function; therefore as a safety precaution, when the battery reaches 30% capacity remaining, TREKr will be automatically disable all other functions except for the Beacon function. At 30% or less battery capacity, will keep broadcasting the rescue beacon for between 5 to 6 days.

05. What makes the battery life in TREKr superior to other products currently on the market? 
TREKr uses the latest LoRa wireless technology, which specializes in long-distance transmission and ultra low power consumption. In addition, we also use a chip made from the world-leading brand - u-Blox - to make our GPS module; by a special motion detection algorithm, we have successfully taken the best advantage of the limited electricity available for maximum effect and duration.

06. How can I turn on the GPS on my bottle?
Turn on your TREKr and the GPS will start to your position right away.

07. How accurate is the positioning of TREKr?
TREKr is accurate to +/- 1 meter.

08. Where is the product developed and manufactured?
The R&D for TREKr was done 100% in Taiwan. We also cooperate with Foxconn (the main manufacturer of the iPhone) to manufacture TREKr.

09. Does it work globally?
Yes, TREKr works anywhere in the world.

10. Is there a low battery indicator?
Yes, there is a low battery indicator.

11. How many data sets can be stored in the app?
TREKr stores more than a million data sets. 

12.How do I connect TREKr to my mobile device?
There are only three steps to connect TREKr to your mobile device. 

  1. Turn on TREKr. 
  2. Connect TREKr via Wi-Fi on your mobile device. 
  3. Open the TREKr APP. 

13. How can I find my friends’ position in the TREKr APP?
Once you connect TREKr to your mobile device, you can tap on the icons in the APP to read other users’ positioning, as well as other information such as the time, GPS history data and battery status, etc. 

14. Can I just open the app and read other users’ positioning? 
No, you can’t. You must connect your TREKr to the mobile device to read any other users (within detectable range) coordinates because TREKr only scans for another/other TREKr devices.

15. How does TREKr send network signals over long-distances?
TREKr uses advanced Spread Spectrum and Channel Coding with LoRa technology to maximize signal reception (up to -140db). In the limited space of the lid, we have embedded a patterned customized antenna to maximize transmitting ability.

16. How much does TREKr weight? 
TREKr weighs approximately 200g including the bottle (empty, of course).

17. Is the battery rechargeable?
Yes, the battery can be recharged using a micro-USB.

18. Is there service fee or monthly fee for its use? 
No, TREKr doesn't charge you any service or monthly fee. 

19. Is TREKr drop-proof?  
Absolutely – within reason, of course. Drop it from the height of a person, no problem.
Drop it from an airplane at 10,000 feet – probably not.

20. What is the warranty?
TREKr comes with a One (1) Year warranty. 

21. How bright is the LED light?
We are still testing different LED lamps at this time to provide the best user experience.

22. Is TREKr waterproof? 
Yes, TREKr is rated IPx7 waterproof. 

23. Can multiple TREKr users be linked together? 
Yes, once you turn on and connect TREKr to your mobile device, you can see other users within range.

24. How do I get GPS coordinates in the event of poor signal coverage? 
GPS coordinate readings may be delayed or slightly biased from the range +/- 1m ---> +/- 5m or +/- 10m/ in the event of bad weather conditions or any object caused blockage. TREKr automatically stores your GPS coordinate history. It can provide your pals or even SAR (Search and Rescue) to your location by referring this data. 

25. How long does it take to fully charge the battery?  
About 3 hours.

26. Can I reject a connection and choose not to be linked with other users?
No, you can’t. We designed TREKr specifically to build a communication ‘network’ for users to be able to find and locate each other in the event of an emergency. Once any user turns on the device, they get double insurance by being positioned accurately and quickly updated in real time and should any of them send an SOS*, other users will immediately receive the message. 

*There is a built-in SOS button for emergency situations.

27. About Shipping & Logistics
*Please note that your delivery schedule will differ for the following reasons - 1) Each country has different import procedures and the custom clearance formalities may cause delivery delays that we have no control over; also, 2）it may take time to obtain all required regulatory approvals (FCC and CE markings, etc. ) .
*North America will be the priority of the delivery schedule.
story_txt:
On a Water Bottle! Seriously? 
▲ For Optimal Performance, Space Matters!

♦ LoRa — Clear path for the antenna.
The latest and greatest in the IoT, LoRa technology with its -140dbm sensitivity uses virtually no power and even in an off-grid environment can still broadcast a signal over a very long range.
♦ GPS — Towards clear skies for avoiding blockage of the receiver.
Why a standalone GPS unit?
Simple - search and rescue can often take more than the 2-3 days of normal battery life in other GPS products, such as a cellphone, for example.
♦ Battery — A battery capacity of up to 30 days.
You might not find yourself in a dangerous situation for several days into your adventure; that’s why you need the longest battery life possible.

 
▲ Why is ​TREKr part of a water bottle and not a standalone device?
Simple - you can forget a standalone device, but you are much less likely to forget to bring along a water bottle. It is this combination of necessities, that sets TREKr apart from the competition.
 
▲ TREKr lid is compatible with all 63mm bottles of all sizes.

 
▲ Are you still risking your life with devices that work for less than 72 hours?
TREKr broadcasts your real-time locations in accuracy for more than 720 hours!!! 
Have you ever seen headlines like …


Missing hikers found dead after weeks long search. 
Hikers found dead after suffering from altitude sickness.
Hikers Mysteriously Disappeared!

Taking risks is exciting until it’s not. As the saying goes, “It’s all fun and games until someone loses an eye, or a leg, or an arm or their life.”
That’s why we created TREKr; to help prevent tragedies that could’ve been avoided. Nature is dangerous and everyone thinks and believes that nothing like that could ever happen to them. 
The harsh reality is this: it can happen to you or to someone you know. Why risk your life unnecessarily with inferior products that offer limited battery life, poor broadcast range and are fragile?
 
▲ Just take a look at TREKr’s specs and then compare them to other devices:


A  premium GPS module manufactured by the world-leading brand — u-Blox.
The latest wireless technology offering communication range up to 2 miles with an efficient antenna. 
30 day battery life. 
IPx7 rated housing to make TREKr tough enough for your hardcore adventures. 
An additional function - the built-in LED Lantern. 
BPA Free bottle material. 

Any of these features could potentially save your life or that of a fellow adventurer - so how much is saving your life - or someone else’s - worth? 
 
We didn’t make TREKr to get rich - we made it so that fewer people will become just another statistic.
Or, of course, you could buy something cheap that doesn’t have any of these functions and have your last thought while alive be this: I should’ve bought a instead. Someone will eventually find your body. Maybe​.
GET (2) TREKr - SAVE UP TO 60% OFF
 
▲ About TREKr APP
♦ Build A Community:  You can see other TREKr users coordinates as well.
♦ Protect Your Teammates: TREKr excels at managing a team adventure via the alert function; you are notified as soon as a teammate is out of range.
♦ Share Your Location: As soon as you turn on TREKr and connect to a mobile device, you share your location with the other users.
♦ Call For Help In Emergencies: Press the SOS button and any TREKr users will be immediately notified of your emergency and with accurate GPS coordinates information, you can be found sooner.


 
▲ Main Features of TREKr!
♦ SOS button for emergencies: One button sends an emergency call which every TREKr user in valid range receives at once. And don’t forget that your location coordinates are broadcast constantly in real time as the moment you press the power-on.

♦ Communication works among all users: TREKr tends to make a big tent for all adventurers. Except for the private / group chat feature, all TREKr users in the world get the SOS alerts from anyone who sends an emergency call within valid range.

♦ 2 Mile Transmission Range: With the GPS module, both your location and that of other TREKr users will be accurately geopositioned.

♦ Off-the-Grid, still connected: The long-range radio technology and the premium GPS work without internet service. Just by pushing one button on the bottle, your SOS and position will be broadcast to other TREKr users within transmission range.

♦ 30 Day Battery Life: The battery lasts for up to 30 days on a single charge. Your location (and that of your friends)  is accurately and  constantly broadcast for up to 30 days in real time.

♦ Weather-Sealed IPx7 rated housing: TREKr is a GPS tracking device with a variety of inputs and outputs to cater to the most demanding applications. Its rugged housing is IPx7 rated to withstand any weather or environmental conditions, without sacrificing the performance of its tracking and other functional features.

♦ Built-in LED  as a lantern: You can also use TREKr as a light source via the lantern function.

 
▲ How Does TREKr Work for Adventurers?

♦ ANYWHERE: The possibilities are endless - No matter where you go, there you are!With up to a 2 mile signal coverage between TREKr bottles, you can worry less and go further.
♦ ANYTIME: Outstanding battery life - You’re protected from the moment your adventure starts!Your location (and that of your friends) is accurately and constantly broadcast for up to 30 days in real time.
♦ ANYONE: The best design is always the simplest - is intuitive and easy to operate; designed for first-time adventurers to seasoned veterans to use.
 
▲ Why TREKr? Best of all, you don’t pay any additional service fees!

 
▲ TECH & SPECS

 
▲ Future Products! The best can always get better!
Our next step is to develop further products to provide even better and more complete protection. But don’t worry - we promise that all of our future products will be compatible with TREKr.

♦ TREKr: The Original! For individual or team use.
Necessity and essential safety.
♦ Scanner:  For supervisor/leader use. 
Scanner is designed for rugged terrain that could interfere with transmission range. To help alleviate this problem, Scanner is able to be attached to, and work with, a drone which will increase the search radius and avoid the issue of no-signal or problematic areas.
♦ TREKr Pin: For kids, pets and items.
Maybe you don’t like a water bottle with real GPS. Maybe you’re not sure if your kids will be able to use it properly. Maybe you want to extend TREKr’s protection to your pets. No problem - we hear you! That’s why we’re developing TREKr pin with the same essential safety features!
 
▲ Project Timelime
 
▲ Meet the Team
Holyridge was originally created by two driven adventurers with the goal of helping people be well prepared for adventures.

Shawn and Vincent: We know that even experienced adventurers can sometimes underestimate potentially dangerous situations. We want people to have real security while adventuring but without having to constantly worry about it.   That’s why we combined security with a must-bring  item for those who share the outdoor lifestyle.

 
▲ Our Missions & Why We Need Your Support

To obtain the regulatory approvals & electronics testings.
To have the tooling made for launching the production.
To perfect the APP user interface.



To always be there for our fellow adventurers.
To encourage people  to challenge the unknown.
To significantly reduce SAR manpower and material resources.

GET (2) TREKr - SAVE UP TO 60% OFF
 
▲ Rewards

▲ FAQ
01. What is the communication range?TREKr transmits up to 2 mile provided there are no objects to interfere with the coverage. 
02. Do surroundings such as walls, woods or other giant objects affect the communication range?Yes – while there is tech behind the magic, there is no magic behind the tech. Factors such as terrain, air humidity etc. can influence any electromagnetic signals to varying degrees.
03. Will the TREKr base be compatible with both iPhones and Android phones (iOS and Android OS)?Yes, TREKr will be compatible with both iOS and Android OS. 
04. How long does the battery last?When you use TREKr as a beacon only, the battery should last up to 30 days. The battery duration will decrease if used for Wi-Fi connection or the lantern function; therefore as a safety precaution, when the battery reaches 30% capacity remaining, TREKr will be automatically disable all other functions except for the Beacon function. At 30% or less battery capacity, will keep broadcasting the rescue beacon for between 5 to 6 days.
05. What makes the battery life in TREKr superior to other products currently on the market? TREKr uses the latest LoRa wireless technology, which specializes in long-distance transmission and ultra low power consumption. In addition, we also use a chip made from the world-leading brand - u-Blox - to make our GPS module; by a special motion detection algorithm, we have successfully taken the best advantage of the limited electricity available for maximum effect and duration.
06. How can I turn on the GPS on my bottle?Turn on your TREKr and the GPS will start to your position right away.
07. How accurate is the positioning of TREKr?TREKr is accurate to +/- 1 meter.
08. Where is the product developed and manufactured?The R&D for TREKr was done 100% in Taiwan. We also cooperate with Foxconn (the main manufacturer of the iPhone) to manufacture TREKr.
09. Does it work globally?Yes, TREKr works anywhere in the world.
10. Is there a low battery indicator?Yes, there is a low battery indicator.
11. How many data sets can be stored in the app?TREKr stores more than a million data sets. 
12.How do I connect TREKr to my mobile device?There are only three steps to connect TREKr to your mobile device. 

Turn on TREKr. 
Connect TREKr via Wi-Fi on your mobile device. 
Open the TREKr APP. 

13. How can I find my friends’ position in the TREKr APP?Once you connect TREKr to your mobile device, you can tap on the icons in the APP to read other users’ positioning, as well as other information such as the time, GPS history data and battery status, etc. 
14. Can I just open the app and read other users’ positioning? No, you can’t. You must connect your TREKr to the mobile device to read any other users (within detectable range) coordinates because TREKr only scans for another/other TREKr devices.
15. How does TREKr send network signals over long-distances?TREKr uses advanced Spread Spectrum and Channel Coding with LoRa technology to maximize signal reception (up to -140db). In the limited space of the lid, we have embedded a patterned customized antenna to maximize transmitting ability.
16. How much does TREKr weight? TREKr weighs approximately 200g including the bottle (empty, of course).
17. Is the battery rechargeable?Yes, the battery can be recharged using a micro-USB.
18. Is there service fee or monthly fee for its use? No, TREKr doesn't charge you any service or monthly fee. 
19. Is TREKr drop-proof?  Absolutely – within reason, of course. Drop it from the height of a person, no problem.Drop it from an airplane at 10,000 feet – probably not.
20. What is the warranty?TREKr comes with a One (1) Year warranty. 
21. How bright is the LED light?We are still testing different LED lamps at this time to provide the best user experience.
22. Is TREKr waterproof? Yes, TREKr is rated IPx7 waterproof. 
23. Can multiple TREKr users be linked together? Yes, once you turn on and connect TREKr to your mobile device, you can see other users within range.
24. How do I get GPS coordinates in the event of poor signal coverage? GPS coordinate readings may be delayed or slightly biased from the range +/- 1m ---> +/- 5m or +/- 10m/ in the event of bad weather conditions or any object caused blockage. TREKr automatically stores your GPS coordinate history. It can provide your pals or even SAR (Search and Rescue) to your location by referring this data. 
25. How long does it take to fully charge the battery?  About 3 hours.
26. Can I reject a connection and choose not to be linked with other users?No, you can’t. We designed TREKr specifically to build a communication ‘network’ for users to be able to find and locate each other in the event of an emergency. Once any user turns on the device, they get double insurance by being positioned accurately and quickly updated in real time and should any of them send an SOS*, other users will immediately receive the message. 
*There is a built-in SOS button for emergency situations.
27. About Shipping & Logistics*Please note that your delivery schedule will differ for the following reasons - 1) Each country has different import procedures and the custom clearance formalities may cause delivery delays that we have no control over; also, 2）it may take time to obtain all required regulatory approvals (FCC and CE markings, etc. ) .*North America will be the priority of the delivery schedule.

story:
We love traveling. And we've tried a whole bunch of light day packs in our years of travel and exploration. And all the day packs we tried had something in common: they were really uncomfortable. 

Whether it was something poking us in the back, or a strain in the shoulders in the early afternoon, it just wasn't worth it. The day would always end the same way: with us both sore and in pain. 

So we did what any exasperated product designer does: we designed a new daypack. One that still folds up into a tiny ball but expands into a full comfortable backpack.  

The next-level comfort is thanks to our patent-pending air-cushioned support system that inflates in just one big breath. It's been described as like having a backpack made of clouds. Clouds that are gently hugging you for some reason. It might be a bit hyperbolic, but it's also SUPER comfy.

The interconnected air cushions on the shoulders and back re-distribute the load and relieve any pressure points. The result is a drastically reduced stress and strain on your back, shoulders, and neck.

When folded, it's small enough to fit in the palm of your hand. When it's unpacked and given a breath, it's a full-sized daypack ready to comfortably fit and carry all your things.

               

 33L Waterproof Main Compartment - Enough room to take it all with you and stay dry. 

Ultra-Strong, super-light, rugged, and waterproof - CORDURA fabric is a high-quality fabric used by brands, retailers and even militaries around the world to create lasting, quality products that hold up to the CORDURA brand's high criteria. 

Duraflex Buckle - An extra snap that keeps your Air Pack tight and secure.

Double Bottom Layer - Durable even against the roughest grounds.

Water Resistant Reflective Zipper - A premium zipper with a strong safety feature 

Adjustable Stability Straps (Load Lifter) For maximum fit and comfort

 Adjustable Sternum Strap - For comfort and stability when on the move

 Removable Waist Strap - For more support and even more snug fit

 Easy Access Front Pocket - Easily grab or store your stuff

Deep Side Pockets - Extra deep, to hold your water bottle or other essentials.

 Slips on Suitcase Handle - For convenient travel

 Built-in Safety Whistle - For emergencies

TREXAD is founded by Daniel & Ella.
We are Ph.Ds who love to travel whenever we can. We also love designing innovative products that solve our own problems and needs. The TREXAD air pack is the first product that we want to share with you (and we have lots more exciting ideas). Our goal is to help everyone travel lighter, more comfortably, and to just experience more!  

The combination of our experience in the air mattress industry and in designing and manufacturing outdoor gear is what enabled us to make Air Pack in such a revolutionary and reimagined way.

We couldn't be prouder of the result.

At TREXAD, we are so confident in our backpacks that we're including a lifetime warranty for all Air Packs for all of our backers. We will replace any problematic backpacks free of charge. 

We are also VERY SERIOUS about testing our backpack. Every backpack will be thoroughly inspected and tested before packaging. 

We're confident due to our extensive experience in designing and manufacturing inflatable sleeping pads. We've sold more than 50,000 inflatable sleeping pads and are experts in the field, which drove us to develop the Air Pack.

story:
Why I Create iPic

Blog is cool, but inserting picture is painful. Think how to manually insert a picture into blog.

  • Open browser and sign in an image host (e.g., Imgur).
  • Upload the picture file.
  • Copy the link of the picture.
  • Insert to blog, edit as Markdown format.
  • Repeat for other images ...
Watch the video above, you will find iPic could automatically upload picture and save the markdown format link.

How is iPic Now

Now iPic already implemented basic features, you can download the trial version for Mac OS X.


But still, there're lots of job to do:

  • Support more image hosts, e.g., Flickr, etc.
  • Management for pictures in image host.
  • Polish the logo, user interface and workflow.
  • Support sandbox to be able to release on Mac App Store.
  • Provide upload service. So other apps could also upload picture using iPic.
  • Other great features requested by you...

Why I Need Your Help

I'm a Mac developer and already create several Mac apps: Daily Clipboard, Attention Timer and iHosts. In Developer category, iHosts hits #2 in China and #4 in Japan.

I'm also a standalone Mac developer without a job. My only revenue comes from my Apps. I love iPic and will continue to polish it. But I really need your help to make it happen. Your help not only buy me a coffee, but really help me to create this great app.

Anyway, welcome to use trial version of iPic. Tell me what you want and how you want to improve iPic, this could also be great help for me.


How Will iPic Be Sold

iPic will be released on Mac App Store. Possibly use Free + In App Purchase mode ($6.99). 

  • Free version could only use default image host. 
  • Purchased version could upload to your image host like Imgur.

You can get iPic with great discount if you back it now. I will send you the serial number when iPic is ready.


When Will iPic be Ready

Aug this year.

But before that, I will release trial version around every 2 weeks, which include new features and improvements for your feedback.


Let's build great app together!

story:
What is vanlife?

Vanlife is taking a normal transit van and converting it to a stealth model living space that has benefits such as low cost living and the ability to travel and freely explore the world we live in without being tied down to one location!

How would I benefit living out of a van? 

Living in a van would mean I would be able to afford to look after myself independently and move out of my mothers house whist still making enough to be able to save money for prototyping products, investing in my ideas and equipment for making my music! Here is my soundcloud if you want to check out what Music ive made so far!

Why choose to live in a van? 

I’m always looking for things to spark inspiration for my music and projects, in fact I designed and made a prototype of a wall mounted/kickstand phone holder with portable charging, speakers and leds out of a box of broken electronics I had after coming back from camping with friends one day. Unfortunately I didn’t have the funds to make a 2nd better prototype but here is a picture of the first product I ever made! 

 

Why do I need crowdfunding to get a van?

I know how strong, kind and generous the vanlife Community is and after a friend recommended to me that I start a crowdfunding campaign I thought to myself what do I have to lose. Just like everyone else due to covid ive struggle to find work so I am solely reliant on the money I make through my business advertising for small start ups on social media. This makes me around £600 a month which works out to £100 to £200 after bills, credit card payments and food. my total expenses for getting a van to live in would be around £7000 up front and I just don’t have that kind of money right now so I’m hoping the vanlife Community can come together to help support me on getting started 

What’s my plans after getting a van?

Once I move into my van my plan is quite simple really, I want to hit the road and travel whist saving enough money to invest in all my projects. I’ll hopefully will be able to rent a small garage or storage unit to have a small workshop where I can slowly buy the tools necessary to prototype more of my product ideas and inventions whist integrating my music studio into my van for making new songs whist traveling. I plan to document my adventures and Journey on either YouTube or Instagram so the people who donate can see what I’m doing and get updates on how everything is going! 

THANK YOU!

To everyone who has donated i got to say this from the bottom of my heart thank you, i don t want to give you a sob story but alot has happened in my life the past year from my ex girlfriend kicking me out to employment and money issues that lead to me making some stupid decisions but since then I have a new prospective of life and i am eager to make a change so a big thank you to everyone supporting me on my journey!

Life saver!

For anyone who donates over £20 i will send you a hand written card saying thank you for your kind donation.

Legend!

For anyone who donates over £50 I’ll write your name somewhere on the van and send you a selfie of me next to it I will also thank you personally through a hand written letter. 

Hero!

For anyone who donates over £100 I’ll write your name somewhere on the van and send you a selfie of me next to it I will also thank you personally through a hand written letter and add you to my contacts so i can send you real time updates on how the van build is going!

What’s my plans after getting a van?Once I move into my van my plan is quite simple really, I want to hit the road and travel whist saving enough money to invest in all my projects. I’ll hopefully will be able to rent a small garage or storage unit to have a small workshop where I can slowly buy the tools necessary to prototype more of my product ideas and inventions whist integrating my music studio into my van for making new songs whist traveling. I plan to document my adventures and Journey on either YouTube or Instagram so the people who donate can see what I’m doing and get updates on how everything is going! THANK YOU!To everyone who has donated i got to say this from the bottom of my heart thank you, i don t want to give you a sob story but alot has happened in my life the past year from my ex girlfriend kicking me out to employment and money issues that lead to me making some stupid decisions but since then I have a new prospective of life and i am eager to make a change so a big thank you to everyone supporting me on my journey!Life saver!For anyone who donates over £20 i will send you a hand written card saying thank you for your kind donation.Legend!For anyone who donates over £50 I’ll write your name somewhere on the van and send you a selfie of me next to it I will also thank you personally through a hand written letter. Hero!For anyone who donates over £100 I’ll write your name somewhere on the van and send you a selfie of me next to it I will also thank you personally through a hand written letter and add you to my contacts so i can send you real time updates on how the van build is going!

story:
Owning a fishing kayak has never been easier. We're proud to present the brand new Point 65 KingFisher, the world's first modular trimaran fishing kayak.   

We wanted to make owning a fishing kayak easy. A kayak that can take you anywhere - regardless of how much space or strength you have to store and carry it. A kayak that’s as easy to handle outside the water as it is on it. 

 

 

 

Modular kayaks can go places most kayaks can’t. The two halves of the KingFisher snap apart in seconds and easily fit into your car, apartment or even as checked-in luggage on an airplane. Plus, half a kayak is twice as easy to carry! One person can easily load, unload and assemble the KingFisher. No roof-racks or storage space? No problem!

 

 

The KingFisher’s flexibility doesn’t stop with its modular design. You have the choice of using your legs, arms, or motor to get where you want to go. The slender hull design makes for smooth, effortless paddle strokes if you want to go the old-fashioned route. The optional Impulse Drive is ready and waiting when you need your hands free, using the power of your legs to propel you forward or backward. Steering is a breeze with our handy rudder controls and you can fit almost any motor to the KingFisher's aft deck. 

 

 

 A fishing kayak that still feels like a kayak. This beautifully designed boat melts into the natural surroundings. No disturbing wake, no loud noises or smelly motor fumes. Feel relaxed as you paddle, sit, stand, and fish. All with complete confidence in the KingFisher to support your weight and movements. 

 

 

With multiple settings & heights, the Game Chair adjusts to you - not the other way round. Perfect for when you’re patiently waiting for the next bite, setting up your line, or wrangling your latest catch! 

 

 

This boat is decked out with everything you need to have the best possible fishing experience. Multiple Rod Parks, super-comfy adjustable Game Chair, two spacious storage hatches and plenty of compatible attachment rails and bars for anything else you want to add on top. 

 

 

All of our kayaks are made from high quality, durable, moulded HTP plastics free from harmful chemicals and dyes. The material used is 100% recyclable, and all manufacturing remnants (like cut out hatches) are recycled. We put every model through extensive durability testing to make a product that will last through many adventures. And, thanks to our 'modular' spare parts design system, if any piece gets damaged or broken, you can easily replace an individual part instead of scrapping your entire kayak.

 

 

When designing the KingFisher, we set out to tackle the biggest challenges of owning a fishing kayak.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

When kayak fishing, you often need your arms and hands free for fishing. The optional ImpulseDrive easily pops into its slot in the KingFisher kayak and effectively propels you forward and backward using leg power. The pedal drive unit is extremely light-weight and is one of the few pedal-driven units on the market that can be driven both forward - and in reverse. With your largest muscle group in play, kayak fishing becomes easier and more efficient than ever.

 

 

The Impulse Drive is a revolutionary pedal-drive system designed around a very simple premise: if a product is designed to be used in the water it should be 100% corrosion proof. Featuring a high performance encased shaft drive design, that is immune to water damage, the Impulse Drive will not corrode or degrade in water. Not only does this design dramatically reduce wear but it also provides a high-performance system that is 100% user serviceable. The Impulse Drive is incredibly versatile for the retailer and end user.

 

 

The Trimaran hull is the secret to the KingFisher's stability, speed, and lightweight design. Trimarans evoke a vision of stability.  A conventional monohull must balance conflicting needs of resistance and stability.  You want a narrow, skinny hull to reduce resistance and paddling effort, but you need a wide hull to maintain vessel stability and keep the kayak upright.  The trimaran separates these two design requirements by using three strategically-placed hulls to maximize stability but keep the overall width to a minimum.

 

 

In order to maintain the same stability in a regular monohull kayak, the hull width must be wider.  A wider hull makes the kayak awkward and cumbersome to paddle, adds extra weight, and significantly decreases portability.

 

 

Featuring one of the most comfortable seats on the kayak fishing market, the KingFisher Game Chair offers a variety of settings to give you a comfortable and effective paddling position. The super comfy KingFisher Game Chair, combined with the kayak´s world-class stability, speed, and logical accessory positioning, makes it a serious fishing machine in all water types.

 
 
 

Multiple marine-grade aluminum attachment rails are fitted along the KingFisher allowing for maximum flexibility for how you would like to customize your kayak.  The front, middle and rear sections have rails along both sides and can fit RAM, Scotty, or other accessories securely. 

 

 

Flush-mounted rod holders are located on either side of the Kingfisher, with integrated rod-holder recesses and rod-tip protectors. You can relax knowing your rods will be held in place while you paddle, pedal or motor through the water. 

 

 

The KingFisher has well-placed, generous storage space for all your gear. Below the Game Chair, you'll find space for your tackle boxes for easy access. There are front and rear hatches with a removable liner for equipment, battery packs, etc. There is also a rear cargo area with secure bungees and floor-mounted aluminum rails. 

 

The super efficient, hand-controlled twin rudders help you maneuver your KingFisher with ease and precision. The dual steering handles with fingertip control are located on either side of the Game Chair, and the rudders can be locked in place to give you more options for steering. 

 

 

 

Shipping to Zone  1: Shipping is $199

Shipping to Zone 2: Shipping is $399

For our backers in the United States, our trusted distributors Liberty Mountain will take care of shipping your kayak once the container delivery is made from our European factory. They’re one of the world’s largest wholesale distributors for outdoor products and have been in the business since 1952. Liberty Mountain ships to most of the United States. If you choose to pick up your kayak from our PA warehouse, 100% of the shipping costs will be refunded to you. 

 

Shipping to Zone  1: Shipping is $199

Shipping to Zone 2: Shipping is $399

All of our European orders will be shipped directly from our warehouse in Stockholm, Sweden. We’ve been shipping orders to Sweden and the European Union for over 20 years and our established courier network will handle the delivery directly to your doorstep. Every order will be shipped from inside the EU, so you don't have to worry about any extra fees or customs charges. If you pick up your kayak from our warehouse in Stockholm, Sweden, 100% of the shipping costs will be refunded to you. 

Since 1996, we've been passionate about designing kayaks and redefining the kayak adventure. Point 65 is a family business, run by a close-knit team in our Stockholm, Sweden HQ. We're proud of our Scandinavian roots and take inspiration from both the idyllic natural surroundings and the innovative design culture. In fact, Point 65 is named after the coordinates of the island of Rönnskär, a magical place in the North of Sweden featuring an iconic lighthouse looking out over an archipelago of hundreds of small islands. 

We've designed & developed over 30 kayaks, and you also might recognize our brand of Point 65 Boblbee hardshell, impact protective backpacks.

 

Our heritage may be Swedish, but you can find our kayaks all over the world. We partner with world-class product distributors to stock our products in stores everywhere. You can also find our kayaks being used for outdoor excursions, hotel guests and rental fleets.

story:
Why did I (Jason) start MEZURIT?

There were so many cases when I wanted to know the size of objects. But I couldn't do it immediately because I had no ruler or tape at hand to: 

  • measure the size of my carry-on luggage at the airport to save money.
  • check if my new furniture would fit through the door.
  • find out the size of the painting, vase, etc.
  • assess what package I need for the thing I wanted to ship and how much I have to pay for its shipment. 

So I realized there was a necessity to create a tool that would always be in my pocket, would not require any additional stuff and would be quick to make the measurements I need. That's how it started.

I found people who were passionate about my idea and the work began.

What have we already made?

We have a working prototype of  MEZURIT-Travel App. It measures the size of objects using a smartphone camera.

Now I measure the size of my carry-on luggage just with my smartphone. So can you! 

It does so with the help of built-in algorithms. All you need is to put a credit card next to the object. It's never been so easy!

We need a credit card to use as a reference marker with known dimensions. We have chosen a credit card because its size is standard in all the countries throughout the world.

What do we want to add and improve? 

1. We want to sophisticate our algorithms. 

We are eager to adopt the promising approach of our scientist and developer. It is based on Neural Networks (NN) and Optical Image Processing with MATLAB. The approach uses the committees of NN trained on different scale images. Our experiments at image processing show that designed classifiers are effective and can ensure a significant accuracy. Therefore, we would like to make a core on its base.

Why do we want to sophisticate the algorithms? - To increase the accuracy of measurements up to 99% (now it's 95%). 

2. We also want to expand the MEZURIT family: to create a MEZURIT-Home app, a MEZURIT-Build one, and a MEZURIT-Cargo app. 

The MEZURIT-Home will measure the size of furniture pieces and objects we find in our homes. It will come so handy when you order new pieces or you want to make some changes in your home. Additionally, it will have special features related to the home sphere, as in the case with MEZURIT-Travel with which you can check-in on the go.

The MEZURIT-Build will measure the sizes of windows, doors, and whatsoever needs to be measured when it comes to reconstruction of houses and apartments. It will be useful both for professionals and for non-professionals. 

The MEZURIT-Cargo app will measure the size of things you want to ship and will make the necessary calculations in order to tell you how much you will have to pay for it to be shipped and what package you need for it. It will also measure cargos and calculate for you the shipping expenses and warehouse fees. 

So in short, the core feature of the 3 apps is the same - the measuring algorithms. However, each app will have (and already has - if we take MEZURIT-Travel) its unique features according to its sphere of application - travelling, building, home, logistics. For example, you can check-in with MEZURIT-Travel. 

To make it possible
we need Your help!

Not all of our perks are listed in the pitch. Check on your right for all the perks available. 

Get perks for FREE!

Refer as many friends as you can. When their contributions total a particular sum, you get one of the perks for FREE! ( but the shipping expenses are on you).

          

How to participate in it?

  1. Log in to Indiegogo – you must be logged in to receive credit for your referrals.
  2. Go to the Mezurit Indiegogo campaign page where you can find your unique link to the right of our video by clicking on the ‘link’ button. You'll see https://igg.me/at/mezurit/x/numbers
  3. Copy that link, keep it safe and start sharing! On your social networks, via e-mails, via everything that your mind can generate.
  4. When they click on your link, they are referred to Mezurit Indiegogo campaign page.
  5. The person who clicked on the referral link must immediately make a contribution after clicking on the referral link. If they visit other pages or websites or leave and come back to the campaign later to contribute, their contribution will not be counted as a referral. (Indiegogo).
  6. When they make a contribution, we get a notification that it was you who referred the backer.
  7. When the sum of the contributions totals $, we’ll give you one of our perks for FREE!

Should you have any questions, we will be happy to answer them!
Contact us at info@mezurit.net

We are already so proud of our
MEZURIT-Travel mobile application. 

How will it save your money and time?

  • Save on airlines fees. Check your luggage dimensions and compare them with an airline allowance. Choose the luggage of the right size for your trip.
  • Moving to a new flat is tough. Learn what truck is necessary for your furniture. 
  • Check if a furniture piece can fit through your door or whether it can fit in a certain place in the room.
  • Do you want to order new windows or doors for your apartment? Get the size of a window/doorway, then compare the prices among suppliers.
  • Assess what package you need for the thing you want to ship and how much money you'll have to pay for. 
  • Are you a regular customer of freight-forwarding services? If yes, then MEZURIT-Cargo can substantially ease your life by calculating the expenses and fees depending on the size of your cargo. 
  • Are you just curious about the size of the thing?
  • And many more other options.

Your feedback is highly valuable. We will be grateful to hear it from you after you download the app. Help us become better.

    A journey is best measured in friends, MEZURIT will measure everything else.


    Help us share a word!

story:
Husky sleigh rides in Armenia

We want to create a winter sports center that offers special routes for the Husky sleigh rides on the slopes of Mount Maimekh in Lori Region.  The routes will run be between the Lori-Kotayk Regions, providing a unique experience for tourists in Armenia.

It wil be the only place in the Caucasus region to have this fun attraction!

story:
Introducing Peg-it

 

Camping is an industry that grows by around 10% every year, but nobody has introduced a  product to revolutionize it until now.

Peg-it is the first camping tool that helps you to INSERT, REMOVE, AND CLEAN tent stakes, designed and developed by Guillermo Muñoz. Guillermo has spent his whole life enjoying outdoor activities and has recently started to develop new products and improve existing products.

After years of dealing with bent stakes (pegs) due to the hard ground during many camping trips, he decided to create the innovational Peg-It.

Just do some simple math: 2-6 bent stakes per trip, $1 to $3 per stake, 2-5 camping trips per year, and the cost of replacing damaged stakes could be $10 - $60 each year!

1/3 of the cost of your tent… or more.

Seriously, have you considered that before? Probably not!

That is why you need PEG-IT.

I planned to bring Peg-It to the market earlier this year but we were scammed by a couple of industrial designers and lost almost all our funds to start our first production round.

With your help we can bring this product to market. We want to give you an easy way to INSERT, REMOVE, AND CLEAN any type of tent stakes that you have, helping you to save both time and money (and open your beer too).

Made with 7050 Aluminum we will guarantee the best quality and durability for this product. 

 

To keep things simple, here are our rewards:

 

$5 - 1 Peg-It Sticker + a 10% off voucher for future purchases.

$15 - 1 Peg-It (Retail $20)

$28 - 2 Peg-It (Retail $40 for 2)

$50 - 4 Peg-It (Retail $80 for 4)

 

Unique Design

Peg-It allows you to easily insert any type of stake that you have; V shape, Y shape, MSR unique design, all of them!

 

Peg-It allows you to easily remove all types of stakes. Just latch on and pull. So simple!

 

Peg-It  is designed to clean any type of stake. For example, a Standard Roundwire Stake.

 

or a Y shape Stake, with Peg-It you can clean them all!

 

And it fits in your existing stake bag. 

 

It can't get any better, can it? 

Well, for those who like to enjoy a drink out on the wild, I thought about you too! 

It also works as a bottle opener.

 

Features

- Boosts tent set-up time

- Prevents financial problems to the user

- Time saver

 - Helps to prevent the stake from kinking or bending (no more damaged stakes!)

- Works with any type of stake

- Safe for kids

- Easy to store

Stretch Goals

$30,000 - Funded

$50,000 -  Free stake bag (with some new features), developed by GMS Solution (Parent company from Peg-It)

$100,000 - Stretch goal N° 1 plus a set (10) extremely durable aluminum V shape stakes

$250,000 -  Stretch goal N° 1 + N° 2 plus our –at the moment- secret new product for 2019 (Hint: Platform Camping)

 

 

Special thanks:

 For all the support with the camping gear.

www.rentalnatales.com

If you go to Torres del Paine, visit them in Puerto Natales.

 

 

Coterráneo Producciones for the video, if you need to make quality videos you must check them out.

 

Thomas Heney for the voice over, from this and other videos.

Check him out at:

www.thomasheney.com
story_txt:
Introducing Peg-it
 
Camping is an industry that grows by around 10% every year, but nobody has introduced a  product to revolutionize it until now.
Peg-it is the first camping tool that helps you to INSERT, REMOVE, AND CLEAN tent stakes, designed and developed by Guillermo Muñoz. Guillermo has spent his whole life enjoying outdoor activities and has recently started to develop new products and improve existing products.
After years of dealing with bent stakes (pegs) due to the hard ground during many camping trips, he decided to create the innovational Peg-It.
Just do some simple math: 2-6 bent stakes per trip, $1 to $3 per stake, 2-5 camping trips per year, and the cost of replacing damaged stakes could be $10 - $60 each year!
1/3 of the cost of your tent… or more.
Seriously, have you considered that before? Probably not!
That is why you need PEG-IT.
I planned to bring Peg-It to the market earlier this year but we were scammed by a couple of industrial designers and lost almost all our funds to start our first production round.
With your help we can bring this product to market. We want to give you an easy way to INSERT, REMOVE, AND CLEAN any type of tent stakes that you have, helping you to save both time and money (and open your beer too).
Made with 7050 Aluminum we will guarantee the best quality and durability for this product. 
 
To keep things simple, here are our rewards:
 
$5 - 1 Peg-It Sticker + a 10% off voucher for future purchases.
$15 - 1 Peg-It (Retail $20)
$28 - 2 Peg-It (Retail $40 for 2)
$50 - 4 Peg-It (Retail $80 for 4)
 
Unique Design
Peg-It allows you to easily insert any type of stake that you have; V shape, Y shape, MSR unique design, all of them!

 
Peg-It allows you to easily remove all types of stakes. Just latch on and pull. So simple!

 
Peg-It  is designed to clean any type of stake. For example, a Standard Roundwire Stake.

 
or a Y shape Stake, with Peg-It you can clean them all!

 
And it fits in your existing stake bag. 

 
It can't get any better, can it? 
Well, for those who like to enjoy a drink out on the wild, I thought about you too! 
It also works as a bottle opener.

 
Features
- Boosts tent set-up time
- Prevents financial problems to the user
- Time saver
 - Helps to prevent the stake from kinking or bending (no more damaged stakes!)
- Works with any type of stake
- Safe for kids
- Easy to store
Stretch Goals
$30,000 - Funded
$50,000 -  Free stake bag (with some new features), developed by GMS Solution (Parent company from Peg-It)
$100,000 - Stretch goal N° 1 plus a set (10) extremely durable aluminum V shape stakes
$250,000 -  Stretch goal N° 1 + N° 2 plus our –at the moment- secret new product for 2019 (Hint: Platform Camping)
 

 
Special thanks:
 For all the support with the camping gear.
www.rentalnatales.com
If you go to Torres del Paine, visit them in Puerto Natales.
 
 

Coterráneo Producciones for the video, if you need to make quality videos you must check them out.
 

Thomas Heney for the voice over, from this and other videos. 
Check him out at:
www.thomasheney.com

story:
The Stitch-able Travel Notebook is the essential crafty accessory for any globe-trotting adventurer. This unique journal not only allows you to write down all your travel memories, it also lets you record your journeys across this planet with colourful stitches. 

Sew, where have you been...?

The beautiful genuine leather cover is printed with a gold map, and is specially perforated so that it is easy to stitch. Simply add crosses to record your trips by land, air and sea. 

The notebook evolves as you travel and mark off new destinations.

Whether you add simple crosses or get more creative stitching patterns or text, your notebook will be like no-one else's. Showing your unique travels across the planet.  

Colour co-ordinate your trips & even add text.

Wrap the plane around the world to secure

A travel journal is the most wonderful way to record all the musings, anecdotes and ideas that you have when embarking on a trip or holiday. Fill the pages with tickets, maps, sketches and stories so that you can always look back on the experience. 

In this fast-paced technological world, it’s nice to slow down – use your hands, put pen to paper and needle through fabric.

The leather cover is removable so each trip can be stored in a new notebook. Capture years of memories by building up your own travel library.

Extra refill notebooks are available separately or you can use any other A5 notebook refill - so you can continue to fill new Travel Notebooks for years to come.

  • Genuine leather cover printed with gold world map
  • Elasticated pen holder
  • 'Round the world' tie cloing
  • A5 notebook with 120 x lined pages (100 gsm)
  • 'Date' and 'Location' headers on each page 
  • Comes with 2m emerald & 3m gold thread & 1 x needle
  • Stitch Travel Notebook will come packaged with 2 x threads & 1 needle

Use the notebook as a journal or scrapbook for your travels

Designed and ready to manufacture, these unique notebooks are ready to be ordered. But investing in a new product isn't cheap and that's where you come in. With your help, I can raise the money for their production and get these into the world, and off on some amazing adventures!

If you like the idea, and you’d want to fill your cover with stitches and your pages with memories, then please do pledge or share with your travel loving friends! You can also grab yourself other items from the Chasing Threads collection as a reward, which all adds towards the funding total.

These would make a great Christmas gift, arriving in plenty of time for the festive season. Or, invest in the Globe-trotter Bundle and you would have Christmas sewn up…?! 

Though the Stitch Travel Notebook is a new product, I have been selling the other items from the collection for over 18 months and have received some lovely reviews. Here are a few of my favourites...

If you’re got time, I’ll take you allll the way back, because it’s interesting how ideas evolve and can lead somewhere you never expected. 

2015 Back at the start of 2015 I went on a road-trip with my boyfriend (let’s call him Foster...) from Las Vegas, across the Joshua Tree desert to LA, then up the coast to San Francisco. It was an awesome trip and pretty special driving through the Mojave desert in our rented Mustang. 

A map and the open road, Joshua Tree

For Foster's next birthday I got a little crafty, and stitched the road map that we’d used to navigate the whole way with some colourful thread to mark the route we’d taken. It made a pretty nice gift and he was chuffed since he loves maps. We framed it and it still hangs in our living room. 

My stitched USA road map

From there this idea of stitching your travels and using thread to show a journey hugely appealed to me. Paper was fragile so I started looking at alternatives… 

2016 The idea for the fabric Cross Stitch Map was born and quirky gift company, Suck UK, where I worked at the time, started to manufacture them. These caught the imagination of many others, being stocked in Urban Outfitters, John Lewis, Uncommon Goods & many more.

Cross Stitch wall map I designed for Suck UK

2017  I left Suck to start developing my own products and started to experiment with ‘stitchable’ maps in new materials and different products. 

First samples of the stitchable range made from cotton and leather

I launched Maid In China Ltd (did I mention I like puns), manufacturing ceramic products & homeware, as well as the first batch of passport covers & luggage tags. 

2018 The collection of passport covers & luggage tags grew to form a bigger range and it became necessary to give them their own sub-brand. Hello: Chasing Threads.

story: We are looking to build a 80x80ft metal building on my own land, we will then hire a professional skate park Designer (Team Pain Skate parks) www.teampain.com  To Build A 40ft long 12ft high Halfpipe Inside The Building. This will be a place for all midwest skaters to come and Hone There Vertical Skating skills, boosting the number of young skaters in the sport. I will add more ramps to the building as time passes. You can check out video's of my 6 year old son on facebook under Brett Mashore or Heather Adkins along with other links to skateboarding in Oklahoma. Feel Free to email me at Jmashore@gaillardia.com or Bmashore@hotmail.com with any questions you might have. There are no ramps like this in the state and there are very few in the country that are free and open to the public. Lets get together and build something for our children. Thank You
