story:
Nowadays many campers are changing their camping styles to minimal camping which does not require much equipment. The reason for the change is that it is really inconvenient to carry a lot of gear. Wirefit is a multi-purpose, interchangeable shoe (or 'type of footwear') for those campers who are tired of carrying heavy luggage and a lot of equipment. The assembly structure of the footwear allows the user to enjoy many different activities at the campsite with only one shoe by simply rearranging its parts.

 

There is no need to bring several pairs of shoes when you go camping. The multi-purpose function of Wirefit allows you to enjoy many activities with only one shoe and also reduce the amount of gear to need to take.

The Inboots can be used as water shoes for activities where you may get wet. You do not need to worry about getting your shoes dirty because they are easy to clean.

You can wear the rest of Wirefit (or 'the other half') as sandals after taking the inboots out. Choose the type of footwear you wear by simply rearranging the parts of Wirefit.

A : Elastic Knit Upper

The inboot is made with elastic knitted material that provides excellent ventilation. The insole is integrated with the inboot making it easiser to put on and take off.

B : Injectd Phylon Sole

The sole is designed to function as both a camping shoe and a sandal and does not require the use of adhesives due to its wire assembly structure.

C : Wire Strap

The wire assembly structure effectively creates a three dimensional foot shape providing excellent comfort.

 

Dial Lacing System

The dial lacing system is integrated with the wire strap structure and surronds the foot perfectly. It can also be disassembled.

3M reflective material 

3M reflective material has been used in the front and the back in order to protect the user during night activities.

Injection Unit Sole

Injection unit sole functions both as midsole and outsole. The material provides excellent cushioning and durability. The structures of the sole and wire strap match perfectly for assembly.

 

We have currently completed the design for the basic mold of Wirefit’s sole, and the first demo version is complete. At the wire and sole combination stage, We’re listening to the opinions of campers as we update and perfect our design in order to provide the best in camping comfort.

 

we’re conducting biomechanics testing in order to make a more stable and complete shoe as well as improve the fit for the wearer.

Wirefit has been thoroughly tested, and passed laboratory evaluation by KIFLT.

 

These are some of the common mistakes made

​1.Stand up straight on a hard surface with your heel against the wall and a piece of blank paper taped to the floor, flush against the wall beneath your foot.

2.Have someone mark the longest part of your foot (referred to as heel-to-toe length) on the paper with a pen or pencil, or measure yourself if necessary. Repeat with the other foot, as right and left sizes may be different.

3.Use a ruler to measure the heel-to-toe length you marked for each foot. Use your foot length measurements and refer to the chart above to choose your shoe size.

 

 

 

We’ve gained a lot of knowhow as we’ve focused on shoe design and development since our start in 1996. And now we’ve started an assemblable shoe project. Our shoes being assemblable means that we help protect the health of manufacturing workers as well as ensure the recyclability of our product by not using adhesives, keeping Wirefit ecofriendly. Wearers can customize their shoes to their liking by combining a variety of colors and materials. We are little by little developing an assemblable shoe.

 

  • STEP 01

SOLVENT 50% : KI XTRAP NEO

We were able to achieve a 50% reduction in the amount of adhesive used on our first fully developed assemblable shoe, the Xtrap Neo. With it’s 22 Wavepads that provide a balancing toning effect located on the outsole, the Xtrap Neo provides stability for both walking and running.

 

  • STEP 02

SOLVENT 0% : KI ECOBE

KI ecobe is a self-assembled modular shoe that uses no toxic adhesives. The end user assembles the shoe making the manufacturing process much less labor intensive. Choose your favorite colors and styles to make your unique shoe! With the KI ECOBE, we achieved 0% adhesive usage. 

 

  • STEP 03

MORE SIMPLE : KIZKIT

KizKit children’s shoe, you can enjoy a variety of activities wherever you go – all with just one shoe. A more simplified version of our KI ECOBE, the Kids Kit can be worn as a water shoe or sandal and its colors are customizable. You can sit back and enjoy as your child puts together their own shoes using the colors they like.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

One year ago we successfully funded our interchangeable shoe KI ECOBE through Kickstarter and were able to ship out to all our backers. Since then, we’ve worked to develop an even more versatile interchangeable shoe by improving on KI ECOBE. We’ve started the Wirefit Project and have completed a Demo version. Through an Indigogo campaign we plan to develop and optimize Wirefit for a variety of camping needs. If our funding is successful, we will have what we need to carry Wirefit through to production. Please share your opinions with us – we want to hear a variety of ideas. We’ll gather your opinions and ship Wirefit to you first.

story:
ORIGIN STORY 

Walden Hammocks were designed by an outdoors-man who found that having to pack and carry multiple pieces of gear to provide shelter was cumbersome. So, he made a hammock that could be easily converted into multiple different survival shelters.

WHAT IS THE WALDEN HAMMOCK? 

The Walden is a patent pending hammock design that has a system of channels and attached guidelines enabling it to quickly transform into a variety of shelters. Not only has it been designed with a variety of adventures in mind, it's also been designed to best protect against the elements. It's made of 70D ripstop nylon with polyurethane coating. It's water proof and completely seam sealed, it can hold over 500 lbs, and it has a stitched border that ensures for even tightening of the shelter. Plus, we had comfort in mind. The wide panel in the middle means that when relaxing in the hammock, you won't have a seam running down your back.

Thoughtfully Designed. Quality Made.

DON'T GET CAUGHT WITHOUT SHELTER

The great outdoors are a wondrous place, until they are a dangerous place. Even on simple outdoor excursions, the right equipment can be the difference between life and death. Use the Walden Hammock to protect you from sudden and unexpected weather. Protecting yourself from getting wet can help prevent hypothermia. Or, protecting yourself from the sun on a hot day can help prevent heat stroke.

EASY TO SET UP

Each tie down point can be used to secure the shelter with a hiking pole, stick, or stake. Each tie down point has a guideline attached to the tarp so you can adjust from under the tarp, that way you don't need to tighten from all of the various tie down points. Each guideline has its own pocket so you don’t have a rats nest of cordage when pulling it out, and you don’t lose it.

 EASY TO PACK

The Walden Hammock comes in an easy to carry compression sack. Not only does the hammock fit easily within sack, but there's also room for straps and stakes. This is one piece of gear you won't struggle to get back in it's original packaging.

 

WHERE CAN WALDEN TAKE YOU?

RELAXATION WHEN YOU WANT IT, SHELTER WHEN YOU NEED IT.

 

FAQs

Can I use my own hiking poles?

Yup.  Most standard poles will work just fine! 

Will you be offering more colors? 

Yes, more colors will be coming soon! Check out our stretch goals for more information.(coming soon!)

If I already have my own hammock straps, will they work? 

Yup. Most standard straps should work just fine! 

What are the dimensions of the hammock?

10'x6'

How much does it weigh?

The hammock and compression sack is 32.2 oz 

The Hammock, compression sack and stakes is 35.3 oz 

 The Hammock, compression sack, stakes and straps is 44.9 oz 

The Hammock, compression sack, stakes, straps and poles is 62.9 oz

Will you be offering a two person hammock? 

Yes! We have the prototype in the works! 

What material are the stakes?

T6 aluminum

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Risks and challenges

The prototype is finished! We've submitted the patent. Our designs are complete, our materials are spec'd, and we've partnered with an industry leading manufacturer. Once funded we'll submit an order with our manufacturer and get shipping underway!

As with any new project, we understand that there can be unforeseen and unique challenges. We pledge to keep open communication if any issues arise.

 

 Shipping will be charged after the campaign in the post-campaign survey. 

 Shipping charges above are estimates, final shipping charges will appear on the post-campaign survey and may vary slightly from these estimates. 

 US estimates apply to the lower 48 contiguous states only. 

Alaska/Hawaii shipping is charged at the "Rest of World" level. 

 "Rest of world" prices are an estimated range.

story:
Short Summary

Being a storm chaser,my lifes passion is to go where the weather is bad.Always going where "ones" gut feeling tells not to go.And pinaccle of every storm chaser is to go to USA.Having oportunity to photograph supercells and violent tornadoes is my lifes passion.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • for my trip to USA i will need roughly 5000USD.airplane ticket and logistic on the field are the fields where will the money be spent.I plan to be in a chase for 2 weeks minimum.
  • If the goal of total 5000 USD is not met i will hawe to cancel the expedition due to lack of financing and the money will be returned.

The Impact

  • I plan to use this opportunity to make great footage of storm systems.Photograping the most intense situations and then go with media exposure as well with photo exhibition.

Risks & Challenges

Being a storm chaser my succes is dependent on nature.I will do my best to track down severe weather but there is also risk of not geting the right kind of footage.

story:
Nomadi

Introducing Nomadi, the world’s first mobile charging journal. We have worked very hard and went through countless iterations of designs to arrive at what we consider the perfect combination of traditional and contemporary aesthetics.


        


Our Journal is designed for those with the traveler's soul — for those who embrace the elegance in being bold and adventurous. We chose the design to reflect the fabrics of the local Nomadic tribes in our region. They are known for their endurance, hospitality, love of music, dance, and travel.



100 sheets of paper to record your meetings, ideas, and adventures, a sleeve and four cards slots to help you carry your important cards and documents with you. The battery was designed to fit perfectly between the papers providing your phone or camera with up to 300% of its charging capacity. What more can one need in a travel companion?



The Limited Edition Nomadi features 176 dated pages for the upcoming 2016 calendar year. The daily pages also have Arabic dates in consideration for the regional market.


Features

  • Four card slots
  • Passport holder / side pocket
  • Pen loop
  • A5 Filofax
  • 100 blank pages ( 2016 diary exclusively for Limited Edition Nomadi)
  • 3-in-1 charging cable
  • 8,000 mAh powerbank (One-Year Warranty)





Tech Specs



Why do we need your support?

Other than the tooling and materials needed for us to start our campaign and the costs of setting up our logistics network, we truly feel that more can be done to help the millions of refugees around the world. So, we have chosen to give our support to the U.N refugee relief efforts by donating a good percentage of our sales to help with this crisis around the globe. Our philosophy is that for each powerbank you order, you are helping others who need power even more. 



Millions of families have been dislocated from their homes by war around the world, People just like us, but who have lost everything... family, friends, careers, homes, and years and years of hard work, all gone in circumstances that they had no hand in. 

Now we see the children of doctors, engineers, teachers, and businessmen starving in the streets and camps, while their parents are working 18 hours a day for less than minimum wage.



This needs to change. They need us especially in the coming winter, where a blanket and a heat source can mean the difference between living and dying to them. Civil war can happen anywhere and at anytime and it is our duty to stand by the side of our fellow humans.




Meet The Team

  

                 

                                

 Danny Nacional - Art Director / Product Specifications. 

Danny has over 25 years under his belt as an artist and a product developer. 

When Danny isn't designing, he's playing basketball. He has a three foot vertical. Fine, it's more like three inches. 

                                 


 Katrina Tabora - Logistics & Finance Manager

Katrina has over 7 years of experience in her field, she also loves Greece with an intense passion. Greek salads. My Big Fat Greek Wedding. Olive Oil. Hercules. Hercules' muscles. 


                     

           

Nabeel Arshad - Digital Marketing Manager

Nabeel is a globetrotter. With 6 years of Digital  marketing... by day, by night he is a Professional magician.


         

 Said Eldajani- Founder/ Creative Director 

Said is a designer and travelling entrepreneur with 8 years of working experience. He is an omnivore who recently warmed up to the Twilight trilogy.



  Zed Karkar - Campaign Director / PR

Zed has over 9 years experience in PR and Project management.

He also has  backed more than a dozen crowdfunding campaigns, investing upwards of $3000. Worst case scenario, he's got our backs. 




Risks & Challenges

We have been in the game of manufacturing and designing for over eight years, with a combined experience of over 40 years in the field. We are very confident of our ability to deliver this product to you.

Our main concern is receiving the bare minimum funds we need to start the manufacturing process, and to provide everyone with as low a cost as possible without compromising our quality standards.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please, get the word out, and make some noise about this campaign! let's raise those funds, unlock some stretch goals, and provide more refugees with the care they need.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tool for an easy and simple share on your page, or just copy the URL above and send it to your friends and family.


Thank YouWe are very proud of the international community and we have never felt as touched as we do today by all the humanitarian souls out there. To all of you who are giving what you can to help out other people during the turbulent time that we live in, from the deepest stretch of our hearts, thank you for making us believe again.  


Love,

The Nomadi team.

story:
LED Illuminated building blocks

LED blocks, visualize a classic block with the latest technology to bring a new dimension to building and unleashing your imagination (for young and old), fully integrates with your current collection.

About this project

LED blocks are fully compatible with your current building blocks, the same form factor of the standard 2x4 blocks. This is an evolution of the classic family favorite to bring a new dimension to your designs/play and no need to replace your current blocks, just add then in (no wires), imagine your  creation can also become a night light. Don't limit yourself.

Blocks are illuminated from within by LED's, a single block has an input from an external battery and all subsequent blocks are powered/illuminated automatically when they are added onto any other block that is already lit up (on top or below, no wires between blocks).

Just like normal blocks, LED blocks are transportable and kid safe (they can take a few good knocks as well), no need for replacing tiny batteries per block.

Simply recharge the main battery pack (the battery pack lasts a really long time as LED's are low power users).

This is a fun anytime activity and teaching your child about colour's /electricity, and it’s also just really cool as well.

Early Bird special consists of the following:

  • 15 x normal (4x2 size) LED illuminated blocks (either BLUE, RED, GREEN, YELLOW, Transparent)
  • 1 x normal (4x2 size) LED Illuminated input block (Random Colour’s)
  • 1 x lead to connect input block with battery pack (Random Colour’s)
  • 1 x battery case (Random Colour’s)
Each block is the same form factor as the classic 4x2 size and made from a similar type of plastic, the main difference is that it is semi-transparent & diffused and illuminated from within (but no battery in the blocks).
So it’s safe to mix it up with all your other blocks

How does it work?
Imagine if your flash light fell in love with your classic building blocks. 
Each block is lit up from within, with its own LED with a low Volt direct current (big words I know).
In a nutshell its very safe, and each block relays the current to the next, and so on, with only a single block requiring to be connected to the battery pack (no need to break up your creations at night any more, just switch it on).

How it started
Most kids love playing with building blocks and their parents get involved initially to show them the ropes.  There used to be a bit of tension between my child and I, as I used the bulk of the blocks for my own buildings. 
I thought it would be an interesting idea if the blocks could light up and also be very safe (kids get up to the strangest things). 
I made a prototype and it was an immediate hit. I had to carefully explain that one cannot go to bed with all the blocks and lights-on under the duvet, after a few arguments I was able to safely retrieve the prototypes.

Risks & Challenges

The hardest challenge is reaching our goal, due to complexity and the multiple tiny parts the tooling/manufacturing requirement needs a large volume of blocks to be made.   

Colour consistency in multiple production runs is a identified concern and there will be a large focus to ensure nothing like this happens. We don’t want you to get blue if your blues aren’t all similar.

story:
Peter wants to schedule a business dinner with Marcos, who is vegan, but which restaurant could he take his future partner? Marcos wants to go out with Ana, who loves Chinese food, but how to find a place with options for both? Ana thinks to gather her family, but she doesn’t know what to cook for William, her vegetarian cousin. William just thinks about his Euro trip, but doesn’t know how to keep on his diet.

This little story could seem a little far from your reality, but It could be common for a increasing number of vegetarians and vegans around the world and also for their families and friends.

The solution allow users to find and share the best gastronomic options in restaurants, bars and coffee shops, even if these places aren’t vegetarian, what encourage the offer of this kind of option and decrease the distance between vegetarians and non-vegetarians.

The idea of focusing on dishes and not in establishments came from the experiences of Filipe Braga, vegan, cofounder and creator of the project, in find places to eat during his trips. He explains that had many great experiences in restaurants and places that not spread these alternatives for potential consumers. “I believe that the service will have a great utility, not only for vegetarian people, but also for those who have friends, relatives or a partner under a diet without meat or cruelty free.

 

Check out the App previews at our Gallery.

 

After a few months of work, we believe that we have reached a solid basement of the launching version of VegIt App. With all the concepts, design and prototyping steps set we need to start developing the app for Android and iOS.

To become real and worldwide, we are crowd funding U$10.000,00 to finish the development, if we reach U$ 14,000.00, the VegIt will also be made for web, with a bunch of features like: lists, friends and places to go (trip itinerary).

 

Cofounders: Yuri Coppe | Fill Braga | Aurélio Arantes

If you can’t contribute, but believes on our idea, there are a few ways to help:

- Get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.

- Share the project.

- Visit our landing page.

story:
Welcome! We are 3 Cajuns from Lafayette, Louisiana and we invented the TAngler! An amazing device that allows you to fish without ever having to tie a knot! Fishing is one of the greatest outings a family or group of friends can enjoy. We put the technology away, get some sun, and talk to the people we love face to face. As great as that sounds, there are some people who miss out on this experience.

Let’s face it, for any recreational fisherman or fisherwoman, tying knots to attach fishing tackle to a fishing line can be time consuming. Not to mention, when you’re finally ready to cast your line in the water, your knot slips loose as soon as you hook that big fish (tree). What about our grandparents with arthritis,  people with poor eyesight, shaky hands from rough waters, and what if the kids could tie their own knots?!...I think you get the picture…

After several rounds of trial and error, we now have the Patent Pending TAngler. (We named our invention the TAngler because "isn't a knot just a fancy Tangle?")  The TAngler couldn't be simpler to use... Just Feed. Spin, Snap.


The FRESH TAngler

The SALTY TAngler

story:
The DURAN battery-heated base layer shirt is a great option for people who want to stay warm without wearing bulky layers. This revolutionary garment provides ultimate lightweight warmth that lasts for hours with weaved in heating tubular material that is made with the latest micro heating technology and the high-tech rechargeable battery.  

Unlike other traditional electric clothing, DURAN is designed to provide INSTANT heat that is evenly distributed across your body, leaving no “cold spots”. 

It is comfortable, stylish, machine washable, packed down incredibly small, and great for travel, backpacking, hiking and more! 

The DURAN battery-heated undershirt utilizes innovative warming technology that is designed to be worn next to the skin, maintaining a warm and comfortable core body temperature even in cold weather. It fits snugly, offers excellent mobility, provides warmth throughout the day and is suitable for a wide range of sports and activities.


 

The powerful DURAN heating system includes 5 inherent heating zones, strategically located to bring heat to the neck, back, and even the hands.  

- 1 x Back heater

- 2 x Chest heater

- 2 x Cuff heater


Unlike other traditional electric clothes with built-in heating panels that are bulky, inflexible and uncomfortable to wear, the high-performance carbon fiber in the DURAN is weaved inwith other fibers that is undetectable by sight or touch, to offer clear advantages over traditional employed materials you find in other heated clothing.  

Less bulky

Better heat coverage

Better temperature control

More flexible and comfortable

 

HOW TO USE:

 Plug-In – Connect the power bank to the plug which is installed in the pocket.

 Turn On – Press and hold button control on the chest for 3 seconds and the button will flash red.

 Modify Temperature – Press the button again to change between different heating levels.

DURAN reaches 30°c (85°f) in just 60 seconds, providing instant warmth in any weather conditions. 

Control the temperature settings on your shirt with the touch of a button and choose from high, medium or low heat depending on how cold it is outside. The button changes in color and vibration modes to indicate the heating level after being pressed:

HIGH:  105~115°F (40~46°C)         2.5 hrs           Red            3 short vibrations

MED:   95~105°F (35~40°C)          3.5 hrs          White         2 short vibrations

LOW:   85~95°F (29~35°C)               7 hrs           Blue           1 short vibration

The temperature of the heating zones on the core body and the hands can be adjusted separately by pressing on the two buttons on the chest.  

Each DURAN base layer shirt comes with three quick charging High Density Li-Polymer 2600mAh Rechargeable Batteries that can be fully recharged in just 1 hour. When fully charged, it provides enough heat to get you through the entire day in the cold. The battery is ultra-sleek and lightweight and the battery wire that runs to the heating panels is thin and almost unnoticeable.

Note: The included batteries are only compatible with DURAN. They shall not be used for other purposes like charging your cell phone. All three batteries are needed for DURAN to work properly. 


 

Thanks to the use of durable fabrics and carbon fiber heating elements, your DURAN shirt is safe in  washer and an ordinary mild detergent. 

Note: Please always make sure to remove the power bank from the pocket before washing your DURAN and keep in mind that it should not be wrung, ironed or thrown into a drier. 


 

DURAN is water resistant, soft, durable and looks great. It is breathable while trapping the heat inside.

In addition, the material is specially treated to be antibacterial and anti-static, making DURAN ideal for extended wear during outdoor activities, keeping you warm and hygienic. 

 

 

DURAN is incredibly lightweight and packable. That means you can just roll it and pack it in your bag for a trip in freezing places or so you’re prepared for unexpected weather on vacations and holidays.

 

 

In addition to its superior heat functionality, DURAN has sleek and attractive design elements.

 

Material: 48% cotton, 48% polyester DWR fabric and 4% carbon fiber 

5 x heating zones (upper back, chest, cuff)

3 x 2600 mAh Li-ion polymer batteries

Heating time up to 7 hours

3 adjustable temperature levels, from 85~115ºF (29~46ºC)

 

 

 

Production of Duran Base Layer

Designer Draft

We have dedicated our resources for developing carbon fiber related product as long ago as 1996, and we have manufactured the world’s first carbon fiber heating clothes in 1999. We pride ourselves on working with some world class customers, including HITACHI, Milwaukee, DeWalt and etc. With our technical advantage in heating materials and thousands of customer feedback, we created our own brand, DURAN, the latest outcome of our research and development. It is an upgraded version of our former product with faster, longer and more effective heating performance.

They shall not be used for other purposes like charging your cell phone. All three batteries are needed for DURAN to work properly.  Thanks to the use of durable fabrics and carbon fiber heating elements, your DURAN shirt is safe in  washer and an ordinary mild detergent. Note: Please always make sure to remove the power bank from the pocket before washing your DURAN and keep in mind that it should not be wrung, ironed or thrown into a drier.  DURAN is water resistant, soft, durable and looks great. It is breathable while trapping the heat inside.In addition, the material is specially treated to be antibacterial and anti-static, making DURAN ideal for extended wear during outdoor activities, keeping you warm and hygienic.   DURAN is incredibly lightweight and packable. That means you can just roll it and pack it in your bag for a trip in freezing places or so you’re prepared for unexpected weather on vacations and holidays.  In addition to its superior heat functionality, DURAN has sleek and attractive design elements. Material: 48% cotton, 48% polyester DWR fabric and 4% carbon fiber 5 x heating zones (upper back, chest, cuff)3 x 2600 mAh Li-ion polymer batteriesHeating time up to 7 hours3 adjustable temperature levels, from 85~115ºF (29~46ºC)

 

 

 
Production of Duran Base LayerDesigner DraftWe have dedicated our resources for developing carbon fiber related product as long ago as 1996, and we have manufactured the world’s first carbon fiber heating clothes in 1999. We pride ourselves on working with some world class customers, including HITACHI, Milwaukee, DeWalt and etc. With our technical advantage in heating materials and thousands of customer feedback, we created our own brand, DURAN, the latest outcome of our research and development. It is an upgraded version of our former product with faster, longer and more effective heating performance.

story:
Enjoy the most convenient fishing tent ever.

By one simple lift up, you can set up the whole tent easily. The tent is made of oxford with PU coating, wind and water resistance. Instant automatical folding aluminum pole and one key lock-up design are really fascinating, with all other creative details, it takes the best experiment to you.

 

 

 

The Point Is

My folks are a branch of huge outdoor fans, we are designers, engineers, liberal artists etc..and we love creative stuff. We use to design and make a lot of interesting stuff for our own use such as outdoor equipments, furnitures, decorating our own places, and everything else that we could handle. 

It's the first time we try to share on indiegogo, we would love to have moooore people enjoy our work, that we lowest the prices and minimized our profit. 

The ones in the pictures and video are samples. We only have one color so far, If the crowd-funding would reach our target, we will definitely bring out more others. 

If you read all this which means you are interested in our product, I really appreciate it, and thank you sincerely.

story:
The concept:

I have bought many bags in my life that were either minimal and professional or military bags that accompanied me in my wildest trips. Then, I turned to multifunctional bags, which were indeed ‘multi’ yet not always ‘functional’. What makes Elveden Hunter unique is not only its ability to be both uni and multi - functional, but also the efficiency of transforming from one use to the other. 

On one hand, Elveden Hunter’s design incorporates a combination of colours and materials that make it a professional yet stylish work bag, while its smallest version can carry your daily essentials. On the other hand, Elveden Hunter is thoroughly constructed to its smallest detail to fulfil your needs in any long or short term trip, with buckles, straps and D-rings that won’t let you down and boost its functionality. 

However, the most amazing feature of Elveden Hunter is that it can easily alter its function, as the straps will reconstruct it from a 5l to 32l bag in seconds, giving you every centimetre you need and its incorporated details are beneficial even on a day to work. Elveden is the right bag for you if you are a busy professional, an expert adventurer, or both!

What We Need & What You Get

We will give you a full Elveden experience!

  • We are starting our production after being successfully funded on Kickstarter
  • As all our backers, you'll get a full Hunter experience, receiving, included in the price, all our accessories like the net mesh helmet holder, the dry sack and the utility/camera/lunch bag!
  • Deliveries are estimated for September 2018

The Impact

Why Hunter is the backpack you need:

  • Elveden is an original concept for those people who fulfil their lives with daily adventures.
  • You might be a crazy workaholic or a tireless traveler. You'll always find Hunter the first companion to take with you
  • Made of a life-proof waxed canvas, sturdy and soft to touch. We used the best hardware as well to give you a perfect quality, day by day. Just bear in mind, we created Hunter for ourselves first of all, and for this reason, it had to be amazingly builded.

story:
Dear Contributors,


Thanks so very much for your support and making donations.  Unfortunately we did not make our goal on Indiegogo, but we got interest by investors (versus donators) and other potential partners... and international people that also want to buy our product. 


We are passionate about pets and helping people keep them safe.  We will move forward.


Please sign up for our mailing list at gibitechnologies.com to keep posted on our status.


Many thanks and Happy New Year!

Synette

Founder

Gibi Technologies Inc.

story:
Risks & Challenges:

  • Production Run – We have gained an incredible amount of traction in our first Kickstarter campaign in May! Over 250 backers, 15+ countries and much useful feedback validated our product. We need your help to raise enough money to fulfill our first run of backpacks.

    Customization – We have teamed up with a local stitchery and textile facility that will help us produce the “U-Design” concept, custom SkateCro grip and much more. With your funds, we can establish an exclusive relationship with their facility. Our lead times will continue to be shortened with your help.

    Licensing – Our new concepts are a great opportunity for licensing. Imagine your favorite college, professional or local high school / little league team’s color on your back. Imagine the ability to change the design of your backpack anytime without having to buy a new backpack! With your support, we can gain the licensing agreements and prove our viability in the sport’s enthusiasts market.

    Graphic Content – We have partnered up with NPI Productions, a local videography company that will provide us with monthly, updated videos and photos. This will help Unitty create a brand that customers world-wide will be able to relate to.

    Trade Show – We are planning to attend Surf Expo 2017 in January in our hometown of Orlando, Fl. With your support, we can be amongst the top companies in the United States, exhibiting our product to buyers world-wide. This will give us an opportunity to get our backpacks in your local store!

  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

story:
OLD GAME, NEW TRICK FILLS IN ONE TICK: uses a magnetic one way flap (MFT) on the valve to fill in 1 SECOND! Also has a back valve that can be used for the traditional fill method as well. FILLS MULTIPLE WAYS! 

JUST DUNK AND FULL!

IT'S THAT QUICK, IT'S THAT EASY

 

 

WHERE/OPTIONS TO FILL IT

FILL IT ANYWHERE: a pool, a bucket, a crate, a cooler, a puddle of water, a toilet... wait a toilet? Maybe skip that last one. Anything that holds water becomes an Instant Reload Station! Just DUNK and FULL! 

DON'T HAVE ANYTHING TO DUNK IT IN?: It also has a water intake valve in the back of the unit that allows you to fill it the traditional way using a hose or faucet. Using the trigger, you can open and close the water intake valve for easy filling and water dumping after you are all done playing.

HOW IT WORKS?

Let's Simplify It: The mechanics of it is similar to a straw with a cup of water. When you close the end of the straw and lift it out of the cup, there's water captured in the straw. With the One Second Soaker, there's a magna-flap that closes securing the water inside. 

OMG WHAT???: That's Right! If you don't receive by December 25th 2018, we are offering a Money Back Guarantee. We don't think you should wait until next year. You ordered it this year... so get it this year. Or your money back. It's simple.   

 

THE PROCESS

Assembly Factory: We outsource manufacturing for all components and bring them all together into our own assembly factory. This is where we are able to closely monitor the entire manufacturing process to ensure quality and that deadlines are made. 

 

Development: We own the R&D Office located in Shenzhen, China. There we have prototyping partners that own a state of the art 3D Print Studio. Although our offices use our own 3D printing machines for parts and pieces, this partnership studio gives us the ability to 1. print larger models 2. print quickly 3. print different parts consecutively. We have engineers both in the US and in China that have worked together on the structural design and functionality of the soaker and our other projects.  

 

Tooling: The tooling set is completed for the OSS. This was a major hurdle and was the bottleneck of the entire creation process. If we surpass our expectations on this project, we can scale up more molds since the tedious process of modifications to each tooling has been finished. With our experience, we really believe that this is the reason why a lot of crowdfunding campaigns are unable to ship within their deadlines. This is a largely underestimated process. THE INITIAL TOOLING PROCESS TAKES 4-6 MONTHS TO COMPLETE IN OUR EXPERIENCE.

 

 

 

THANK YOU SO MUCH!

story:
With the all new Mountain Snow Goggle, alpine sports enthusiasts can enjoy a whole new dimension to optical presence. Matte Reflective, a revolutionary lens technology combines optical clarity, enhanced detail and an industry low hazing to our snow goggles, at entry level affordability. We are Mariener and just like many of our fellow crowdfunding veterans, our business started on an the attic and grew thanks to your help. Lets join us for a ride.

Seen on  

 

It took us over two years to bring this product from idea to an actual product. We've spend a lot of time getting the coating procedure right for larger surfaces after our first Kickstarter Project and to this date still no other competitor has gotten it right to deliver such a crisp and clear vision without sacrificing the Matte look.   

Now offering OTG (Over the Glasses Support)

The past week we have received a lot of questions regarding  compatibility with prescription glasses and we are excited to tell you  that our goggles are OTG compatible from this moment on! And if you  don't need it? No worries, you don't even notice it's there.

Our Matte Reflective Lens Technology combines the same physical capabilities as regular, reflective lenses, but now coupled with a unique coating technology that eliminates the mirror-like reflection on the outside, but without sacrificing the optical quality and visual  enhancement properties of the lenses. 

FULL PROTECTION AND OPTIMAL VISION THROUGHOUT THE DAY. 

EASILY CHANGE LENSES AND BE SURE THEY STAY ON NO MATTER WHAT

Our Bad Weather Lenses are made from an amber colored poly carbonate material. We've opted to go for an Amber lens because it its multi-functional in a way that it filters blue light for superior contrast, shadow definition and depth perception in different weather conditions. It even works in sunny weather, so don't get caught off guard with the bright sun like you would with yellow lenses.

ATTENTION TO DETAIL MAXIMIZES COMFORT AND PERFORMANCE 

Want to expand your pledge with extras? Simply choose and we will add your extras once we start shipping the goggle.

story:
We are Home Playa, Real Estate Solutions, located in Playa del Carmen, Mexico. We have been witnessing the growth of the area since 20 years and now we have some lots opportunities for sale in Aldea Zamá, Tulum, for construction business. 

We can offer a 30% ROI in 7 months to a year to the funder by giving the purchased land to a construction company. 

This is now your opportunity to participate in something big and experience a construction business without needing to invest large amounts and to see what is to build and do business on the mexican caribean. 

What is Tulum?

-Tulum exhibits the most breathtaking beaches of the Caribbean Sea.

-The traditional, Magic Village. The municipality has decided to restrain the facades on the businesses allowing for an authentic experience.

-The archeological area gives Tulum the mysticism and historical interest of the Mayan civilization.

-Tulum is inside of a protected area. It is in a natural reserve and protected jungle. Located in the hotel zone are luxurious cabins and other limited height buildings.

There are three reasons why Tulum is a builder’s paradise.

1. It is a tourist destination. Mexico is rated 8th in the world in tourism, Tulum is the number 1 destination for honeymooners. It's the favorite place for retirement for many US and Canadian citizens.

​​​​​​​     2. Booming demand. Supply cannot meet the demand. Most of the projects are sold before construction has even begun.

​​​​​​​     3. Great economical, legal and fiscal conditions. Mexican working hand, permits and taxes are favorable in the construction business. The Requirements are less restrictive than other countries.

Where is the lot?

Aldea Zama is the finest area in Tulum. It is a gated community and very sought after because it is as close to the beach as possible.

These eco-chic constructions merge the non-conventional with luxury, merging the past with the present in an organic yet modern design.

The growing commercial area nearby is designed to serve the needs of the locals and the tourists.

The master plan is to harness the mysticism and historical interest in the Mayan civilization coupled with a growing community with beautiful scenery to develop here.

Our business plan is as follows:

-Land is bought and planned with the local infrastructure. $140,000 (if you invest this amount the deed can remain in your name)

-Architectural executive project $30,000 (if you invest this amount we will offer you a 40% ROI)

-We receive our permits after the architectural plan is approved by the municipality. $50,000 (if you invest this amount we will offer you a 50% ROI)

-Sales are mostly done at this stage of pre-construction. But an amount of $80,000 will be used to start. (if you invest this amount we will offer you a 60% ROI)

-Construction takes place at the fast rate of one year.

-The profit  is expected to be up to 30% for a general type of investment

story:
The World's First Smart, Electric-Heated Sleeping Bag.

 We didn't hold back on any features.  This sleeping bag is the first of its kind and covers a wide temperature range that no other bag on the market can do.  This sleeping bag has all the hot features without the heavy price tags.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 WHAT IS THE BUNDL SLEEPING BAG?

Sleeping cold sucks.  We're Bundl and we’re passionate about getting outside and camping, but when it comes to sleeping under the stars, we and many friends have struggled staying warm at night.  So we created an electric-heated sleeping bag with smart sensor technology that you can power on and control with our BUNDL app.  Just set your desired temperature for each of the three heated sections, and the sensors in the bag will monitor and regulate the heat (just like a thermostat in your house).  Feel confident in any condition while camping that you’ll have a warm night’s sleep.  

Let’s face it, some of your longest, coldest, and worst night’s sleep were spent camping. The BUNDL sleeping bag is the first of its kind, bringing instant warmth while you're out in nature roughing it.

 What Makes the BUNDL Sleeping Bag Different? 

For the last 18 months, the BUNDL team has researched the market, tested products, and asked campers what would make their camping sleep-experience better. We've developed amazing features so that you have the best sleeping bag possible. Check out our features below and see for yourself.  

 

The BUNDL BAG incorporates a unique heating solution. Instead of using copper wiring, BUNDL implements a patented carbon heating material that is light-weight, waterproof, comfortable, and seamlessly integrated. This paper-thin heated fabric consumes less energy than your typical copper wire solutions. 

 

 

 

The BUNDL sensors monitor temperature throughout the night to regulate your preferred heat settings. The sensors prevent overheating and extend battery life.  Like our heating elements, the sensors are extremely small—you won’t even notice them.

The BlueTooth sensors and mobile app connect up to 50 yards away. So while you are still at the campfire, you can heat up your bag even before you call it a night. 

 

The BUNDL app allows you to customize your sleep experience. Turn on your sleeping bag across the campsite, control the temperature of your bag, turn the 3 different heated panels off and on, and adjust all 3 panels to your preferred temperature:

So if your feet are freezing while you sleep but the rest of your body is just fine, simply turn up the heat for the FOOT Box and turn off the panels for the HOOD and MID sections.

 

 

The BUNDL app also allows you to view your stats—so you're never left wondering how much battery life you have left,  how long the battery will last based on the outdoor temperature, or what temperatures you experienced the previous night.

Forgot your phone or camping without one? See section below.  

The BUNDL button allows you to turn on your sleeping bag without the app. Some campers love to truly disconnect and leave their phones behind, and that's why we added a power button. This button has 4 different temperature settings just in case you don’t have your phone to adjust the settings manually. 

By initially pressing the power button for 2-3 seconds, you turn on the heating panels at 100% power output. If you press the button again, the output drops to 75%. Press again, and the power output drops to 50%. Press one more time and the power output drops to 25%. Hold the button down for 2-3 seconds to turn off. 

 

 

 

 

The power button is encapsulated in rubber which makes it completely waterproof, and it's strategically placed so it doesn't cause any discomfort.

*Stuff Sack included* All the components that make up the BUNDL Electric Heated Sleeping Bag compress down to the size of your water bottle.

The BUNDL BATTERY is portable yet powerful. It has enough energy to keep you warm for multiple nights, charge your phone, and give you peace of mind while you camp. Charge your battery before you pack, as you drive, or even with our solar option.  

Battery Features 

  • Duration lasts at least four nights (depending on the outdoor temperature).
  • Multifunctional Powerbank lets you charge almost any device.
  • Small volume, large capacity up to 30,000mAh, maximum output of 78W.
  • Ability to power MacBook for 15 hours and charge the iPhone XS eight times.
  • Stylish and slim aluminum-body ensures good heat dissipation and protection.
  • Security protection design: short-circuit and over-current protection. 
  • Device automatically shuts down if a short circuit or overload output occurs.
  • Lithium Polymer Battery Cells are more stable and safer than Lithium Ion batteries.   

BATTERY SPECIFICATIONS

  • Lithium polymer battery 3S1P
  • 30,000mAh/111Wh
  • Input: DC 16-24V/2A, Type C 5 - 20V/3A 60W Max
  •  Output: Type C 5-20V/3A 60W Max 
    • DC 5.5*2.5 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 16V/3A, 20V/3A 60W Max
    • USB-A1 5V/2.4A
    • USB-A2 5-6V/3A, 6-9V/2A, 9-12V/1.5A
    • 2 USB-A output 18W Max
    •  Total Output 78W 

 

 

 

 

The BUNDL design gives your feet and arms the freedom and space needed for maximum comfort. With the double zipper design, you can open up the foot box while you are sleeping to cool down or open it up to walk around. The unique arm holes give you full mobility outside without sacrificing warmth. 

The BUNDL media pouch allows you to store small miscellaneous items that you want close by (like your phone or flash light). With our stretch goal, we will even integrate a phone charger right in the pouch!

The BUNDL pillow pouch gives you the space to use your own inflatable pillow, or pack in some other form of padding (like a hoodie or tomorrow's clothes).  

BUNDL down is responsibly sourced.

"The Responsible Down Standard aims to ensure that down and feathers come from animals that have not been subjected to an unnecessary harm. It is our hope that the standard can be used to reward and influence the down and feather industry to incentivize practices that respect the humane treatment of ducks and geese. We believe that education is a meaningful way to drive demand for strong animal welfare practices. The standard also provides companies and consumers with a tool to know what is in their products, and to make accurate claims." 

https://responsibledown.org/

Beaumon and Dallin are lifelong friends. They met in elementary school on the same bus route, played high school and club sports together, and attended the same university in one of the top programs for entrepreneurship in the United States. During their university years, they mastered creating high-quality, problem-solving products and effectively bringing those solutions to the market. During their university experience, they both started different companies: Beaumon successfully started his very own sleeping bag and outdoor gear company, and Dallin started a battery and electronics company. During a class project, Beau and Dallin combined their unique skill sets and invented the world’s first electric-heated sleeping bag with smart sensor technology–the BUNDL SLEEPING BAG. 

We hope you love it as much as we do! BUNDL up—it's cold out there.
story_txt:
The World's First Smart, Electric-Heated Sleeping Bag. We didn't hold back on any features.  This sleeping bag is the first of its kind and covers a wide temperature range that no other bag on the market can do.  This sleeping bag has all the hot features without the heavy price tags.       WHAT IS THE BUNDL SLEEPING BAG?Sleeping cold sucks.  We're Bundl and we’re passionate about getting outside and camping, but when it comes to sleeping under the stars, we and many friends have struggled staying warm at night.  So we created an electric-heated sleeping bag with smart sensor technology that you can power on and control with our BUNDL app.  Just set your desired temperature for each of the three heated sections, and the sensors in the bag will monitor and regulate the heat (just like a thermostat in your house).  Feel confident in any condition while camping that you’ll have a warm night’s sleep.  Let’s face it, some of your longest, coldest, and worst night’s sleep were spent camping. The BUNDL sleeping bag is the first of its kind, bringing instant warmth while you're out in nature roughing it. What Makes the BUNDL Sleeping Bag Different? For the last 18 months, the BUNDL team has researched the market, tested products, and asked campers what would make their camping sleep-experience better. We've developed amazing features so that you have the best sleeping bag possible. Check out our features below and see for yourself.   The BUNDL BAG incorporates a unique heating solution. Instead of using copper wiring, BUNDL implements a patented carbon heating material that is light-weight, waterproof, comfortable, and seamlessly integrated. This paper-thin heated fabric consumes less energy than your typical copper wire solutions.    The BUNDL sensors monitor temperature throughout the night to regulate your preferred heat settings. The sensors prevent overheating and extend battery life.  Like our heating elements, the sensors are extremely small—you won’t even notice them.The BlueTooth sensors and mobile app connect up to 50 yards away. So while you are still at the campfire, you can heat up your bag even before you call it a night.  The BUNDL app allows you to customize your sleep experience. Turn on your sleeping bag across the campsite, control the temperature of your bag, turn the 3 different heated panels off and on, and adjust all 3 panels to your preferred temperature:So if your feet are freezing while you sleep but the rest of your body is just fine, simply turn up the heat for the FOOT Box and turn off the panels for the HOOD and MID sections.   The BUNDL app also allows you to view your stats—so you're never left wondering how much battery life you have left,  how long the battery will last based on the outdoor temperature, or what temperatures you experienced the previous night.Forgot your phone or camping without one? See section below.  The BUNDL button allows you to turn on your sleeping bag without the app. Some campers love to truly disconnect and leave their phones behind, and that's why we added a power button. This button has 4 different temperature settings just in case you don’t have your phone to adjust the settings manually. By initially pressing the power button for 2-3 seconds, you turn on the heating panels at 100% power output. If you press the button again, the output drops to 75%. Press again, and the power output drops to 50%. Press one more time and the power output drops to 25%. Hold the button down for 2-3 seconds to turn off.     The power button is encapsulated in rubber which makes it completely waterproof, and it's strategically placed so it doesn't cause any discomfort.*Stuff Sack included* All the components that make up the BUNDL Electric Heated Sleeping Bag compress down to the size of your water bottle.The BUNDL BATTERY is portable yet powerful. It has enough energy to keep you warm for multiple nights, charge your phone, and give you peace of mind while you camp. Charge your battery before you pack, as you drive, or even with our solar option.  Battery Features 
Duration lasts at least four nights (depending on the outdoor temperature).
Multifunctional Powerbank lets you charge almost any device.
Small volume, large capacity up to 30,000mAh, maximum output of 78W.
Ability to power MacBook for 15 hours and charge the iPhone XS eight times.
Stylish and slim aluminum-body ensures good heat dissipation and protection.
Security protection design: short-circuit and over-current protection. 
Device automatically shuts down if a short circuit or overload output occurs.
Lithium Polymer Battery Cells are more stable and safer than Lithium Ion batteries.   
BATTERY SPECIFICATIONS
Lithium polymer battery 3S1P
30,000mAh/111Wh
Input: DC 16-24V/2A, Type C 5 - 20V/3A 60W Max
 Output: Type C 5-20V/3A 60W Max 
DC 5.5*2.5 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 16V/3A, 20V/3A 60W Max
USB-A1 5V/2.4A
USB-A2 5-6V/3A, 6-9V/2A, 9-12V/1.5A
2 USB-A output 18W Max
 Total Output 78W 


 
   The BUNDL design gives your feet and arms the freedom and space needed for maximum comfort. With the double zipper design, you can open up the foot box while you are sleeping to cool down or open it up to walk around. The unique arm holes give you full mobility outside without sacrificing warmth. The BUNDL media pouch allows you to store small miscellaneous items that you want close by (like your phone or flash light). With our stretch goal, we will even integrate a phone charger right in the pouch!The BUNDL pillow pouch gives you the space to use your own inflatable pillow, or pack in some other form of padding (like a hoodie or tomorrow's clothes).  BUNDL down is responsibly sourced."The Responsible Down Standard aims to ensure that down and feathers come from animals that have not been subjected to an unnecessary harm. It is our hope that the standard can be used to reward and influence the down and feather industry to incentivize practices that respect the humane treatment of ducks and geese. We believe that education is a meaningful way to drive demand for strong animal welfare practices. The standard also provides companies and consumers with a tool to know what is in their products, and to make accurate claims." https://responsibledown.org/Beaumon and Dallin are lifelong friends. They met in elementary school on the same bus route, played high school and club sports together, and attended the same university in one of the top programs for entrepreneurship in the United States. During their university years, they mastered creating high-quality, problem-solving products and effectively bringing those solutions to the market. During their university experience, they both started different companies: Beaumon successfully started his very own sleeping bag and outdoor gear company, and Dallin started a battery and electronics company. During a class project, Beau and Dallin combined their unique skill sets and invented the world’s first electric-heated sleeping bag with smart sensor technology–the BUNDL SLEEPING BAG. We hope you love it as much as we do! BUNDL up—it's cold out there.

story:
What's This?

Support some ambitious young climbers hoping to go on an inspiring adventure to Western Greenland.

In summer 2013, a team of climbers from the Oxford University Mountaineering Club will partner with a team of sailors to put together an expedition to the regions of Uummannaq and Upernavik in West Greenland. The journey will involve sailing nearly 2500 nautical miles into well above the Arctic Circle. The climbing will aim for first ascents and adventurous new routes on Big Walls in one of the most recently opened and exciting climbing areas in the world.

Arctic Greenland is a uniquely beautiful environment which is particularly vulnerable to the deprecations of the modern world, we hope to offer an insight into this fragile wilderness. Climate change has caused rapid receding of the Arctic ice, and the recent discovery and exploration of oil reserves in Disko Bay and Uummannaq highlight the need for public awareness of this unique and pristine environment. We hope to create an exciting, inspiring story through a short film, blogs, articles and video diaries, so people can get to know West Greenland. Helping to preserve and protect this great wilderness is a major part of our endeavours and we hope to lead by example in promoting sustainable adventure. The expedition will be self contained waste wise and leave no trace of human passage. We intend to follow established local ethics by avoiding the placement of bolts wherever possible, thereby minimising our impact on the cliffs.

What We Need

Although there are a limited number of grants available to expeditions like this, we desperately need additional funding to make the venture affordable. That's where you come in.

Thanks to the enthusiasm of Clive Woodman and Angela Lilienthal, the major expense of the trip (the boat!) will be met. These are the remaining costs, totalling £15,000 for all seven of us.

  • Insurance - £3,000 -  this is the big one, and the unique nature of our expedition means this becomes very expensive. 
  • General boat-related expenses - £7,000 - this includes paper charts, boat insurance, mooring fees, living costs, satellite phone airtime, diesel, a new liferaft and unavoidable minor damage repair. This stuff doesn't come cheap unfortunately...
  • Equipment - £2,000 - this includes crucial warm and waterproof clothing, a portaledge, gun hire to deter polar bears from eating us (I kid you not - a legal requirement for expeditions in Greenland), spare ropes, freight costs, communications equipment and other sundry items
  • Flights - £3,000 - to Canada and back from Greenland.

We've set our target at £1,000 in the hope that this campaign will allow us to buy crucial insurance cover for the climbing part of the trip. Any funds over this amount will be used to insure the sailing part.

What you get

Apart from sharing the adventure and the challenge, we're offering a number of small rewards for your generosity:

  • For £5 or more, we'll send you a signed thank-you letter once we get back. Everything adds up, and we'll be more than happy to recognise your contribution.
  • For £25 or more, we'll send you a high-quality A4 signed print of one of the best photos we take on the expedition plus a thank-you letter.
  • For £50 or more, we'll take a photo of the team holding a message of your choice, dangling from a cliff, on the summit of a mountain or from the deck of the boat - you decide. We'll then send you a signed print of it, plus a thank-you letter and a copy of our film on DVD.
  • For £500 or more, you'll get all of the above, plus a different kind of reward. Traditionally, the first ascentionists of a route or unnamed mountain have the right to name it. We'll let you choose the name for a route that we make a first ascent of, to go down in the global records of the climbing community. There are a couple of constraints on this - no rude names for instance - so send us an email with your ideas before buying into this.
  • For £750 or more, you get the complete corporate sponsorship package - promotional material, tailored articles/gear reviews, videos, logo promotion, mentions in all blogs and articles, mention in the short film, etc.

Of course, any and all contributions are met with our heartfelt thanks.

The Team

Luckily, between us we have the necessary skills to pull this expedition off safely and hopefully climb some amazing things at the same time. 

  • Clive and Angela have a huge amount of ice sailing and mountaineering experience, having sailed in Svalbard, Antarctica and South Georgia as well as making mountaineering first ascents in Norway and Antarctica. Clive has logged over 80,000 nautical miles. Check their stories out at www.cosmic-dancer.com 
  • Tom and Ian have extensive Big Wall climbing experience. Last summer, along with Ian Cooper, they journeyed to a remote region of Kyrgyzstan and completed the first ascent of the 1000+m vertical rock route 'Dreaming Spires' over nearly a week of effort and the second free ascent of the 1400m vertical Ruyaev Route over a gruelling 10-day push that saw all kinds of hardships - check their story out at http://www.ukclimbing.com/articles/page.php?id=5145 
  • Jacob has a reputation for climbing really hard, really scary bits of rock and getting away with it. His athletic ability is matched only by his enthusiasm and his mental composure. He's climbed E8 and F8b and onsighted F8a.
  • Caroline has an enviable track record as both a sailor and climber, having gone on exploratory mountaineering trips to the Himalaya, Svalbard and Norway as well as sailing with the Navy Cadets. She also boasts of never getting sea-sick. Ever. She'll also be a fully-qualified doctor, which is handy.
  • Peter's long record of Alpine climbing will stand him in good stead on the Arctic granite, and his bold head for heights should be an asset to the entire team.

More information

  • Check out our Facebook page at www.facebook.com/westgreenlandexpedition 
  • Have a wander through our website at www.oxfordgreenlandexpedition.com, including some crazy tales from some of our previous adventures!

Tom and Ian have extensive Big Wall climbing experience. story:
The BMX Keychain

 

A scaled down version of an old school BMX seat clamp. Custom machined in the USA.

 

 

Nobody looked cooler than the kids at the skate park with their BMX bikes, pulling wheelies and somehow defying the laws of gravity. You saved up for months doing chores to get a bike of your own, just to be admitted as a part of the BMX family. Whether you were one of the kids with the skills to race or you just enjoyed the feel of the fresh air on your face as you sped down the block, Bicycle Motorcross was a cherished part of your youth.

 

Rising in popularity during the 1970s and 80s, the BMX bike became a symbol of freedom for youth both in the United States and around the world. As years passed, the tricks associated with Bicycle Motorcross became less of a hobby than a sport that involved dedicated skill, relentless practice, the possibility of severe dangers, yet so much opportunity. Stores filled up with BMX gear and professional teams competed to crowds of worshiping fans.                          

                                                                                                                                                                       

We may no longer have that treasured bike sitting in our garage waiting for our next adventure.  But a craftsman with a small one-person shop in Northern California has designed the ability to take those memories with us with his miniaturized replica of the Seat Post Clamp.

 

This seat post replica, made from aircraft grade aluminum can be carried with you every day as a keychain or left as a symbol of your childhood on your desk. It’s a practical, functional, and marvelous design that allows us to continue to let our childhood memories spark curiosity and adventure in our adult lives.

 

 

Room for two standard sized keys

 

Or attach it to your keychain

 

 

Initial prototyping

story:
Tired of lugging around a bag that doesn’t offer anything in return? The V-UDDY Air & Waterproof Charging Backpack is here to simplify your life.

✅I want a 100% air and waterproof backpack.
✅I want a backpack that can charge my device anytime, anywhere.
✅I want a backpack that can charge my laptop.
✅I want a backpack with a USB-C charging function.
✅I want a backpack that can be used both casually and formally.
✅I want a multi-functional backpack.
✅I want to prevent theft of my backpack.

 


V-UDDY is 100% air and waterproof making it the perfect bag for surfing snowboarding hiking and any other activity that might get a little wet. It's the perfect companion for the modern-day adventures.



All pockets have airtight zippers with the latest technology. In other words, even water and air cannot pass through this zipper.

 

This test was performed with a box cutter.  We have chosen materials that are very difficult to cut.  But we do not assure it.  Because there is no product that never breaks in this world. 

 


This backpack has a regular USB outlet as well as USB C outlet. The USB C PD system supports up to 100 watts. Not to mention the regular USB outlet is capable of Quick Charge(18W). You can easily charge your phone, anywhere, anytime. Charging your MacBook Pro is no problem as well.


 


Easily remove your computer when you work or at the airport security gate anytime, anywhere.


We added these two belts to keep the laptop secure even when running with a backpack.


V-UDDY has a large capacity of 10.567gal (40L)

 


We added slots to both straps of the backpack, where you can store your cards.

 


On the backside of V-UDDY you'll find a secret storage space which is perfect for storing valuables like passports or wallets. For the storage space for valuables, we increased the size as well as added two slots for better usage. 

 


Inside the side pocket you'll find a pocket specifically made for earphones.

 


V-UDDY has a special feature that allows it to latch onto the handle of suitcases and unlike conventional backpacks that use rubber that gets loose over time V-UDDY uses a fabric made for longevity.

 


V-UDDY’s front pocket is designed to be perfectly horizontal when slung from your left shoulder.

 

We’ve stored a wire lock in the right side pocket that allows you to lock the main latch and secured the V-UDDY to anything.


 

 


For a limited time only your purchase will come with the Buddy carry case which is perfect for a quick outing with your laptop that carry case comes with regular USB and USB C charging functions as well.

story:
The TurtleBack Flashlight - Super Ruggedized Illumination

Quite possibly the toughest flashlight in the world!




Its when times get tough, that The TurtleBack really shines!

 

DESIGN

How does The TurtleBack shrug off punishing conditions so easily?

Some might say it is all in the design. The TurtleBack uses a shock / load dissipating outer shell, which behaves similarly to a tuning fork. No matter how a tuning fork is struck, it always vibrates in the same manner. Using this principle, regardless of the direction the shock, the flashlight is able to dissipate it in the same controlled manner.

Features

  • Resistance to shock / vibration
  • Resistance to intrusion from sand, dust, rain, moisture
  • Crush resistance
  • Able to function in extreme temperatures and conditions
  • Ultra Bright LED
  • Long lasting Lithium batteries - available at most discount, dollar, and drug stores

 

 

Here is the TurtleBack getting backed over by a 45 ton crane

 

 

 

THE PLAN

We have developed and tested our final prototype and finalized production plans.

YOUR SUPPORT

 We truly cannot take it to the next level without your support!

We are looking for $10,000 for the following,

  • To create the molds for the plastic components
  • For equipment that will aid in assembly
  • For dies and print for packaging

story:
About me 

I am a film student Trying to get funds to make my dream possible of making a medium length ski movie. i have watched many myself for years and have an ambition on making a career out of it. And this is how i get started. 

And of course being a student i am very low on funds. what i did have has been spent on equipment. This fund will allow me to afford flights to get over there.

What I Need  

I will need £500. this will cover my travel and accommodation. I will be staying in a 1 bed apartment air bnb so costs will be as low as possible.  

What Its All About

I Hope to achieve this as i really feel i can bring a unique and creative twist to  traditional ski movie. 

Please share and speak to others about this project just to see how far word of mouth can carry an independent film makers idea

story:
Nature Lovers Montenegro is an NGO established with the aim to share our passion and love for nature and authentic adventures with the world. Our team is small but made of people with years of experience in organizing and conducting adventure and extreme expeditions, camps and rafting and kayak courses all around Europe and the world. For more than 10 years we are actively organizing individual and group excursions for people to get in touch with nature and feel as a part of it. Last year we created the first ever Kayak Festival in Montenegro – Kayak Fest Tara 2016. Also, 2 years in a row we've been a part of Balkan Rivers Tour action, the biggest movement for protection of free flowing rivers in Europe.

Whitewater kayak fest Tara was held for the first time in Montenegro last September, organized by Nature Lovers Montenegro in collab with Camp Grab. Main goal of the festival was to promote kayaking as an amazing sport, especially because Montenegro has so much to offer in that matter – there are few big rivers to paddle with over 15 sections of class 1-5 whitewater, rivers are wild and pristine, and for some of them days of free flow are going to end soon – dams are planned to be built and these are some of the last days to feel their immense power, strength and freedom - IF we don't accomplish to stop the damnation.

The problem with kayaking in Montenegro is that it is so hard to get support from sponsors, since there are just a few active kayakers and kayak as a sport doesn’t get the attention it deserves, even though Montenegro is an amazing paradise for kayakers of all levels! However, our goal is clear – we want to show the world what a free flowing river is and to make this a true hotspot for kayakers worldwide, as well as to wake up our sleepy citizens. In order to do that we need your help! Every little bit helps, a small donation, such as what you would give for a coffee or a beer, would help us reach our goal!

In order to accomplish this goal, right now we will need 3500$. The funds will be invested in building a ramp for the race part of the Fest, purchasing and installing equipment for the race, services of recording and video production, river safety and time tracking services.

The first edition of Kayak festival was a blast! About 50 kayakers from all over the world (Montenegro, Croatia, Slovenia, Serbia, Greece, Russia, Ukraine, Germany, Ireland etc.) were paddling for four days, taking part in different kinds of races – from slalom to down river and boater cross. The race was open to kayakers of all levels, from beginner to advanced level. Beside the kayakers, around 300 people from Montenegro and the region attended the fest just to enjoy watching the race and dance on the parties.

Kayak fest vol. 2 will take place from September 22-25. Ticket price for all days of the festival is 50 euros and includes accommodation in tents, full board and festival ticket.

 Kayak fest has something for everyone – if you're not a kayaker, you can enjoy themed parties, music on the beach, cheer the kayakers while drinking ice cold beer and enjoying warm mountain sun, take photographs of the impressive nature, write blogs in hammocks above the river, go hike nearby hills or even go rafting. Opportunities are numerous!

If you can't make a donation, we kindly ask you to get the word out and make some noise by sharing this post on you social media, as well as on your other channels. It will mean a lot to us!

story:
At first I want to let you know if I don't get de 1000$ you will get your money back.

Info:

Hello, I'm a young, 15 years old, dutch entrepeneur with continuous new ideas wich I don't have money for. That's why I came here to ask for your help and let you enjoy of the beautifull Costa de la Luz (in the south of Spain, near Cádiz) where I've been living for 10 years now, one of the most beautifull places I've ever seen.

The Costa de la Luz includes small towns like Vejer de la Frontera (named the most beautifull town of Spain in 2014 by Tripadvisor), Conil de la Frontera, Zahora, El Palmar, Caños de Meca, Tarifa (popular Surf City) and others. 

My idea is to make aerial photos and videos of this towns and it's miles long beautifull coasts with a drone to have the best quality for a normal price. You can find it here: http://www.dji.com/product/phantom-2-vision .It would be awesome if you could help me.

Vejer de la Frontera

Conil de la Frontera

The beach of Zahora

Summer in the fields of Vejer

Sunset at Vejer

Camells on the beach of Conil

What do I need?

Well, for this project I need two things:

A DJI Phantom 2 Vision drone ( Cost: 900$ )

Indiegogo's costs (Cost: 100$)

What do you receive?

The perks are:

1$: You will receive 1 digital HD photo.

5$: You will receive 5 digital HD photos.

10$: You will receive 10 digital HD photos.

50$: You will receive all of the digital HD photos and all of the videos.

100$: You will receive all from above and 1 postal card.

Social media

Please help me by sharing this project on Facebook, Twitter, etc. with all of your friends and family and people you know so more people can help me.

story:
The World's First Smart Pouch

For Watersports.

 

Simply put your smartphone in Button Pouch, you can take amazing underwater photos in an affordable way!

ENCOURAGED BY YOU

In 2015, you helped us launch a revolutionary NFC Button called AIR BUTTON. We designed it to be the last button you would ever need for your mobile phone and your support encouraged us to create another revolutionary product.

 

WHAT IS BUTTON POUCH?

Button Pouch is the world’s first ever Smart Pouch for Diving and underwater sports. With advanced NFC-based Air Button technology, it allows a smartphone to be controlled by smart buttons underwater for up to 50 meters for 1 hour to fulfill your needs, such as taking photos, taking videos, selfies, video selfies or calling for emergency help. Button Pouch is powerful and travel-friendly. Best of all, it is the most affordable solution for your adventures making it a game-changer to replace expensive cameras such as the GoPro and other action cameras, standalone tough cameras and heavy housings.

 

WHAT MAKES BUTTON POUCH SO SPECIAL?

 

With Air Button Technology, you could control your smartphone in underwater with these two Buttons, Action Button and Switch Button!

 

Companion APP available in Google Play Store 

 

MORE AMAZING FEATURES

 

If you are a diving lover, the PRO KIT is a must-buy item.  

It includes a PRO Strap and Button Protectors.

 

PRO STRAP

With the Patented PRO Strap, we solved the problem of losing devices. Simply attach the strap/clip to your BCD jacket to keep your phone right with you at all times. Simple! The clip provides exceptionally secure attachment and also offers quick release for those times that you want to snap photos and videos underwater.

 

BUTTON PROTECTOR

Our Button Protectors protect your physical buttons on your smartphone. Buttons like your Home Button or Power button may become pressed due to high pressure at deeper depths in the sea. Our button protectors prevent this from happening ensuring that you don’t accidentally turn off your phone or start a google search underwater.

 

 

     

    

 

DESIGN STORY  

 

   
 

 
   
   
   
   
 

 

SPREAD THE WORD

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/airbutton

Watch us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4bP1FZOydJhtV...

 

MEDIA KIT

For any other questions, contact us at info@air-button.com
