story:
Thank you for being an early adopter and backing Track & Shield’s Indiegogo campaign.

Unfortunately, we had some major technical issues during the first critical days of the launch, making it necessary to pull back, stop the campaign, and regroup.

We are refunding your backer contribution in good faith. During this break, we are continuing to incorporate improvements to ensure an even better way to stay connected and protected. Stay tuned as we will contact you once we’re ready
to relaunch this life-changing product. 

We appreciate your trust and support, and invite you to follow our exciting innovations at Cabeau.com.

 

Track anything that moves or hike off-grid, with true GPS accuracy from always-on  bunker-busting narrowband connection that lets you send messages, even where there’s no signal. Operates on a unique narrowband data plan completely different from cellular data. Pause or cancel anytime - see specifics here. 

 

True GPS for the most accurate location and tracking
available - within 10-feet of precision

 

Send and received text messages well outside traditional cell
coverage - even on top of a mountain, or through concrete walls.

 

Know when, and where, your lock is tampered with or opened.

 

 

Locate - and communicate - no matter how far off the trail you go.

 

 

GPS provides the highest level of accuracy possible, no triangulation estimates.
Narrowband technology means coverage beyond line-of-sight cellular
transmission limits, up to 20x farther.

 

 

Bunker-busting narrowband technology pushes the reach of your communication to extreme limits - text from atop a mountain or deep inside a concrete cellar.
Monthly or annual narrowband data plan is easy to pause or cancel.

 

*Click here to see our data plan FAQs and details.

 

 

Track & Shield's military-grade narrowband technology provides for a stronger signal with significantly less interference than traditional cell transmissions. The low frequency is able to penetrate dense physical obstructions and is not limited to line-of-sight requirement necessary with higher/broadband frequencies.

 

 

Connect up to 10 devices and access a real-time map to know exactly where your friends are...split up with the confidence you can easily find them later.

 

 

Use the app to chat and share location with every group member in real-time, even without cell signal - stay connected at festivals, big cities, or on a mountain.

 

 

Get notified of the time and GPS coordinates whenever your lock
is tampered with or opened - even by the TSA.

 

 

 

Define customer perimeter safety zones with geofencing - know when
your teen leaves school or keep tabs on your purse or dogsitter.

 

 

 

 

Global communicator, remote access lock, one-button emergency alert or status notification with advanced narrowband technology for ultimate reliability.

 

 

 

Locate lost luggage, valuables, even your car in a large parking lot with this small, durable device that can be placed in, or attached to, just about anything.

 

1-month narrowband data plan included

$6.99/mo or $49.99/yr thereafter. Pause or cancel anytime via smart app.

Includes: 1 TRACK & SHIELD device + 1 month narrowband data plan.  Pause or cancel anytime. 

 

Includes: 2 TRACK & SHIELD devices  + 1 month narrowband data plan per device.  Pause or cancel anytime.

 

Includes: 3 TRACK & SHIELD devices  + 1 month narrowband data plan per device.  Pause or cancel anytime

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

When you pre-order today, you get:

 

 

 

 

 

Cabeau brings its heritage of superior craftsmanship and quality to T&S,
a product whose use and appeal far exceeds the confines of travel.
Learn more about production below:

 

 

Cabeau creates expertly crafted travel accessories designed by travelers for travelers. We are a young and innovative company committed to family values and philanthropy. With a group of exceptional sales, marketing, design, operations, and legal specialists, Cabeau’s success lies in its extraordinary team and collaborative approach.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We ship worldwide. See reward details for shipping costs. Prices exclude any local duties or sales tax.

 

We plan to ship the product mid/end of October 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary.

 

By backing now, we will give regular production updates and keep you in the
know with everything.

story:
WHY: To Bring Tech to The Aquatic World

Technology is everywhere, except when it comes to the sport of spearfishing. Spearfishing has been unchanged for the last 60 years with the standard becoming wooden sticks with rubber bands. With many sports enjoying technological advancements such as football (sticky gloves), golf (new club alloys), and swimming (reduced drag suits), it seemed that it was time for spearfishing to catchup. The MK1 was created to help bring the tech that surrounds us everyday into the aquatic environment. 

HOW: The MK1 Speargun.

Equipped with an accessory rail, the MK1 can be fitted with anything ranging from laser and lights to cameras and fish reels. With that being said, the ocean is a rough place and even rougher if your an electrical component. That's why the MK1 was build from 6000 series Aluminum with its minor plastic components being constructed from reinforced nylon.  With Stainless Steel Internal Components, lithium powered Accessory modules, and Steel Shaft, the MK1 hopes to provide an technological alternative to the standard wooden stick and rubber bands approach. Due to the MK1's design,  the spearfishermen now has superior line of sight and accuracy to fairly determine if a shoot is worth being takin and to successfully complete it if shot. 

WHERE WILL MY MONEY GO: To Manufacturing Machinery. 

To provide a superior speargun, the MK1 is almost entirely made from 6000 series Aluminum. This makes for a stiffer, stronger, and longer lasting speargun but creates a challenging when it comes to manufacturing. To Manufacture the MK1, CNC machines must be purchased to cut and mill out the items such as the shaft track, trigger body, and main body. Your support will go directly to the purchase of machinery such as CNC machines to continue to manufacture the MK1. 

OUR MISSION: To Preserve the Marine Environment & Exotic Woods

Conservation of the marine environment must be paramount in the development and production of the MK1. Unlike most sports, spearfishing directly relies on the proliferation of the marine environment and its conservation. With the development of the MK1, we hope to attract more spearfisherman to steer away from exotic wood spearguns and to help fight for the conservation and enjoyment of all marine environments. 

- PBR Spearguns

story:
About The Kit:

We're beyond excited to introduce the Modern-Day Caveman Survival Fishing Kit; the most reliable fishing kit in the market! No other survival fishing kit matches the durability, performance, and ease of use of the MDCM Survival Fishing Kit. Say goodbye to traditional "tin can" fishing kits built with cheap and fragile materials, and get yourself a piece of gear that will last a lifetime.

 

What We Need:

We need $5,000 to set up production of the survival fishing kit. The Modern-Day Caveman Survival Fishing Kit is all precision machined on a lathe, and setting up a small production line can be expensive. That is why we need your help to back our campaign and give us the last push we need to allow us to deliver this product to as many adventurers around the world as we can.

 

The design process was one of the most enjoyable parts of the whole project. We had three goals in mind from the beginning: simplicity, durability, and innovation. And if our prototype didn't meet all three, we started from the ground up. We made a new one until it was perfect.

Simplicity

Some say “more is better.” We have a different mindset at Modern-Day Caveman. When designing a product we see what's out there and ask ourselves, how can we make this simpler without compromising performance? We want everyone, from child to senior, beginner to expert, to have an enjoyable, hassle-free experience with our gear.

Durability

Selling survival equipment comes with significant responsibility; our customers trust their safety on our products, and we don’t take that lightly. For that reason, we use the best materials and manufacturing practices we can get our hands on. We do rigorous testing for worst-case scenarios and make sure our products will perform under any situation our future users might encounter. 

Innovation

We excel under pressure. We explore new waters because that's where real change comes from. We create new solutions to age-old problems, and the only way to do that successfully is to think differently.

 

Why Indiegogo?

We're true believers in the effectiveness of crowdfunding and are grateful for the opportunity to share our journey with our backers. We want to cultivate a strong relationship with every one of our customers and crowdfunding allows us to do just that! Once you back our campaign, we're all in the same boat. Our mission becomes yours; hopefully, we'll have a part in your adventures too.

       

Thank You!

We appreciate the time you took to look over our campaign; we would love to get our gear into your hands. Make sure to back us now and to share this project with your fellow adventurers!
story_txt:
About The Kit:
We're beyond excited to introduce the Modern-Day Caveman Survival Fishing Kit; the most reliable fishing kit in the market! No other survival fishing kit matches the durability, performance, and ease of use of the MDCM Survival Fishing Kit. Say goodbye to traditional "tin can" fishing kits built with cheap and fragile materials, and get yourself a piece of gear that will last a lifetime.
 


What We Need:
We need $5,000 to set up production of the survival fishing kit. The Modern-Day Caveman Survival Fishing Kit is all precision machined on a lathe, and setting up a small production line can be expensive. That is why we need your help to back our campaign and give us the last push we need to allow us to deliver this product to as many adventurers around the world as we can.

 
The design process was one of the most enjoyable parts of the whole project. We had three goals in mind from the beginning: simplicity, durability, and innovation. And if our prototype didn't meet all three, we started from the ground up. We made a new one until it was perfect.
Simplicity
Some say “more is better.” We have a different mindset at Modern-Day Caveman. When designing a product we see what's out there and ask ourselves, how can we make this simpler without compromising performance? We want everyone, from child to senior, beginner to expert, to have an enjoyable, hassle-free experience with our gear.
Durability
Selling survival equipment comes with significant responsibility; our customers trust their safety on our products, and we don’t take that lightly. For that reason, we use the best materials and manufacturing practices we can get our hands on. We do rigorous testing for worst-case scenarios and make sure our products will perform under any situation our future users might encounter. 
Innovation
We excel under pressure. We explore new waters because that's where real change comes from. We create new solutions to age-old problems, and the only way to do that successfully is to think differently.
 
Why Indiegogo?
We're true believers in the effectiveness of crowdfunding and are grateful for the opportunity to share our journey with our backers. We want to cultivate a strong relationship with every one of our customers and crowdfunding allows us to do just that! Once you back our campaign, we're all in the same boat. Our mission becomes yours; hopefully, we'll have a part in your adventures too.
       

Thank You!
We appreciate the time you took to look over our campaign; we would love to get our gear into your hands. Make sure to back us now and to share this project with your fellow adventurers!

story:
Story

As a designer who travels a lot for projects all over the world, traveling was always a necessity to my daily life. Some travels were further than others and always had my travel pillows (the ones you find at the terminal) with me to ensure that I had some form of pillow when I needed one.

However, I found that they often did not offer the support nor breathability to ensure I wasn’t having neck pains or transpiring and ended up more than once with a stiff neck and shoulder pains.

For these reasons exactly, I was set on finding a solution to these issues which arose by uncomfortable prolonged sitting.

The pillow had to fit and feel comfy for the large majority of people wearing it and offer enough support so that it would actually be a neck pillow instead of a flat round design that has been around for ages. It would offer enough support for my shoulders and the neck muscles on the side, back and front, (trapezius muscles, sternocleidomastoid muscles & longus colli/capitus muscles, thanks Google) to be able to relax. The pillow would also have to be able to allow for some form of air flowing through as waking up sweaty is the worst but at the same time keep your body snug and warm. And there had to be an adjustable strap to be able to allow adjusting the support you were going to be needing.

3        Negative Effects Due To Bad Posture On The Body And Mind

Studies have shown that a bad posture could cause a number of complications. Not often enough does it get to mention that it actually amplifies the issues which you may already have both physically as well as mentally.

1.            Back, Shoulder and Neck Pain

Perhaps the most important issues we wanted to target when designing the LeanOnMe travel pillow is targeting the issues around the back, shoulder, and neck. These are the most common issues from poor posture and may in time cause misalignment in the spine which will cause even more pain. Improper support while having a bad posture would lead to some of the joints having to bear a heavier load leads to pain and degradation of the tissue surrounding these particular joints.

"The forward pull of the weight of the head puts undue stress on the vertebrae of the lower neck, contributing to degenerative disc disease and other degenerative neck problems. Similarly, this posture causes the muscles of the upper back to continually overwork to counterbalance the pull of gravity on the forward head. This position is often accompanied by forward shoulders and a rounded upper back, which not only feeds into the neck problem but can also cause shoulder pain.

Source: Spine-Health.com"

 2.             Poor Breathing

 The only way for you to breathe “optimally” is when the diaphragm and rib cage are able to fully expand. This is true while seated but even more so when doing physical activity. We do not expect LeanOnMe to be used while doing your spinning classes or your morning run around the block, but when sitting for extensive periods of time, LeanOnMe will certainly contribute to retaining a proper posture.

"Shallow breathing limits the diaphragm’s range of motion. The lowest part of the lungs doesn’t get a full share of oxygenated air. That can make you feel short of breath and anxious. Deep abdominal breathing encourages full oxygen exchange — that is, the beneficial trade of incoming oxygen for outgoing carbon dioxide. Not surprisingly, it can slow the heartbeat and lower or stabilize blood pressure.

Source: Harvard Health"

3.              Amplify Depression, Stress & Tension Headaches

When you’re feeling down or having a bad day, something that really wouldn't help fix it is sitting in a bad position. Slouching actually constricts and compresses your body which forces your heart to pump harder in order to circulate blood and this will, in turn, decrease your energy level which, in turn, may make you start feeling tired, irritated and aggravated. Another side effect is tension headaches which have much in common with migraines but on a different level which are common among desk job employees.

“This study and the earlier findings that exercise by itself can significantly reduce depression suggest that energy levels and depression are modulated not only by cognitions but also by body posture and movements. Thus the mind-body relationship is a two-way street: mind to body and body to mind. We strongly recommend that therapists, teachers, and clients include body posture and movement as an additional healing strategy to increase energy and enhance health.

Source: San Francisco State University"

Lean On Me; not just comforting but contributing to your general health a pillow at a time.

 

      FULLFILLMENT

March 6th 2018 - end of campaign    

March 21st 2018 - we receive your funds from IndieGoGo 

March 22nd 2018 - start of Lean On Me production                        

May 6th 2018 - quality control and packaging

Date of shipment: to be announced (May)

*** Recently acquired our design patent *** Ref nr. : 201730305630.4

 

Risks & Challenges

Since we’ve been doing design for over 15 years and many of projects have come across among which have started in the exact same way. With the experience and a supplier on our side where we control everything from start to finish, we do not see any direct risks or challenges.

We are fully committed to do everything in our power to deliver your Lean on me in time and keep you informed about all further processes in regular campaign updates.

story:
Thanks for stopping by! We are excited to bring you HaamLock, the smarter bike lock. 

So, what is HaamLock exactly? 

HaamLock is a high tech bike lock 

  • Lock and unlock it with your cell phone 

  • Use it to find the safest spot to park your bike* 

  • Find your bike on a map if you forget where you left it 

  • Protect your bike with HaamLock’s sturdier mechanical design 

  • Easily notify your friends in the unfortunate event that your bike is stolen

  • Charge it via a mini USB port 

 * Currently only available in Chicago, we will add additional city bike theft data if we receive 50 backers or more in a given region 

And what do we need these funds for? 

Have you ever had to break into your own bike lock because you broke or lost your keys? Our dream is to take this product from prototype to the streets of  your city and allow cyclists all across the world to ditch their keys and embrace a simpler way to secure their bicycles. We have successfully built two working prototypes of our lock. We have also completed our iPhone app.

Our next step is to produce a first batch of the locks. This is where you come in, we need your help to: 

  • Take the product from prototype to street ready 

  • Cover material costs such as metal and electronic components 

  • Set up production and assembly at a local manufacturer 

  • Cover shipping and handling costs

 
Who are we? 

We are a group of Northwestern students who are tired of seeing bikes disappear from campus and watching bike owners saw off rusty old locks when they lose their keys. When we (Joppe Bijlsma, A.K. Singh, and Zeina Abou-Said) first arrived at the Kellogg School of Management last summer we became friends with Fabio, an international student from Brazil. He had just bought a brand new bike, but it was stolen within just a few hours of parking his bike on campus. Over a million bicycles like Fabio’s are stolen every year, yet bike locks have not changed much since their inception over 40 years ago. We thought there must be something we could do to solve this problem. We pitched the concept of HaamLock in a startup competition on campus in October and ranked among the top teams. Through the competition we were granted access into Northwestern’s innovative NUvention Web program, a class in which students build and launch a business or product. That’s where we met Shaker, Mengyuan and Patrick - the rest of the HaamLock team. We then pitched in Kellogg’s 2013 Shark Tank competition and once again wowed the audience with our product. To learn more about the team check us out at www.haamlock.com

Awards

 


FAQ

What makes it sturdier than a traditional U-Lock?

HaamLock has improved on the standard U-lock design, adding a second locking pin, effectively doubling the amount of time it takes a thief to cut through your lock. 

How long does a charge last?

Under normal usage the battery will last over a month. The battery can be charged in 3-4 hours after it has been fully depleted. Since, the lock uses a mini-USB port to charge, any external USB power source can be used to power the lock if the battery runs out 

What kind of security features are you using to ensure it’s not hacked?

HaamLock uses the enhanced security provided by the Bluetooth LE standard. Additionally, we use industry standard encryption to make it next to impossible for the lock to be hacked.

In the rare instance that the lock does get hacked, the firmware on the lock can be updated to close any security holes.  

What if your phone battery dies?

You can always pair your lock with another iPhone using your unique pincode.

 

Credits

Movie produced by Jonathan Palmer

story:
• Busticks team is a group of enthusiastic young people, who wants to help every traveler in the world have the most comfortable and cheap travel. 
  • Busticks is the only free travel application in CIS which helps tourists find best tours and transfers to different countries and directions, calculate budget in advance, order tickets beforehand and cancel without any fees before 3 days. Busticks operates in tourism industry in CIS and is expected to enter European market. The trends in this industry include adventure, food, and Eco tours which all is offered by Busticks. It is important to us help travelers find best offers with cheapest prices, feel safe using the insurance and save money and time.
  • $20000 will help us add new functions and make the most user-friendly application. And also, it  will helps us find new partners in new countries.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • With $20000 we will add new functions and enlarge the sphere of our operation by entering to new countries. The new functions will make the traveling experience of our users better and more interesting.  
  • You will receive 5% discount life time and be able to use other seasonal discounts.
  • We want to reach our goals but if something goes wrong, we will donate to the treatment of sick children.

The Impact

  • After application becomes worldwide, all travelers around the world will be able to order cheap tours, feel safe everywhere, and save money and time.
  • Busticks Application was nominated as the best business model during Creative Armenia Business Challange even before the release.
  • You can download app in Play Market and view all reviews.

Risks & Challenges

  • We believe in our work and know that our application will help millions of travelers.
  • We make our competitors to our partners, which helps us become stronger.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you know travel agencies that can become our partners please inform us. We are ready for cooperation.
  • Use Indiegogo share tools!

Busticks operates in tourism industry in CIS and is expected to enter European market. The trends in this industry include adventure, food, and Eco tours which all is offered by Busticks. It is important to us help travelers find best offers with cheapest prices, feel safe using the insurance and save money and time.
$20000 will help us add new functions and make the most user-friendly application. And also, it  will helps us find new partners in new countries.

You will receive 5% discount life time and be able to use other seasonal discounts.
We want to reach our goals but if something goes wrong, we will donate to the treatment of sick children.

After application becomes worldwide, all travelers around the world will be able to order cheap tours, feel safe everywhere, and save money and time.
Busticks Application was nominated as the best business model during Creative Armenia Business Challange even before the release.
You can download app in Play Market and view all reviews.

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

If you know travel agencies that can become our partners please inform us. We are ready for cooperation.
Use Indiegogo share tools!

story:
OVERVIEW

Hi, we're Gobi Gear. 

And this backpack is the ultimate fun machine. 

Fun can happen at any time.  We want you to be ready.  

We've made a super versatile, 4-in-1 backpack:

  1. It's a backpack
  2. It's a cooler
  3. It has waterproof storage
  4. It's an organizer  

 

The Happy Hour backpack line features inner organizational segments, a separate drink cooler pouch - which doubles as wet/dry storage, is super durable, and so versatile it will literally go everywhere you go.  

The Happy Hour is perfect for:

✔️ spontaneous fun
✔️ keeping you organized
✔️ keeping your drinks cold
✔️ separating wet from dry. 

The Problem?  Single-use, overpriced backpacks. 

Tired of backpacks that only do ONE thing?  With insane prices?

Meaning time wasted re-packing based on your plans?  

 

The Solution? Happy Hour.  

Happy Hour tends to solve more than one problem.  Our backpack is no different.  

No more swapping out backpacks every time you hit a new spot.  Your Happy Hour does it all!

 

TAKE IT ANYWHERE

Who wants a $300 for a cooler backpack that you can't even bring to the gym?  Honestly, I don't need my drinks that cold on most occasions.  

Like you, we're always on the go.  I don't have time to unpack and repack as I transition from work to the gym, from kids play-dates to the beach.  The only constant is the STUFF.  

The Happy Hour takes care of the stuff, so you can get on with being happy.  Yea! 

 

Healthy & Fun

 ✔️Gym/sports
 ✔️Pool
 ✔️Beach
 ✔️Picnic
 ✔️Kid's bag
 ✔️Dog gear 
 ✔️Carry-on

 

Craft-brew approved 

 ✔️Keeps drinks cold
 ✔️Portable party
 ✔️Doesn't look like a dorky cooler 

 

Durable & Functional

 ✔️Water-resistant heathered fabric
 ✔️Multiple pockets
 ✔️Inner organization
 ✔️Adjustable straps 
 ✔️Top-locking drawstring closure
 ✔️Bike light clip (large bag)

 

Our Happy Hour Backpacks are here to re-define how we think about happy hour - building a community around the different kinds of happy hour, emphasizing  healthy relationships with family, friends, and the outdoors. 

So go ahead, put some fizzy waters into your new backpack!  They'll stay cold & you'll be ready for some fun.   

 

HOW IT WORKS 

Instead of making backpacks with just 1 purpose, the Happy Hour is meant to join you on a myriad of after-work adventures, with features for real people doing real things.  

We didn't just make a cool-looking backpack (but yes we did that too).  We made a backpack that can go with you to the gym, and the beach, and the bar, and the picnic, and your kids can use it, and yes, you can take it as a carry-on for air travel too.  

 

LOWER POUCH:  WATERPROOF & DRINK COOLER 

A separate, zippered lower compartment provides waterproof storage!  Perfect for wet items after the beach, gym, pool. 

 

(Lower compartment is not a dry bag and it will not hold water if bag is placed on side or upside-down.)

 

Inner segments for organization 

HAPPY HOUR packs feature 3 inner compartments to keep you effortlessly organized.

In use: 

 

 

WHAT WE DID BETTER

 .

WHAT CAN IT FIT?

WHERE CAN I TAKE IT? 

Here are just a few ideas: 

 

MORE DETAILS 

Pockets

 

 

Dimensions

REWARDS

\

GIVING BACK

 

TIMELINE

Who We Are

Gobi Gear is all about saving you time through organization, so you may have more time to enjoy the great outdoors!  We create functional gear that is as easy to use as it is practical - making us your trusted companion from the top of Kilimanjaro the local brew pub. We stand by our products 100% and offer a lifetime guarantee. 

Our Giveback

Gobi Gear is a parter with 1% For The Planet and 1 Tree Planted - donating 1% of our sales to ensure that trees get planted across the globe.   We also use no plastic in our packaging, and to date, have saved over 70,000 plastic bags from ending up in the landfill.  

Why Indiegogo?

Indiegogo allows us to cut out the middleman, remove the bankers and investors (Gobi Gear is 100% family-owned) and create a product that you’ve directly helped bring to life. It also provides us the opportunity to reward those folks (you!) who believe in us. 

Return Policy

We only use premium fabric & parts and offer a lifetime warranty. We will repair or replace any bags that have manufacturer defects or don’t hold up under normal use. We do not offer refunds on products that were received as a Kickstarter reward.

We’re passionate about creating amazing products and Kickstarter is a way for us to launch our brand. As you've read, Kickstarter isn't a store and rewards are a thanks for supporting the project which is why we cannot offer refunds or returns. Your pledge means so much and we take it very seriously. We will do anything we can to make sure that this exchange leaves with good vibes for everyone involved. 

Risks and challenges

As we at Gobi Gear know all too well, manufacturing comes with its own set of headaches, whether they be from the fabric mill, an agent you trusted, or just hitting Chinese New Year all wrong in the production cycle.

The good news is that we have learned more than a thing or two, and this time, we are heading in prepared. We already have sourced and specified every single part of these backpacks, and have verified that the colors we are offering here are 100% available. We have also already held the spot at the factory to produce these bags ASAP.

But what about the Trump Tariffs? As you all may also know, President Trump is talking about more tariffs on goods coming out of China. China is where our products are lovingly made - and we have a wonderful relationship with our factory. Rather than run to another country, we are sticking with what works, and hope you'll understand the price being slightly higher than it would have been a year ago.

 They'll stay cold & you'll be ready for some fun.    HOW IT WORKS Instead of making backpacks with just 1 purpose, the Happy Hour is meant to join you on a myriad of after-work adventures, with features for real people doing real things.  We didn't just make a cool-looking backpack (but yes we did that too).  We made a backpack that can go with you to the gym, and the beach, and the bar, and the picnic, and your kids can use it, and yes, you can take it as a carry-on for air travel too.   LOWER POUCH:  WATERPROOF & DRINK COOLER A separate, zippered lower compartment provides waterproof storage!  Perfect for wet items after the beach, gym, pool.  (Lower compartment is not a dry bag and it will not hold water if bag is placed on side or upside-down.) Inner segments for organization HAPPY HOUR packs feature 3 inner compartments to keep you effortlessly organized.In use:   WHAT WE DID BETTER .WHAT CAN IT FIT?WHERE CAN I TAKE IT? Here are just a few ideas:  MORE DETAILS Pockets  DimensionsREWARDS\GIVING BACK TIMELINEWho We AreGobi Gear is all about saving you time through organization, so you may have more time to enjoy the great outdoors!  We create functional gear that is as easy to use as it is practical - making us your trusted companion from the top of Kilimanjaro the local brew pub. We stand by our products 100% and offer a lifetime guarantee. Our GivebackGobi Gear is a parter with 1% For The Planet and 1 Tree Planted - donating 1% of our sales to ensure that trees get planted across the globe.   We also use no plastic in our packaging, and to date, have saved over 70,000 plastic bags from ending up in the landfill.  Why Indiegogo?Indiegogo allows us to cut out the middleman, remove the bankers and investors (Gobi Gear is 100% family-owned) and create a product that you’ve directly helped bring to life. It also provides us the opportunity to reward those folks (you!) who believe in us. Return PolicyWe only use premium fabric & parts and offer a lifetime warranty. We will repair or replace any bags that have manufacturer defects or don’t hold up under normal use. We do not offer refunds on products that were received as a Kickstarter reward.We’re passionate about creating amazing products and Kickstarter is a way for us to launch our brand. As you've read, Kickstarter isn't a store and rewards are a thanks for supporting the project which is why we cannot offer refunds or returns. Your pledge means so much and we take it very seriously. We will do anything we can to make sure that this exchange leaves with good vibes for everyone involved. Risks and challengesAs we at Gobi Gear know all too well, manufacturing comes with its own set of headaches, whether they be from the fabric mill, an agent you trusted, or just hitting Chinese New Year all wrong in the production cycle.The good news is that we have learned more than a thing or two, and this time, we are heading in prepared. We already have sourced and specified every single part of these backpacks, and have verified that the colors we are offering here are 100% available. We have also already held the spot at the factory to produce these bags ASAP.But what about the Trump Tariffs? As you all may also know, President Trump is talking about more tariffs on goods coming out of China. China is where our products are lovingly made - and we have a wonderful relationship with our factory. Rather than run to another country, we are sticking with what works, and hope you'll understand the price being slightly higher than it would have been a year ago.

story:
Paani Genie is the first project under the banner of Moving Forward which is a youth driven public charitable trust. Work began in June 2014 and in the past 10 months, our young, enthusiastic team has given this project strong infrastructure.

This is a South African idea, conceptualised and executed first by Hippo Water Roller in South Africa back in the 1990s. We were inspired by the impact they had in South Africa and are determined to do the same here in India.

In rural India, people carry small water containers with a maximum capacity of 20 litres on their heads or at their hips from their house to the water source and back multiple times a day to collect the required amount of water. This is a time consuming and strenuous process. Very often, the water source is more than 2 kilometres away. We believe we have found a great solution to address this problem.

Paani Genie is a 90 litre water roller with one hole on each horizontal face. A steel rod can be easily attached and detached to the roller by pushing each end of the rod into the hole on the horizontal face of the roller. This rod moves at a 180 degree angle which allows the person to push or pull their 90 litre water roller home. This saves an enormous amount of time, energy and will add significant quality to the lives of the people in rural India.

We bought a roller from Hippo Water Roller and had it shipped to India. We found a manufacturer named Infra who is based in Mumbai with a plant in Chennai, ten minutes away from our pilot village.

With respect to our pilot village, we had three criteria that we wanted our village to satisfy:

1) It must have a significant water problem with people walking at least 1.5 kilometres for their water.

2) The village must not have more than 150 homes. As this is our first project, we want to start small.

3) The village must be within a three hour radius of Chennai. As this project is run by a group of college students, we would find it hard to visit a village on a regular basis if it were very far away. We wanted to find a village that we could visit on a relatively regular basis so that we could develop a relationship with the people in the village.

After visiting between 15 and 20 villages, we found Vinayaganallur, a village two and a half hours away from Chennai with 125 homes. People walk 2 kilometres and more to get their water between April and September. Vinayaganallur satisfied all of our criteria and so has been selected as our pilot village.

Each water roller costs 3,500 rupees which is about 56 dollars. We want to make 100 rollers for our pilot village and so our total budget is Rs. 3.5 lakhs which is 5,600 dollars. We are in the process of collecting funds for this project and would appreciate your heartfelt support to make this project a success! We can't do this without you.

Thank you very much!

story:
Creation history

Our family likes spending time in the fresh air. There is a wonderful park near where we live. When we are planning to spend the whole day outside, our picnic-packing checklist gets pretty long: food and beverages, blankets, toys. We used to put all our stuff in bags but those were bursting all the time and holding those wasn’t exactly convenient. Then we ordered a few backpacks from China but those lasted one month. 

All of a sudden we had an idea of making high-quality backpacks for all family members: kids, moms and dads.

If our idea floats your boat and you want to help us make it happen then please support our family campaign.

What we do

Backpacks for kids and their parents. Functional and stylish. All backpacks feature similar design, the only major difference is the size. Dads supposed to carry more stuff so their backpacks are bigger. Moms backpack are a little smaller. Kids backpacks are the smallest, those are light, doesn’t put a strain on the back and fit a couple of toys.

Interesting features

  • Durable water-resistant rip-stop fabric; intensified back and bottom.

  • Customize your backpack: Add any text with patch

  • In case of rain, there is a raincoat in every backpack

  • Comfortably put and fix large items into side pockets. When not in use, you can always reduce side pockets size

  • Practical and handy zip fastener that you can open even when wearing gloves

  • You can always roll up hanging slings

A few figures (Approximate calculations for starting a family business)

  • Sewing equipment ($1280)
  • Fabric ($700)
  • Rent out a production room for 3 month ($1000)
  • Minor 3-month maintenance salary for the family ($1000)
  • Platform and payment system fees and taxes 13% +5% +3% ($835)

Total: $4816

Perks

1 Backpack patch​

You can sent me text for patch or use "Super Mom", "Super Dad", "Super Baby". 

Color: yellow letters on a black background

Size: 10x 3см

Toddler backpack​

Dimensions (H x W x D):  27x 17x 10см (10,6x 6,7x 4")

Kids backpack​

Dimensions (H x W x D):  33x 21x 12см (13x 8.3x 4.7")

Ladies backpack​

Dimensions (H x W x D):  40x 25x 13см (15.7x 9.8x 5.1")

Men’s backpack​

Dimensions (H x W x D):  50x 27x 16см (20x 10.6x 6.3")

Family backpack set​

A great gift for any family! You choose the size for your child. If you have a large family, you can order separately additional backpacks in other perks.

The Trailblazer​

Written mention of thanks with every backpack

Timeline

Starting the campaign: June 2017

Successful ending: 30 June 2017

Money transfer: July 2017

Buying equipment and fabric: August 2017

Making and shipping backpacks:  September-October 2017

Order received: November 2017

We hope that you and your friends from the social media will enable us to bring families to spend more happy hours together.​

story:
The Dawn of Laser Powered Flight

The KC Space Pirates are planning on keeping a AR Drone quad copter flying for 48 hours to demonstrate the potential of Laser Powered Flight and wireless power beaming. The KC Space Pirates are best known for our participation in the NASA Power Beaming Challenge pursuing a $2,000,000 prize purse. We are a 3 time top finisher and walked away with $90,000 in consolation prize money. We brought innovation, professionalism, and gumption to the Space Elevator games. In response to this refreshing attitude about science and space technology we were heavily covered by the press. Our workshop appeared on the cover of the New York Times Magazine. Our captain was interviewed on Late Night with Conan O’Brien.

Wireless power beaming is in it's infancy. Lasers are getting more powerful and cheaper at an exponential rate. For power beaming to make a difference in the lives of everyone it needs to prove itself. And not just in some highly funded military or government lab. We intend to short-cut years of secret development of military applications and focus on what it can do for the rest of us.

What We Need

We have a lot of equipment from the Space Elevator Games and have gotten our core sponsors (TRUMPF, ThorLabs and National Instruments) to help us out in this new project, so we are a long ways toward our goal. But as usual it's the details that eat you alive. If this whole project ends up on our credit cards like a big chunk of the power beaming competition did, we just won't be able to continue.

So this campaign is to see if crowd funding cutting edge power beaming demonstrations is viable. If we can get the core expenses covered by flagship sponsors and the numerous smaller items covered by people like you we can continue to advance the state of the art and make power beaming a practical way to solve our power problems in the future.

We need your money to help us buy the following items:

  • We need a good DVR system to record the record and help broadcast it to the internet for everyone to see.
  • We have to have a professional ustream account.
  • We need to buy more quadcopter hardware so that it will be fresh for the record attempt.
  • We need to pay a guard for the overnight portions of the record for venue security requirements.
  • We need lots of safety equipment to scale this up from our small garage based lab to the large exhibit hall where we will do the record.
  • We also have to get the cells cut for the final photovoltaic panel.

 

We have arranged for some commemorative memorabilia and a few more solid perks. I hope you can find something you like. You can also contribute without choosing a perk so don’t sweat it.

Why

Wireless power Beaming has many applications from mundane to fantastically grand. From keeping your dogs GPS locater charged to powering the Space Elevator. From delivering mail and pizza to delivering power from orbit to earth in Space Based Solar Power(SBS). All these applications have challenges to their practicality and need technology to develop before we will see them making our lives better. But keeping a quadcopter flying has reached the practicality threshold where a demo can help show the world that Power Beaming Prime Time will happen in our lifetime.

Power Beaming as Alternative Energy

Currently the efficiency of power beaming is low enough that it lacks credibility as “Alternative” energy however laser tech is currently improving at a rate reminiscent of Moore’s law. So we are only a few years from wireless power beaming having alternative energy credibility. The low cost lasers are entering the scene today and the custom photovoltaics have been basically waiting for lasers. Our end to end efficiency is predicted to be 5 to 7% using mostly off the shelf components. Custom components jump that to 30% with improvements passing the 50% mark not far off.

We can use power beaming to reduce or replace fossil fuels in aircraft. Electric aircraft are coming of age with realistic ranges and performance levels. Power beaming can allow these aircraft to match their fossil fueled bretheren.

Hybrid aircraft is another area of interest to the KC Space Pirates. We estimate that 1/4 to 1/3rd of the fuel needed to power a 777 cargo plane at cruise could be provided by power beaming from mid levels orbiting satellites.

Tounge in Cheek

You might have noticed we are a bit tounge in cheek around here. We want science and technology to be fun and approachable. Not just for us but for future generations as well.

Now Is The Time!

Industry is waiting for the government to show power beaming is ready. The government is waiting for the military. We’re waiting for no one! Well, actually, we are waiting for you to pick out a perk and show that the world wants new tech to make it a better place.

Other Ways You Can Help

All the KC Space Pirate crew has day jobs. It takes a constant bubbling of effort by our supporters to keep this going. We need help managing the social media and getting the word out. We need help manning the cameras and video feed for the event. And we have an eye out for the next crew member to fill out our skill set to take on this and future projects. Contact me if you think you have what it takes.

Brian Turner

Captain,

KC Space Pirates

story:
24SEVEN is the first all-natural, all-day (24 hours and longer!) deodorant and sweat absorber all-in-one pad!

Everyone has experienced that moment where you have to go to an important presentation, job interview, a romantic date or enjoy a wedding party - but... notice sweat spots under your armpits- and the uncomfortable feeling that comes along with it. 

Sweating and body odor can absolutely ruin social and professional events. It’s an embarrassing problem for many people, and traditional deodorants do very little to solve the problem for any length of time.  

We needed a reliable, natural, and long-lasting way to spare regular people the debilitating effects of armpit stains and smelly clothes.That's why we came up with 24SEVEN Dry Armpits.

After creating and selling a 100% natural deodorant product, the 24SEVEN team locked onto the perfect combination of a natural deodorant & revolutionary sweat absorber in one, applied directly onto the skin.


         


You have probably noticed even the best traditional deodorants will start losing their effectiveness just a few hours after being applied, meaning you have to constantly reapply them if you want all day protection. 24SEVEN is so named because it actually works 24 hours or longer. We guarantee it.


Conventional antiperspirants and deodorants are filled with potentially toxic ingredients including: Aluminum - Parabens - Propylene glycol - Triclosan- Synthetic fragrances,...

Aluminum, found in most conventional antiperspirant deodorants, is a known neurotoxin and suspected contributor to chemical sensitivities, Alzheimer's disease, and breast cancer.

Parabens, scientists believe the parabens used in most deodorants and antiperspirants could be responsible for accelerating the growth of tumors in the breast.

Studies have found that women are eight times more likely to develop breast cancer in the area of the breast closest to the armpit than in any other part of the breast tissue.





The 24SEVEN Dry Armpit Pads are ready to use right out of the box at any time of day, regardless if you wearing a T-shirt, a button-down shirt, or a suit. 

We used flexible and breathable materials of the highest quality to make the pad. They are comfortable to wear, and come in natural skin tone so they will stay invisible to the world. 


The 24SEVEN Dry Armpit Pads are unisex, and are a perfect fit for both men & women. They are comfortable to wear, and come in natural skin tone that stays hidden when in use. 


We are seeking $10,000 to cover the costs of a large run of production for mass distribution to our growing list of interested customers.

By participating in this campaign, you earn a special early bird discount on 24 SEVEN that the general public will not have access to. 

You will also be among the first in the world to experience the profound effects of this amazing product.



Meet the 24SEVEN Dry Armpit Pads Family!  

We are Giovanni, Ulgar and Nicolas. Our story starts while Giovanni was living in Brazil. That's right, the hot tropical country hosting the World Cup right now.

While searching for alternatives to traditional deodorants which just kept him fresh for a few hours, he found a solution in a mixture of natural plants and herbs commonly used in hottest northern regions of Brazil.

When he returned to Belgium, he teamed up with Ulgar Bilican and founded 24SEVEN. The two went to work perfecting the formula, and making it available in the marketplace. 

They continued improving the formula, so that it not only provided long lasting odor elimination; but would keep armpits 100% dry and shirts clean.

Throughout their 3 years of testing the team perfectionized the product and achieved amazing test results which proven the product to neutralize odor for over 24hrs in a row.

That was just the beginning. Using Giovanni's experience as a chemical engineer and Ulgar's retail business knowledge, they searched for a solution which would also absorb armpit sweat AND neutralize bacteria at the same time.

3 years later...



We knew we had the potential to help people with sweating and odor problems, but we never realized the extent of our impact until people started telling us how 24SEVEN DRY ARMPIT PADS were changing their lives. 

We have all the materials we need. 24 SEVEN has been tested and retested on many different people, leading to the development of the final prototype. We are now ready to commence large scale production. 


If we don't reach our goal of $10,000 in this campaign, Indiegogo will automatically refund everyone who pledged. This is the minimum amount we need to get the initial line of our amazing product out into the world. Anything less will not be enough to produce and distribute a sufficient amount of the product.

After testing 24SEVEN Dry Armpit Pads for over 3 years, we have everything we need to produce it on a larger scale. We expect to fulfill our crowd funding orders by August 29th, 2014. Delays are unlikely, and we promise to keep our backers aware of every step along the way by offering you direct access to our blog with frequent updates.


                                        


Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word to all your friends that you think could benefit from our product.

Press inquires please email Giovanni: giovanni@24-7even.com
story_txt:
24SEVEN is the first all-natural, all-day (24 hours and longer!) deodorant and sweat absorber all-in-one pad!Everyone has experienced that moment where you have to go to an important presentation, job interview, a romantic date or enjoy a wedding party - but... notice sweat spots under your armpits- and the uncomfortable feeling that comes along with it. Sweating and body odor can absolutely ruin social and professional events. It’s an embarrassing problem for many people, and traditional deodorants do very little to solve the problem for any length of time.  We needed a reliable, natural, and long-lasting way to spare regular people the debilitating effects of armpit stains and smelly clothes.That's why we came up with 24SEVEN Dry Armpits.After creating and selling a 100% natural deodorant product, the 24SEVEN team locked onto the perfect combination of a natural deodorant & revolutionary sweat absorber in one, applied directly onto the skin.
         



You have probably noticed even the best traditional deodorants will start losing their effectiveness just a few hours after being applied, meaning you have to constantly reapply them if you want all day protection. 24SEVEN is so named because it actually works 24 hours or longer. We guarantee it.











Conventional
antiperspirants and deodorants are filled with potentially toxic
ingredients including: Aluminum - Parabens - Propylene glycol -
Triclosan- Synthetic fragrances,...
Aluminum, found in most conventional
antiperspirant deodorants, is a known neurotoxin and suspected contributor
to chemical sensitivities, Alzheimer's disease, and breast
cancer.
Parabens, scientists believe the parabens
used in most deodorants and antiperspirants could be responsible for
accelerating the growth of tumors in the breast.
Studies have
found that women are eight times more likely to develop breast cancer in
the area of the breast closest to the armpit than in any other part of the
breast tissue.















The 24SEVEN Dry
Armpit Pads are ready to use right out of the box at any time of day,
regardless if you wearing a T-shirt, a button-down shirt, or a suit. 
We used flexible and breathable materials of the highest quality to make the
pad. They are comfortable to wear, and come in natural skin tone so they will
stay invisible to the world. 










The
24SEVEN Dry Armpit Pads are unisex, and are a perfect fit for both men &
women. They are comfortable to wear, and come in natural skin tone that stays
hidden when in use. 










We
are seeking $10,000 to cover the costs of a large run of production for mass
distribution to our growing list of interested customers.
By
participating in this campaign, you earn a special early bird discount on 24
SEVEN that the general public will not have access to. 
You will also be among
the first in the world to experience the profound effects of this amazing
product.













Meet the 24SEVEN Dry Armpit Pads Family!  


We are
Giovanni, Ulgar and Nicolas. Our story starts while Giovanni was living in
Brazil. That's right, the hot tropical country hosting the World Cup right now.
While searching
for alternatives to traditional deodorants which just kept him fresh for a few
hours, he found a solution in a mixture of natural plants and herbs commonly used
in hottest northern regions of Brazil.

When he returned to Belgium, he teamed up with Ulgar Bilican and
founded 24SEVEN. The two went to work perfecting the formula, and making it
available in the marketplace. 



They continued improving the formula, so that it not only provided
long lasting odor elimination; but would keep armpits 100% dry and shirts
clean. 
Throughout their 3 years of testing the team perfectionized the
product and achieved amazing test results which proven the product to neutralize odor for over 24hrs in a row.

That was just
the beginning. Using Giovanni's experience as a chemical engineer and Ulgar's
retail business knowledge, they searched for a solution which would also absorb
armpit sweat AND neutralize bacteria at the same time.
3 years
later...






We knew we had the
potential to help people with sweating and odor problems, but we never realized
the extent of our impact until people started telling us how 24SEVEN DRY
ARMPIT PADS were changing their lives. 
We have all the
materials we need. 24 SEVEN has been tested and retested on many different
people, leading to the development of the final prototype. We are now ready to
commence large scale production. 

   



If we don't
reach our goal of $10,000 in this campaign, Indiegogo will automatically refund
everyone who pledged. This is the minimum amount we need to get the initial
line of our amazing product out into the world. Anything less will not be
enough to produce and distribute a sufficient amount of the product.
After testing
24SEVEN Dry Armpit Pads for over 3 years, we have everything we need to produce
it on a larger scale. We expect to fulfill our crowd funding orders by August
29th, 2014. Delays are unlikely, and we promise to keep our backers aware of
every step along the way by offering you direct access to our blog with
frequent updates.





                                        


   
Other Ways You Can Help 
Please spread the word to all your friends that you think could benefit from our product.
Press inquires please email Giovanni: giovanni@24-7even.com

story:
We are now available for pre-order on https://www.daradisedesign.com/shop and in all 5 colours. Pre-order ends April 18, 23:59 SGT. Read more in our 'Updates' section!

 

Seek #OSERAS, the versatile pool inflatable

 

The world's first smartphone and speaker holder for the pool

OSERAS holds all sizes of phones (Even large ones like the iPhone 12 Pro Max/Samsung Note Series)

 

It allows you to film a TikTok video in the pool

Yes, in portrait mode

 

Watch a movie by the poolside

In landscape mode

 

You can lie on your belly to watch if you prefer

 

Dip in the jacuzzi to catch up with the happenings on your phone

 

And stand by the poolside to immerse in a movie with stereo sound

Get one for your phone and two more for your dual speakers

 

But OSERAS holds more than just phones

 

It holds compact and portable wireless speakers for surround sound too

OSERAS holds portable speakers like the Marshall Emberton, UE Boom Series & JBL Flip Series

 

Yes, you can use it as a substitute headrest

Lying on your side allows you to take a nap elegantly

 

Even as a pillow if you want to make the pool your bed

Use it just like a pillow! It even fits large head sizes! (We tested it)

 

It is inflatable and flat-packable

Use a balloon pump or your mouth to inflate OSERAS

 

So you can flat-pack it for on-the-go use

OSERAS can be flat-packed to fit nicely into small bags

 

Lastly, it will be really colourful 

All 5 colours of OSERAS

 

If we could get your support to reach our stretch goals

All orders will ship with the Ocean Blue colour if we attain our funding goal

 

Stretch Goal #1: SGD $34K (USD $25K)

Reach SGD $34K (USD $25K) in funding to unlock the Coral Pink colour

 

Stretch Goal #2: SGD $51K (USD $38K)

Reach SGD $51K (USD $38K) in funding to unlock the Pearly White colour

 

Stretch Goal #3: SGD $68K (USD $51K)

Reach SGD $68K (USD $51K) in funding to unlock the Sunset Orange colour

 

Stretch Goal #4: SGD $85K (USD $64K)

Reach SGD $85K (USD $64K) in funding to unlock the Crystal Clear Variant

 

OSERAS features

 

How to inflate/deflate OSERAS (Instructions)

 

 

About Us

We are DARADISE DESIGN ®, a tropical lifestyle brand focused on creating beach-inspired products.

 

Thank you for supporting OSERAS, our first product towards building our beach-inspired tropical brand. We appreciate every backer and look forward to fulfilling your orders!

 

Risks & Challenges

Every project is compasses some risk and challenges but we will do our absolute best to minimise them. We have done all the necessary preliminary work prior to coming to Kickstarter.

The OSERAS inflatable that you see in the above video and photos are full working prototypes.

With your support, we can bring OSERAS to users worldwide. We have started mass production and your contribution will help us achieve economies of scale and keep the product cost low.

We have sufficient materials to manufacture about 10,000 units now. Beyond that, the lead time is a few months after the project reaches its funding goal. Your strong support will give us the needed affirmation to place a larger raw materials order and start mass production earlier.

 

Environmental commitments

  • Long-lasting design

All products made at our manufacturing grounds will have to pass through the bite, tension, ageing and transit tests. We test for air leakage 24 hours prior to shipping.

  • Reusability and recyclability

Most of our raw materials, packaging and print materials use environmentally-friendly materials including our main product material, environmentally-friendly Polyvinyl chloride.

  • Sustainable materials

We use environmentally-friendly Polyvinyl chloride (PVC) that is certified for safe use. Our products are ISO 9001 certified.

  • Environmentally friendly factories

Our manufacturing grounds has been verified onsite by a world-leading inspection company to ensure that we use sustainable methods to produce our products.

  • Sustainable Distribution

We use reliable and eco-friendly delivery services that minimise their carbon footprint through the use of technology to optimise the shortest shipping route to have our products delivered to you.

 

Marketing, Socials & Enquires

  • If you know someone who would love OSERAS, do share our project with them to help us get the word out.
  • Follow us on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, Snap, LinkedIn, Patreon, YouTube: @daradisedesign
  • For enquires, please contact this email: contact@daradisedesign.com
  • You can find more information on our official website: daradisedesign.com

story:
What is TACK?

TACK is an acronym for Titanium Anywhere Card Knife which was created using our minimalist design philosophy.      

There's a lot of credit card type tools out there, that just don't "cut it".  We knew that we could make something much better, which also happened to look good at the same time.  So we put our heads together and came up with TACK.  The end result was a tool that just simply made sense once you held it in your hand. 

(Wallet Not Included - Size Reference Only)

Our goal was to design TACK to be as thin and light as possible, without compromising structural integrity.  We wanted to make TACK practical and functional, while being suitable for every day carry.  So we made it similar in size to a credit card, which would conveniently fit in your wallet!

*One of the unintended benefits of TACK is that it may also block RFID readers or scammers from skimming your credit card info from your wallet, if placed correctly next to your credit card stripe. 

 

About TACK:

Design:

In keeping with our minimalist design principle, we integrated many of its  features within the structural frame of TACK.

TACK is designed and made in the USA from grade 5 titanium (6AL-4V).  We chose titanium because it's ultra lightweight, twice as strong as steel, anti-corrosive, and rust proof.  You could actually leave TACK at the bottom of the ocean floor for 100 years and it would look the same as it did on the day you left it there!  Due to the the many benefits of titanium, it is commonly used in the aerospace, military, and medical industries.  It was the perfect choice of materials for something that was going to live in your wallet.

Finish:

The Standard Titanium TACK (Titanium 6AL-4V) comes in a stonewashed tumbled finish, which will resist scratching and wear much better than a polished blade. 

  

TACK Specs:      

Weight: Approximately .5 oz

Materials: 6AL4V Titanium (Standard Titanium Model)

Same size as a standard credit card

Dimensions: 2.12" x 3.36" x .060" (53.9mm x 85.4mm x 1.2mm)

Fits in a standard credit card slot of your wallet.  **Wallet Not Inculuded**

 

Features:

While on the go, we've all had trouble opening those tamper-proof blister packs, cheese stick wrappers that refuse to let you in, or the worst offender of them all: the "peel here for easy open" packaging. The struggle is real. Well, in our best impersonation of film trailer announcer: Donald Leroy LaFontaine as your inner voice you may hear the following: : "In a world where titanium can become a credit card knife and fit in your wallet, you soon will know what it's like to be James Bond"

  • Utility Blade (Cut open boxes, envelopes, etc)
  • Scraper (Scrape off stickers, clean windshield)
  • Flat Head (For fixing on the go)
  • Pry Tip (Prying staples, battery covers, etc)  
  • Bottle Opener

(Wallet Not Included - For size reference only.)

Why TACK?

Our goal when creating TACK was to design the absolute highest quality,  wallet sized utility tool anywhere.  We chose the latest in material technology, which would not only be aesthetically pleasing, but most importantly practical and functional. No Origami skills required to use and no cheap plastic parts to break.  Not only is TACK great for EDC, but you can also  take it fishing, camping, scuba diving, or even up Mt. Everest.  This is one solid piece of military grade titanium, which can withstand any environment you throw at it.     

TACK is designed with safety in mind.  We've integrated our Secure Grip Retention (SGR) system, which is a finger guard that prevents your hand and fingers from slipping on to the sharp blade when being used.  Our three finger design allows you to control TACK more accurately by reducing side to side movement when gripped. 

(Flame Anodized Finish)

Available Colors:

  • Available in Natural Stonewashed Finish, Blue, Bronze, Purple, Flame Anodized

Options:

Risks & Challenges:

This was our 6th project on Kickstarter:  (The Fly Pry, The Fat Fly, The Dice Tool, Two Bit Fly, TRAK)

We feel that the risks associated with this project are very minimal and fairly low. We've put together a very experienced team and have already gone through the build process with our current prototypes. Our team member and consultant on this project.

We have used our suppliers in the past and have established relationships with them.  TRAK is made here in the USA.

Please Note:

The TACK knives shown in the video were pre-production prototypes. We experimented with different types of materials/finishes, anodizing techniques, and edge bevels. The final production version will be very similar to the pictures found under the sections: Standard Model.  Some of the prototypes seen in the video and pictures were used for reference only or to demonstrate color, fit, function, and size comparison. 

 

Video Soundtrack:

Music by: "I Dunno (Grapes of Wrath Mix)" by spinningmerkaba

2017 - Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (3.0)

Available: http://ccmixter.org/files/jlbrock44/56346
