story:
At Trees Can Fly, we are pioneering simpler ways for you to travel anywhere in the world carbon-neutral.

How do we do this? It’s pretty simple: we’re doing extensive research into tree-planting and other such projects that offset your greenhouse emissions.

This process may sound expensive, but the cost to you isn’t a single cent more. We are partnering with industry-leading travel suppliers in order to facilitate the best deals possible. Together, we can combat climate change, saving the planet one travel booking at a time. We envision a travel industry that cares more, and by contributing to this campaign, you can be a part of that.

Our services, all backed by our commitment to quality service, includes:

  • Flight Bookings. You search from among 720 airlines, and your reservation is just a click away.
  • Accommodation. Hotels, guesthouses, hostels, and apartments: our discounts are big, and our partners are global.
  • Rental Cars. Find the best deal by comparing choices from all the rental providers.
  • Cruises. Whatever you want to do and wherever you want to go, you can search and save top cruises.
  • All-Inclusive Packages. When you use more than one service at a time, you get an even better deal.
  • Tours / Activities. We have done research into your destination so that you don’t have to.
  • Transfers. It is not always clear what the most reliable transfer is at a specific transport, so we show you the way: private transfers, shared shuttles, mini buses, or coaches.
  • Insurance. Our affordable options protect you and your loved ones from expected medical expenses while you’re away from home.
  • Visas. Our booking tool is totally straightforward.

Our user-friendly platform puts worldwide, eco-friendly travel right in your hands. You just choose where you want to go, and we offset your emissions for free. Our prices are low, and we donate a portion of our earnings to tree-planting and other environmental projects to help offset your travel emissions. So far, we have removed 288,000 pounds of carbon from the atmosphere, and we’re just getting started.

Our planet needs your support, help us spread the word!

 

Our Unique Features

Get the insights of your travel and a complete summary when comparing flight options from Price and Trip Duration to Comfort and Amenities to Eco Efficiency.

Be kinder to the planet by reviewing actual fuel and CO2 emissions data. Of course, we will be offsetting your emissions for free. Together we can help save our planet, one travel booking at a time.

 

Why Trees Can Fly?

  1. Low competitive prices everyday so you can save more.
  2. Search for a wide variety of travel products that include flights, hotels, car rentals, cruises, packages, activities, transfers, insurance and visas.
  3. An Overall Smart Score with your flight search results (see above).
  4. A portion of our earnings is contributed to offsetting your travel emissions. 
  5. In addition to offsetting your travel emissions, we donate 10% of net profits into the environment. 
  6. 100% free to use.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help, friends, in order to expand our business and transition from the beta stage. With this campaign, we are looking to raise 50,000 USD, a portion of which will also be used to pay for a high-quality marketing campaign.

There are three distinct phases to this project. First, we develop. That includes the website, the product, and the mobile app. That will take up to six months. Second, we test. At this point, we make sure that everything is running smoothly, our bookings going through without fail. Third, we review. Here we’re emphasizing the product launches and the marketing execution.

As a thank-you, we have put together some awesome rewards for you, our earliest adopters, the people who believe in us most, the people whom we couldn’t do this without.

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign link on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram so that all your friends and family know this option is out there. You can get on board with this campaign and join our movement into the future now.

We appreciate all your support, monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for your time.

We can't do this without you.

 

About Trees Can Fly

With more than 25 years of aviation experience, our team of professionals have become masters in sustainability, emissions management, financial control, risk management, operations management, and project management. Our team has worked for various airlines,  industry and sustainability organizations. We are also members of several professional and sustainability organisations.

 

 

Our perks

5 USD –  Return Carbon-Neutral Flight Discount . You pay what our employees pay. Redeem your 1 Return Flight Discount after purchasing this perk by visiting www.treescanfly.com/redeem . Be sure to also share this amazing campaign on Facebook with your friends. That’s it! No travel expiry. (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).

10 USD – Join the movement now! Surprise Gift – just tweet us @trees_can_fly with #IwantTreesCanFly or share this campaign on Facebook to receive a surprise gift and a twitter follow-back.

25 USD – Become an Ambassador. A tree planted in your name and your name recognition on our website for life.

49 USD – Personal Gratitude. Plant a tree for you and your loved one. Handwritten personalized thank you note from our founder and a personalized certificate. 

99 USD – Go on your journey now. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral with 2 return flight discounts when you book your next vacation with us. You pay what our employees pay. No travel expiry. (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).

199 USD – Plan in advance and make the leap. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral with 4 return flight discounts when you book your next vacation with us. You pay what our employees pay. No travel expiry. (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).

299 USD –  Start plotting your adventures for some time to come. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral with 6 return flight discounts when you book your next vacation with us. You pay what our employees pay. No travel expiry. (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).

499 USD –  Get all your vacation plans on the map. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral with 8 return flight discounts when you book your next vacation with us. You pay what our employees pay. No travel expiry. (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).

999 USD – The future is big: make an adventure out of it. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral with 10 flight discounts when you book your next vacation with us and receive a limited-edition Trees Can Fly Champion Bamboo Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt. You pay what our employees pay. No travel expiry! (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).

9,999 USD - Your Life, Don't Hold Back. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral for UNLIMITED Return Flight Discounts, any class of travel, in your name AND for your direct family members (mother, father, sister, brother, child) for 12 months, when you book your next vacation with us. We'll also plant 999 trees in our new forest garden! (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Trees are being rapidly destroyed, yet they are a vital carbon-store and a vital regulator of weather and climate, they urgently need saving. We want to do our part to make this happen but plant even more to try and absorb the increasing carbon emissions from aviation. The more popular we become with your help, the more trees we can plant and the greater impact we can make together!

  • Ten trees can absorb CO2 at a rate of 222kg / 480 lb each year!
  • Planting trees is one of the most effective means of absorbing CO2 from the atmosphere.
  • Trees are natural pollution filters, absorbing pollutants through their leaf surface.
  • Trees lower temperature by breathing out water and providing shade from the sun; the difference in temperature can be as much as 10C / 19F.
  • Trees reduce erosion of soil and help to avoid flooding downstream.
  • Trees help to replenish ground water and maintain the flow of streams.
  • Trees provide wildlife habitats.

Managed forests can provide employment to local communities.

Benefits of tree-planting are not just limited to the environment….

When you plant trees…

  1. You create educational opportunities for children
  2. You empower women
  3. You build strong communities
  4. You permanently increase the income of poor farmers.
  5. You help families to feed themselves.
  6. You provide permanent and seasonal employment.
  7. You provide fuel wood so villagers don’t need to cut down trees.
  8. You create fodder to feed livestock.
  9. You give the world a way to end the battle between farms and forests to revitalize and improve soil quality.
  10. You change people’s lives for the better. Forever.

We work with not-for-profit tree planting partners around the world. The trees are planted mainly in Africa, Asia and Latin America. Their projects are highly reputable and transparent and we’ll be shortly publishing more details on these. 

Yes, depending on the number of trees being planted and based on a few variable such as the length of your flight, aircraft type and number of passengers.

Over its lifetime a tree, especially in the tropical areas of this world where most of our trees are currently planted, can absorb a tonne of CO2, or more. This value can vary greatly and not only depends upon the tree type, location and whether trees are harvested or left intact, but we aim to maximise CO2 absorption through selection of our tree planting partners. Many short-distance flights emit 1 tonne of CO2 per passenger, so your flight could even be covered 100% by one tree, but we try to plant as many as 10 trees or more depending upon the agreements we can secure, so you could even be covered 10 times over for your flight!

A typical return flight between North America and Europe will emit approximately 2.5 tonnes CO2 per passenger, so when we plant 10 trees we not only cover you but possibly a total of 4 passengers! That's what we are doing on your behalf, with our own money, free of any cost to you! You just have to use our site, make a booking directly from the linked travel providers, and we take care of the rest!

Of course trees may not live the fully expected term, but by planting 10 trees science indicates that most, perhaps all flights booked via our site will have their emissions covered by our unique scheme. But we are going to do even more in the future!

Yes and no!

We are doing more than anyone else now and for many flights we more than cover the carbon footprint., we have a unique scheme. We’d like to do even more and we also encourage you to do more.

We plan to increase even further our contribution to environmental improvement projects. Trees Can Fly is young and we need to ensure that we invest enough revenue into improving our services, enhancing IT infrastructure, support people and other growth needs. Once we've grown a bit more, increased revenues and actually start making surpluses then we plan to invest at least 10% of them into environmental improvement projects!

No! There are no premiums or extra charges for using our services.

Aviation is far from being eco-friendly now, and that's why we are uniquely trying to do something positive to help mitigate some of these problems!

But it's not all bad news. A lot of progress is being made by the aviation community already, and even solar powered aircraft are being trialed and sustainable biofuels with no direct land-use impact are being tested.

We are doing our little bit and hope to do a lot more to help promote and even invest in such progress. We'll be helping fund eco-projects and non-profit organisations which campaign and innovate to help reduce the environmental impact of aviation. We work with organisations such as "Sustainable Travel International" and the "Roundtable on Sustainable Biomaterials" amongst others, to keep updated of the latest developments.

In the meantime, tree planting is a very positive step, it's something real that we can do immediately and for very many journeys it covers all, or more, of the carbon footprint of the passenger who book with us. However, there is much more to do and we ask you to join our initiative and help support us! Send us your ideas and we’d love to hear from you!

     

Our planet needs your support! You can simply make a pledge or spread the word out to your friends and family. Any support is truly appreciated!

We like your feedback. Visit our beta site at www.treescanfly.com to tell us what you think. Together, we can help save our planet, one travel booking at a time.
story_txt:
At Trees Can Fly, we are pioneering simpler ways for you to travel anywhere in the world carbon-neutral.How do we do this? It’s pretty simple: we’re doing extensive research into tree-planting and other such projects that offset your greenhouse emissions.This process may sound expensive, but the cost to you isn’t a single cent more. We are partnering with industry-leading travel suppliers in order to facilitate the best deals possible. Together, we can combat climate change, saving the planet one travel booking at a time. We envision a travel industry that cares more, and by contributing to this campaign, you can be a part of that.Our services, all backed by our commitment to quality service, includes:

Flight Bookings. You search from among 720 airlines, and your reservation is just a click away.

Accommodation. Hotels, guesthouses, hostels, and apartments: our discounts are big, and our partners are global.

Rental Cars. Find the best deal by comparing choices from all the rental providers.

Cruises. Whatever you want to do and wherever you want to go, you can search and save top cruises.

All-Inclusive Packages. When you use more than one service at a time, you get an even better deal.

Tours / Activities. We have done research into your destination so that you don’t have to.

Transfers. It is not always clear what the most reliable transfer is at a specific transport, so we show you the way: private transfers, shared shuttles, mini buses, or coaches.

Insurance. Our affordable options protect you and your loved ones from expected medical expenses while you’re away from home.

Visas. Our booking tool is totally straightforward.
Our user-friendly platform puts worldwide, eco-friendly travel right in your hands. You just choose where you want to go, and we offset your emissions for free. Our prices are low, and we donate a portion of our earnings to tree-planting and other environmental projects to help offset your travel emissions. So far, we have removed 288,000 pounds of carbon from the atmosphere, and we’re just getting started.Our planet needs your support, help us spread the word! Our Unique FeaturesGet the insights of your travel and a complete summary when comparing flight options from Price and Trip Duration to Comfort and Amenities to Eco Efficiency.Be kinder to the planet by reviewing actual fuel and CO2 emissions data. Of course, we will be offsetting your emissions for free. Together we can help save our planet, one travel booking at a time. Why Trees Can Fly?
Low competitive prices everyday so you can save more.
Search for a wide variety of travel products that include flights, hotels, car rentals, cruises, packages, activities, transfers, insurance and visas.
An Overall Smart Score with your flight search results (see above).
A portion of our earnings is contributed to offsetting your travel emissions. 
In addition to offsetting your travel emissions, we donate 10% of net profits into the environment. 
100% free to use.
 What We Need & What You GetWe need your help, friends, in order to expand our business and transition from the beta stage. With this campaign, we are looking to raise 50,000 USD, a portion of which will also be used to pay for a high-quality marketing campaign.There are three distinct phases to this project. First, we develop. That includes the website, the product, and the mobile app. That will take up to six months. Second, we test. At this point, we make sure that everything is running smoothly, our bookings going through without fail. Third, we review. Here we’re emphasizing the product launches and the marketing execution.As a thank-you, we have put together some awesome rewards for you, our earliest adopters, the people who believe in us most, the people whom we couldn’t do this without.Other Ways You Can HelpIn addition to making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign link on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram so that all your friends and family know this option is out there. You can get on board with this campaign and join our movement into the future now.We appreciate all your support, monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for your time.We can't do this without you. About Trees Can FlyWith more than 25 years of aviation experience, our team of professionals have become masters in sustainability, emissions management, financial control, risk management, operations management, and project management. Our team has worked for various airlines,  industry and sustainability organizations. We are also members of several professional and sustainability organisations.  Our perks5 USD –  Return Carbon-Neutral Flight Discount . You pay what our employees pay. Redeem your 1 Return Flight Discount after purchasing this perk by visiting www.treescanfly.com/redeem . Be sure to also share this amazing campaign on Facebook with your friends. That’s it! No travel expiry. (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).10 USD – Join the movement now! Surprise Gift – just tweet us @trees_can_fly with #IwantTreesCanFly or share this campaign on Facebook to receive a surprise gift and a twitter follow-back.25 USD – Become an Ambassador. A tree planted in your name and your name recognition on our website for life.49 USD – Personal Gratitude. Plant a tree for you and your loved one. Handwritten personalized thank you note from our founder and a personalized certificate. 99 USD – Go on your journey now. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral with 2 return flight discounts when you book your next vacation with us. You pay what our employees pay. No travel expiry. (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).199 USD – Plan in advance and make the leap. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral with 4 return flight discounts when you book your next vacation with us. You pay what our employees pay. No travel expiry. (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).299 USD –  Start plotting your adventures for some time to come. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral with 6 return flight discounts when you book your next vacation with us. You pay what our employees pay. No travel expiry. (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).499 USD –  Get all your vacation plans on the map. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral with 8 return flight discounts when you book your next vacation with us. You pay what our employees pay. No travel expiry. (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).999 USD – The future is big: make an adventure out of it. Travel to any destination in the world carbon-neutral with 10 flight discounts when you book your next vacation with us and receive a limited-edition Trees Can Fly Champion Bamboo Fleece Hooded Sweatshirt. You pay what our employees pay. No travel expiry! (Amount of discount varies. We purchase tickets at wholesale and offer them to you at our wholesale pricing. No mark-ups).9,999 USD - Your Life, Don't Hold Back. story:
WHY WAS GUAC BOX CREATED?

Guacamole is great everywhere - the beach, the office, tailgates, dorm rooms, parties, planes, campsites - but making guac in any of these places is difficult. 

Guac Box was created to simplify guacamole and alleviate the burden of unwieldy tools, utensils, and spices needed to make guac on the go. 

If you enjoy making guacamole, then you're going to love Guac Box. 

 

 

WHAT IS GUAC BOX?

Designed for adventure, Guac Box is The Guacamole Toolbox: a compact and comprehensive kit containing the tools you need to make guacamole anywhere. 

 

CONTAINER

Strong, sturdy, spacious, and with a thin depth profile, the container was designed to easily fit into a backpack without sacrificing capacity. It holds 750mL of guacamole (think 3/4 of a Nalgene or about 4 avocados worth).

 

CUTTING BOARD TOP

Secure, intelligent, and low profile, the container top maintains a tight seal and offers a clean cutting board surface thanks to its low-profile wall design.

The center piece also intelligently secures the magnetic fin tool for easy transport. 

 

SPICE SHAKERS

Compact, convenient, and multi-purposed, the four shakers securely hold granular spices or liquids of your choosing, and also fit perfectly into each corner of the container. Unscrew the entire top for a quick refill, then use the flip top to quickly and efficiently dispense spices or liquids. 

The built-in magnets attach to the metal embedded in the container bottom for secure transport. Flip each shaker over and the magnets attach to the same embedded metal  to create legs. Perfect for guac presentation!  

 

FIN TOOL

Inspired by surfboard fins, the fin tool is as functional as it is beautiful. Easily and safely open, slice, scoop, and mix your avocado, then use it to serve your guacamole. The fin tool fits the avocado shape perfectly and both cuts and scoops better than a knife or a spoon. 

 

HOW WAS GUAC BOX CREATED?

In the summer of 2016, I started Aquacado, a mobile stand that served guacamole, as a fun weekend business. I knew that making guac on the go was complicated. I learned that making guac on the go at scale is even tougher.

It was in this beachside stand in Connecticut where I decided that it was time to create a product that simplified guacamole, and it was here where I committed to making Guac Box a reality.

 

THE DEVELOPMENT PROCESS

After the summer season, I contacted a local engineering firm.

Over the past year we’ve been working together to bring Guac Box from my initial sketches to the working prototype you see in this campaign.

 

MATERIALS AND DIMENSIONS

The prototype you see in this campaign was 100% 3D printed. In full production, Guac Box will be made of BPA-free polycarbonate, the same material used to make Nalgene water bottles. Guac Box was designed to handle many years of guacamole adventures and the materials were chosen to do the same. 

The container measures 5" wide by  8" long with a depth of 2" and a volume of 750 ml. 

Each spice shaker measures 1.75" across and 1.4" tall. 

The fin tool is 6" tall and measures 7.5" diagonally, from tip to base.

 

FUNDING REQUIREMENTS

Since the development process started in 2016, Guac Box has been completely self-funded. It's now reached a critical point where pre-sales are needed to cover the large upfront costs of transitioning the prototype to mass production.

I estimate the upfront cost of production to be $30,000.

Each tool (mold) for the plastic injection molding process costs between $5,000 and $10,000 and Guac Box will need 4 tools. The tools themselves are milled out of steel and will produce thousands of plastic pieces before requiring further investment.

Additional costs will include final engineering adjustments, manufacturing, assembly, packaging, and logistics costs. 

 

WHEN DID THE MAJOR MILESTONES OCCUR?

 

 

WHO'S BEHIND GUAC BOX?

I'm just a guy who's passionate about adventure and guacamole. Guac Box has been a really fun and rewarding side project that I've worked on over the past couple years and I'm very proud and excited to finally bring it to market. 

Thanks a lot for reading my story. Regardless of your decision to fund Guac Box or not, I appreciate your taking the time to check out this campaign. 

Live the dream,
Matt

story:
You don't need to travel to +100 countries to be an expert at preparing the perfect trip for you and your travel companions. MyTripID is a platform that can prepare your perfect trip in a matter of seconds. You can then post your TripID to get paired up with other interested travelers to join you on your adventure!  

 

 

 

Introduction

MyTripID is a travel service that orchestrates a beautiful itinerary and combines a social experience to connect travelers with similar interests.

No matter the length of your travel plans, this service can save you money and countless hours of planning. Wouldn't it be great to have your entire trip planned for you within a matter of seconds? Well, that is why we are here, to do just that!

This platform was created with the idea of traditional "travel agent" services in mind, but we focused on a crucial flaw that traditional services offered and aimed to fix it. Travel Agent services often ask for a premium and can take days to weeks to arrange an itinerary. MyTripID is fast and free for regular users. With simplified online user experience, this service is designed to be user friendly and accessible for all applicable ages (18-70+).

 

 

 

Creating a Travel Plan

This travel platform will offer a unique way of planning out your day to day that can be completed in a few easy steps. Our technology will use artificial intelligence to scan thousands of top-rated destinations and experiences to select the best options based on the criteria set by the traveler!

 

 

Travelers only need to complete basic information indicating: the destination, group size, travel dates, budget, and points of interest, and within seconds, MyTripID will plan the experience of a lifetime. All while saving time and money in the process.

But we didn't stop there...

 

 

A Unique Social Experience

We understand the difficulties involved with trying to make busy schedules match up with friends and family. This platform makes it possible to connect with other travelers that have similar interests.

 

MyTripID locates other travelers based on the criteria set in each individual user’s profile. 

This service also aims to keep all users safe, so we utilize a background checking software upon registration. This way we can be transparent about the potential travel partners that our users connect with.

 

 

This social platform offers travelers the ability to tell people about themselves and connect with those of similar interests and backgrounds that are also looking to travel.

It is designed to connect individuals with interests in traveling and to make the process easy, safe, and stress-free. Our intuitive infrastructure is built to service the needs of travelers, connect them with new people, and allow them to experience the trip of a lifetime.

When you complete your profile, you will have an opportunity to specify the type of individuals you would enjoy traveling with. There will be a large number of options available to ensure that we pair you up with travelers who share similar interests, background, etc. For example - Age Range, Gender, Race, Interests, etc. At the end of the trip, you'll have the ability to stay in touch with your new travel friends as well as rate your experience of traveling with them!

 

 

Perfect for All Types of Travel

Family Travel

With our advanced check-in features, this service makes it easy to keep track of all members of the group traveling together. Making it easy, safe, and reliable while traveling with loved ones.

 

Business Trips

This service is perfect for business professionals who are always on the move. We understand that life on the go can be challenging, but with the right tool, it doesn’t have to be. We make business trips easy. You focus on work; we’ll take care of the travel.

 

International and Domestic

MyTripID is perfect for any trip, it is not limited to international or domestic travel. We want to be able to support those looking to explore overseas for months at a time, and those looking for an adventure on their day off at home.

 

 

 

 

Back to Basics

We want to help facilitate the resurgence of travel after a challenging year in 2020. The goal is to create a safe platform where travelers can come and plan trips, meet new people, and have a stress-free experience while doing so. After a year that made the masses feel unsafe. Our service is something we believe can bridge the gap and connect people in a unique way.

The combination of custom travel itinerary and social connections makes this platform unique and expressive. Join us on the journey of returning to normalcy, and let it start with MyTripID.

 

To our supporters, we say…

 

 

The story 

MyTripID can highlight stories such as that of Amy and Mang, two young women from China who used MyTripID to organize a trip together. Amy is a 24-year-old International Economics student at the prestigious Tsinghua University located in Beijing China. Amy relocated to the U.S. upon receiving her college degree. By using MyTripID, Amy was able to connect with Mang, who had also just recently moved to the U.S. from China just about a year prior. 

Mang had come from Shanghai where she worked as an automotive executive and relocated to the U.S. to take a new role with Chevrolet. Both women were interested in exploring the U.S. and MyTripID helped facilitate the connection between the two based on information provided through our platform. 

 

Now the two can enjoy a fully customized travel experience together and they have the ability to connect with each other on all future traveling with MyTripID. 

 

 

Our Team

Our team is comprised of a group of developers, travel enthusiasts and friends located in Southern California. A large part of our business requires travel. With over a decade of experience developing various products and platforms, we decided to create a platform that will change travel forever. 

 

 

 

Perks 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

This may be MyTripID's first indiegogocampaign, but we, the founders, have over 15 years of experience developing, designing, testing, and launching our projects around the world. We understand the risks and challenges of the development process, therefore we conduct thorough testing of all projects before they are released to the market. Unexpected problems can arise, and if they do, we always address them in a way that puts our customer's satisfaction at the top of our list of priorities. In short, we know what we are doing, and you can be very confident that we will deliver.

 

 

 

Why are we here

  • We have simplified functionality that allows you to create a tour itinerary
  • Unique social platform that allows you to share tours and invite others to join your trip
  • User-friendly interface with a function for people with disabilities
  • The main tour builder functionality will always be 100% free
story_txt:
You don't need to travel to +100 countries to be an expert at preparing the perfect trip for you and your travel companions. MyTripID is a platform that can prepare your perfect trip in a matter of seconds. You can then post your TripID to get paired up with other interested travelers to join you on your adventure!     IntroductionMyTripID is a travel service that orchestrates a beautiful itinerary and combines a social experience to connect travelers with similar interests.No matter the length of your travel plans, this service can save you money and countless hours of planning. Wouldn't it be great to have your entire trip planned for you within a matter of seconds? Well, that is why we are here, to do just that!This platform was created with the idea of traditional "travel agent" services in mind, but we focused on a crucial flaw that traditional services offered and aimed to fix it. Travel Agent services often ask for a premium and can take days to weeks to arrange an itinerary. MyTripID is fast and free for regular users. With simplified online user experience, this service is designed to be user friendly and accessible for all applicable ages (18-70+).   Creating a Travel PlanThis travel platform will offer a unique way of planning out your day to day that can be completed in a few easy steps. Our technology will use artificial intelligence to scan thousands of top-rated destinations and experiences to select the best options based on the criteria set by the traveler!  Travelers only need to complete basic information indicating: the destination, group size, travel dates, budget, and points of interest, and within seconds, MyTripID will plan the experience of a lifetime. All while saving time and money in the process.But we didn't stop there...  A Unique Social ExperienceWe understand the difficulties involved with trying to make busy schedules match up with friends and family. This platform makes it possible to connect with other travelers that have similar interests. MyTripID locates other travelers based on the criteria set in each individual user’s profile. This service also aims to keep all users safe, so we utilize a background checking software upon registration. This way we can be transparent about the potential travel partners that our users connect with.  This social platform offers travelers the ability to tell people about themselves and connect with those of similar interests and backgrounds that are also looking to travel.It is designed to connect individuals with interests in traveling and to make the process easy, safe, and stress-free. Our intuitive infrastructure is built to service the needs of travelers, connect them with new people, and allow them to experience the trip of a lifetime.When you complete your profile, you will have an opportunity to specify the type of individuals you would enjoy traveling with. There will be a large number of options available to ensure that we pair you up with travelers who share similar interests, background, etc. For example - Age Range, Gender, Race, Interests, etc. At the end of the trip, you'll have the ability to stay in touch with your new travel friends as well as rate your experience of traveling with them!  Perfect for All Types of TravelFamily TravelWith our advanced check-in features, this service makes it easy to keep track of all members of the group traveling together. Making it easy, safe, and reliable while traveling with loved ones. Business TripsThis service is perfect for business professionals who are always on the move. We understand that life on the go can be challenging, but with the right tool, it doesn’t have to be. We make business trips easy. You focus on work; we’ll take care of the travel. International and DomesticMyTripID is perfect for any trip, it is not limited to international or domestic travel. We want to be able to support those looking to explore overseas for months at a time, and those looking for an adventure on their day off at home.    Back to BasicsWe want to help facilitate the resurgence of travel after a challenging year in 2020. The goal is to create a safe platform where travelers can come and plan trips, meet new people, and have a stress-free experience while doing so. After a year that made the masses feel unsafe. Our service is something we believe can bridge the gap and connect people in a unique way.The combination of custom travel itinerary and social connections makes this platform unique and expressive. Join us on the journey of returning to normalcy, and let it start with MyTripID. To our supporters, we say…  The story MyTripID can highlight stories such as that of Amy and Mang, two young women from China who used MyTripID to organize a trip together. Amy is a 24-year-old International Economics student at the prestigious Tsinghua University located in Beijing China. Amy relocated to the U.S. upon receiving her college degree. By using MyTripID, Amy was able to connect with Mang, who had also just recently moved to the U.S. from China just about a year prior. Mang had come from Shanghai where she worked as an automotive executive and relocated to the U.S. to take a new role with Chevrolet. Both women were interested in exploring the U.S. and MyTripID helped facilitate the connection between the two based on information provided through our platform.  Now the two can enjoy a fully customized travel experience together and they have the ability to connect with each other on all future traveling with MyTripID.   Our TeamOur team is comprised of a group of developers, travel enthusiasts and friends located in Southern California. A large part of our business requires travel. With over a decade of experience developing various products and platforms, we decided to create a platform that will change travel forever.    Perks    Risks and challengesThis may be MyTripID's first indiegogocampaign, but we, the founders, have over 15 years of experience developing, designing, testing, and launching our projects around the world. We understand the risks and challenges of the development process, therefore we conduct thorough testing of all projects before they are released to the market. Unexpected problems can arise, and if they do, we always address them in a way that puts our customer's satisfaction at the top of our list of priorities. In short, we know what we are doing, and you can be very confident that we will deliver.   Why are we here
We have simplified functionality that allows you to create a tour itinerary
Unique social platform that allows you to share tours and invite others to join your trip
User-friendly interface with a function for people with disabilities
The main tour builder functionality will always be 100% free

story:
Let’s face it, existing wheeled bags just aren’t designed to go off-road; they can’t even cope with curbs without falling over.

Trailpod is a go-anywhere, adaptable holdall with ingenious all-terrain wheels, designed around the real world of gravel, grass, mud, sand and curbs.

We developed Trailpod to help you enjoy life’s outdoor adventures to the full. Trailpod has a strong exoskeleton structure with three rugged wheels and a modular bag system to adapt to your activity.

The large 60 litre storage capacity includes removable bags and netting compartments to carry everything you need, with plenty of versatile packing options to accommodate the perpetual “one last thing”. The rotating handle can be folded down and the frame is collapsible so that Trailpod fits neatly in the trunk of your car as well as compactly stored at home.

We combined a tough, impact resistant exoskeleton with hard-wearing fabrics to create a bag that protects your stuff. Trailpod is designed with go-anywhere ruggedness in mind.

Traditional bags have hard, skinny wheels, like a road bike; and you wouldn’t take a road bike down an off-road trail. More like a mountain bike, Trailpod takes rough terrain in its stride.

Trailpod uses our patented Camba wheel technology which allows Trailpod to effortlessly carry your heavy gear over uneven ground.

Camba's novel suspension combines a hemispherical wheel with a ‘floating’ independent axle system. The large footprint of the hemi-spherical wheel spreads the load so they don’t sink or dig into soft surfaces. The floating axle allows the wheel to overcome obstacles that smaller fixed axles fail to manage.

Trailpod has three big wheels so it’s always stable and rolling whatever the obstacle. Nobody enjoys the experience of dragging a reluctant two-wheeled bag as it falls over onto its side and grinds to a halt; Trailpod is always the right way up.

The pull handle is free to rotate, meaning no more awkward wrist strain caused by unstable two-wheeled bags with stiff, un-ergonomic handles.

(Photograph of prototype. Production Trailpod will have grippy rubber wheels)


At the heart of Trailpod is a reinforced polymer exoskeletal structure, big enough to swallow up your gear and strong enough to sit on. The handle folds down to provide cup holders, or a very convenient seat!

We have developed a modular bag system which clips into the frame, providing more packing options and enabling Trailpod to be adapted to your gear and lifestyle.

Trailpod incorporates a removable cool bag for food and drink, which doubles as a general storage compartment. There’s also a multi-pocketed bag for mobiles, tablets etc., plus adjustable netting for loose items or for when you need to separate wet clothes from the dry.

Take a look at what the team will be packing in their Trailpods:



Join the revolution and help bring Trailpod to people with a passion for the outdoors. People like us. Let Trailpod bear the load and add style to your adventure.

With your help, we will complete the product development and take our concept through manufacture and on the trail to your door.

The Trailpod prototype filmed in our campaign video looks the part but has hard plastic wheels rather than grippy rubber tyres. We are developing an engineering prototype for full rugged testing and preparing our manufacture, assembly and QA processes. Once we are completely satisfied that Trailpod meets our criteria, we will commission the tooling and begin production. This is an iterative process and we will only press the button on production when we are happy we have built a quality, fit-for-purpose product.

Your pledge will help us fund the injection moulding tooling necessary to produce the plastic components for the frame, purchase the bags and assemble, ship and distribute the perks.

Once you pledge, you'll be part of our journey. Throughout the campaign we'll be updating backers with photographs of our testing, prototype development and first production units. We hope you enjoy the ride!


Some images of our design story so far!

Testing the patented hemispherical Camba wheels off-road

Trailpod is the brainchild of an experienced team of designers who create world leading luggage and travel goods for businesses such as Samsonite and Pelican.

The team also has a proven track record with crowd-funded projects and has been responsible for indiegogo success stories including the gravity powered LED light for GravityLight.org, and the ROK Coffee Grinder, take a look at Therefore.com for more.

Trailpod is about rugged simplicity, practicality and ease of use. We have avoided gadgets and electronic features, to minimise complexity and the risk of things going wrong.

FAQ: Prototype in the video:

We built a prototype Trailpod to test the ergonomics and bag design, and to film for the campaign video so the final product will look slightly different to this prototype.

In particular, the wheels in the production Trailpod will be made of heavy-duty rubber with off-road tread. We’ll post pictures as soon as we have updates to show you.

FAQ: Modular bag system - new or different bags:

Our unique modular bag system allows different bags and accessories to be attached to Trailpod's frame. We are offering Trailpod with our general purpose insulated storage compartment, and a removable bag with multiple zipped pockets and adjustable netting. It’s our plan to offer indiegogo pledgees a special discount on any subsequent bag designs we release, once we’ve reached our target and the perks have been fulfilled. In time we aim to release further complementary bag designs; one variant will be a single removable liner that fits the whole interior.

FAQ: Will there be other colours?

In short, watch this space.

We picked a universal colour scheme for this indiegogo launch which we hope covers a broad range of tastes. With sufficient demand during this campaign, we are hoping to offer alternative fabric bag accent colours but this will rely on minimum order quantities being achieved.

We are working with our fabrics manufacturer to find different coloured materials which will not impact our delivery schedule, which we hope to include as stretch goals if we meet our funding target.

We cannot offer different colour frames for Trailpod at this stage but this is one of our longer term aims.

FAQ: How weatherproof is it?

You can wheel Trailpod through wet grass and sand, just don't take it swimming!

We will be using fabrics for the bags that can withstand the rigors of the outdoors.

The bottom of the bag is a plastic coated fabric and is waterproof so you won’t have to worry too much about rolling through puddles and mud.

Trailpod uses water resistant zippers throughout, which repel rain but are not completely waterproof. The main bag fabric will bead water in the rain, but will retain moisture after a while. A water resistant lining on the inside of the bag serves to protect your stuff.

FAQ: Trailpod specification:

  • Capacity : 60 litres
  • Weight : 8.8 lbs (4 kg) [empty]
  • Height: 39 inches (100 cm) [with handle up]
  • Height: 26 inches (67 cm) [with handle down]
  • Width : 18 inches (45 cm) [maximum]
  • Width : 12 inches (30 cm) [when folded]
  • Bags: 600D Polyester, double coated with PU, and with water resistant zippers
  • Netting and straps: Synthetic netting and PP webbing

FAQ: Materials:

  • Bag bottom: 600D Polyester, double coated with PU, and with water resistant zippers. Cool bag features EPE foam
  • Frame: Impact resistant glass fibre reinforced polymer
  • Wheels: Hard wearing, impact absorbent PU polymer foam
  • Fixings: All metal fixings on Trailpod are marine grade Stainless Steel

We will post more pictures of Trailpod when we get production samples in. Stay tuned!

FAQ: Feature details:

  • Removable insulated cool bag (25 litres)
  • Removable fabric bag with multiple pockets
  • Padded pockets with soft lining to protect sunglasses, smartphones and tablets
  • Adjustable netting to store loose items and wet clothing

Shipping: When will I receive my Trailpod?

We have every intention of shipping Trailpod to your doorstep next summer. No matter what, we will keep you completely up-to-date on our fulfilment progress.

Help us to reach your destination. Join us for the journey!

story:
We were thinking of something that we would actually use in real life, something that will solve to problems of our potential costumers, something what does not actually yet exists. Every person who once faced this problem will happily invest in something like this, even though it may take time to develop, we are sure that the future of dry hair and clothes are in our hands. The concept is very easy and useful. You just charge this awesome product from a wall-socket or a portative charger because oh wow it's a usb connector on the other side of a cabel. And after about three-hour-charge you have your hairdryer that works up to 2 hours without any recharge or so.

  • 3 heat and 2 speed settings give you versatile styling options
  • Cool shot setting sets hair in place to preserve your style
  • 1875W AC motor delivers salon-worthy power to dry hair fast
  • Ceramic and tourmaline technologies produce superior styling results while minimizing heat damage
  • Removable filter lets you clean it out regularly to keep your dryer performing at its best

story:
Have you ever forgotten to switch your bicycle tail light ON?  


 

You can put yourself in great danger when riding without your tail light “ON” at night. 
     I personally experienced that many time before, especially when I was in a hurry to go somewhere.  Hurrying makes people forget things.  That’s the reason why we developed this smart tail light,  

    “Beacon-R” help prevent YOU from forgetting to switch “ON” your tail light and putting YOURSELF in a DANGEROUS situation. 
 

What make Beacon-R so special?  Why choose Beacon-R? 

 

      Beacon-R is an AFFORDABLE smart tail light built in with NOT only movement detection mechanism but also a smart light sensor.  The tail light will start operating when low-light-level conditions and movement are detected.   It is a BUTTONLESS smart tail light. 

    These mechanism help MAXIMISING the battery life by turning off the light when you don’t need the light.  Furthermore, the product is powered by a RECHARGEABLE lithium polymer .  One single charge allows the light work CONTINUOUSLY up to 27 hours.  Cyclists no longer need to suffer from buying expensive button cells or alkaline batteries to keep their light running.  

      The casing of the product is made of AIRCRAFT-GRADE ALUMINIUM ALLOY, it is a LIGHT WEIGHT and COMPACT tail light, and it is IPx5 water resistant.  Cyclists never have to worry about the rain going inside the light.
Auto Switch On when movement detected
You will never need to worry about forgetting switching your tail light ON.

Auto OFF in 2 minutes when no movement detected
Don't worry about power wasted when you forget to switch the light OFF.

Auto Switch OFF in daytime
Support by Hi-Tech light sensor, the light will switch off automatically when the environment is bright enough. 

Quick Attach/Release
Not only attach and release quickly, but also FIT any size.


Recharging Indicator
It tells you if the light is recharging, and if the power is full.
Low power warning indication
battery level drop below 20%, there is a red blinking light remind you to recharge your tail light.


Hi-Tech Light Sensor/
Recharging Indicator Light/Micro USB Power Recharging
No more expensive button cell batteries or one-time-use batteries
Aircraft Grade Aluminum  Alloy
No cheap plastic, we choose Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy for stronger and ultra-weight feature.
Tiny Size
Size matters, don't let big and ugly bicycle tail light ruin your cool bike.

Ultra Light Weight
30g only.
Many people spend a lot of money to put off every possible gram from their bicycle part, don't let heavy bicycle  tail light fail your effort.


Specification:

Product Materials:  Aluminium Housing, Silicon strap
Light Sources:          1x Red LED
Size:                              Ø26.5mm*35.5mm
Weight:                        30 grams
Beam Distance:        800 meters 
Power Sources:        200 mAh, Lithium Polymer 
Runtime:                      Approx’ 27 hours
Features:                     Blinking only, auto “ON"
                                         when movement detected and light conditions below 100lux, 
Water Resistant:     IPx5

 

Status

Our prototypes have been well developed and thoroughly tested. 
We can guarantee that this product is ready for mass production and we surely can deliver the product to all backer within the timeline we promised,  the only thing missing is your support and your pledges.   

Timeline

MANUFACTURING BEGINS IN AUGUST, REWARDS BEGIN SHIPPING IN LATE SEPTEMBER

story:
Ever dreamed of a truly portable drone?

Mid-sized and larger drones have many advantages over their smaller brothers: longer flight times, higher payloads (better/bigger cameras, extra battery, etc.), higher wind resistance.

However, larger drones bring problems with transportation. Probably, each drone owner thought about an easier way to carry his copter. So our team has developed a brand-new option. Meet the Xcompact!

How does it work

This project follows the concept of famous LEGO© toys, when from a fixed set of parts you can make almost everything. We picked a set of "bricks" which allows you to build a rich variety of drones. Along with standard parts we have designed custom, multifunctional components to make the models flexible and ultraportable.

Same parts - 3 Kits - Different purposes

Model S

  • This is a 400 class frame, designed for 8-9 inch propellers. 
  • Will work perfectly with GoPro©. 
  • By using an upgrade kit you can extend the antivibration module to 3 levels (one appears below core tubes). This allows you to attach the battery to the antivibration module at the bottom increasing the damping efficiency.

Model M

  • With size up to 610 mm, this frame flies with 10-14 inch propellers. 
  • Capable of carrying a mirrorless camera. 
  • With an upgrade kit you can add a support module at the middle of the core tubes. This would prevent the antivibration module from bending (in case of heavy loads) and bring an option for retractable landing gear.  

Model L

  • This frame can reach 800 mm and fits for 15-18 inch propellers. 
  • Will easily lift a mirrorless camera and capable of carrying a DSLR. 
  • An upgrade kit will extend the antivibration module adding extra battery space for longer flight times.   


Who will like the Xcompact

Beginners: Our frames feature simple and intuitive assembly process. With ultimate flexibility of Xcompact you learn by trying different set-ups. Therefore, for your first project our platform will be the best option. Don't struggle with a painful choice any more! 

Amateurs: Already familiar with DIY multirotors? Then you would appreciate the portability of Xcompact, which saves your space making your hobby more joyful.

Professionals: Know exactly what you need? With Xcompact you choose the drone size and customize the vibration isolated module upon your desire.

Business and education: Due to modular design the Xcompact platform is easily adaptable for various applications and extremely cheap in maintenance.


Rewards

Stretch goals

Other ways you can help

Feel free to write us your ideas about our design or the project itself. We will be glad to hear your opinion and suggestions. Don't hesitate to ask questions, we are happy to give you an answer and will create FAQ following your inquiries.
Follow us in your favorite networks and share our progress among your friends.

This project is dedicated to special kind of people who are really into DIY concept. And we have to admit, that it is not easy to reach them.

Therefore, we are asking everybody to share this at local drone sites, on your mother tongue, as we want to get in touch with DIY enthusiasts from all over the world!


Risks & Challenges

Our team has been working for over a year on Xcompact and developed the key parts for the project. We know what will be the next steps towards series production. We have our suppliers and partners waiting and ready to start the production process.

However, we know that life is not always fully predictable and there might be unforeseen troubles waiting for us on the road to mass production.

The main challenges are:

Firstly, we need to reach minimum order quantity. Without that we can't start manufacturing. We hope we can get the minimal amount of orders to successfully start our company. We believe in our product and we have no doubt that it will be a step towards the future of drones.

Secondly, we need to ensure high quality of our products. We are planning to take counsel from professionals in order to find trustful suppliers. In mass production some percent of defective parts is unavoidable, so we are going to ship all components to Germany and check them personally before sending to you. 


Legal notice

LEGO ™ & © The LEGO Group
Phantom ™ & © DJI
GoPro ™ & © GoPro Inc
Delivery of rewards is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed

Timeline

"Repair your cart in December, in July your sledge remember"

Winter is a perfect time for planning your future flights, start today with Xcompact!

After the complete system testing we are going to present a detailed report. Moreover we will offer power packs (motors, ESC, etc.) for our frames. We expect at least 15% bulk discounts from our partners (currently Emax). These power packs are not offered here because the obligatory fees would lessen your profit. 

The Team

We are an international team that gathered expertise to bring this project to life. Our goal is to deliver an innovative and high-quality product to the community of drone enthusiasts.
story_txt:
Ever dreamed of a truly portable drone?
Mid-sized and larger drones have many advantages over their smaller brothers: longer flight times, higher payloads (better/bigger cameras, extra battery, etc.), higher wind resistance.
However, larger drones bring problems with transportation. Probably, each drone owner thought about an easier way to carry his copter. So our team has developed a brand-new option. Meet the Xcompact!





How does it work
This project follows the concept of famous LEGO© toys, when from a fixed set of parts you can make almost everything. We picked a set of "bricks" which allows you to build a rich variety of drones. Along with standard parts we have designed custom, multifunctional components to make the models flexible and ultraportable.





Same parts - 3 Kits - Different purposes

Model S


This is a 400 class frame, designed for 8-9 inch propellers. 

Will work perfectly with GoPro©. 


By using an upgrade kit you can extend the antivibration module to 3 levels (one appears below core tubes). This allows you to attach the battery to the antivibration module at the bottom increasing the damping efficiency.



Model M



With size up to 610 mm, this frame flies with 10-14 inch propellers. 

Capable of carrying a mirrorless camera. 

With an upgrade kit you can add a support module at the middle of the core tubes. This would prevent the antivibration module from bending (in case of heavy loads) and bring an option for retractable landing gear.  



Model L


This frame can reach 800 mm and fits for 15-18 inch propellers. 
Will easily lift a mirrorless camera and capable of carrying a DSLR. 

An upgrade kit will extend the antivibration module adding extra battery space for longer flight times.   



Who will like the Xcompact

Beginners: Our frames feature simple and intuitive assembly process. With ultimate flexibility of Xcompact you learn by trying different set-ups. Therefore, for your first project our platform will be the best option. Don't struggle with a painful choice any more! 

Amateurs: Already familiar with DIY multirotors? Then you would appreciate the portability of Xcompact, which saves your space making your hobby more joyful.

Professionals: Know exactly what you need? With Xcompact you choose the drone size and customize the vibration isolated module upon your desire.

Business and education: Due to modular design the Xcompact platform is easily adaptable for various applications and extremely cheap in maintenance.

story:
Sunset Points (SP) is a co-working retreat focussed start-up for remote workers and digital nomads.
Our retreats are in stunning locations and are adventurous, highly collaborative, experiential and transformational for participants!

SP’s key point of difference from the competitors is our academic approach to developing and running high level professional development programmes and our team members experience in this space. We sculpt experiences specifically for our range of clients on a case by case basis.

Right up front, we would like to explain WHY?
we'd like your help

 

When the 3 co-founders first met during travels in New Zealand, we were all enthused by the symbiotic thinking that we shared. Over discussions about our own travel and life experience preferences the idea formed quickly of why a professional development retreat could benefit others in a more specific and personal way. And fundamentally how we as a team could bring our shared knowledge, values and lifetime experiences together in our various professional capacities. Blending our knowledge of the travel industry to make a significant and life-changing product that had a high level of meaning for our clients, rather than 'just a great holiday!'.

We're not saying that having a great holiday is not important, from all the fun travels we've had in our lives so far we know it is! In this business we've incorporated our clients bringing their work with them whilst travelling (co-working, remote working) and sharing some high level professional development experiences (that are far from the norm, read about LDEx!) and developing some amazing lifetime adventure travel experiences along the way.

We are excited about our project but, it's not going to be easy, so far its been a lot of work whilst juggling other jobs and we really need some more capital to make the bigger moves to a) put more time into the project and b) to get this out to a wider marketplace.

That's what your funding will help us to achieve. So please, jump on board and assist if you can, we will be eternally grateful and hope that we can meet you and share some experiences together soon!

You can pledge any amount of money and/or buy something from our list of perks, this could be a t-shirt, postcard or even get a cost price retreat!!, Its Xmas, buy a present here and you will help us on our path...

If you have any question, just send us an email: info@sunsetpoints.com

 

Let’s explain some key terms we are using

 

What is a  co-working retreat?

One of the coolest things is participants don’t have to take time off work to attend our retreats, work can come along too, hence remote workers and ‘co-working’.
We are planning to have monthly retreats in 2019:

  • New Zealand - PUNAKAIKI, South  Island »
  • New Zealand - CENTRAL OTAGO, South  Island »
  • Italy - TUSCANY and ROME»
  • Maldives - ARI ATOLL »

What is a Digital Nomad?

Over the last decade there has been a global shift to virtual offices and teams that has created a spike in growth of the ‘remote worker’. From this ‘remote worker’ a paradigm shift has occurred whereby the ‘digital nomad’ has evolved.

Professional development?

We believe that every single individual benefits hugely by investing in their personal and professional development.
Our SP retreats include a variety of development mechanisms on both a personal and professional level while participants have a great time with a bunch of likeminded people in cool locations. Places that we handpick from our own travels and our network of experience providers around the globe.

An example of a professional development component is the ‘Leadership Development Experience’ (LDEx), click here to learn more. Generally between 3-10 days in duration, the LDEx sees participants first learning the relevant skills for a wilderness journey and then executing the journey through a variety of landscapes and locations. LDEx has been developed by the SP New Zealand team and honed with numerous groups of high level thinkers in a variety of locations.

By use of LDEx, adventurous activities, case studies and networking workshops, personal outcomes are openly discussed and analysed. This analytical, reflective approach allows SP clients to ‘make sense’ of their transformation and see where valuable evolutions to their worldview. 

Our mission is to assist in the development of strong, vibrant, innovative and engaged leadership throughout the worlds industries by developing our global human resource, and we are looking to achieve this by sharing transformational retreats in stunning international locations.  

 

The Team:

We are three life lovers that crossed their lives by chance, and found out we had a lot in common!
The love for life, for travelling and for meeting new people and cultures to learn from "diversity".
Putting ourselves in a challenge is pretty normal, and we love to fight for our dreams and for what we believe in!

Zane Smith
Surfer, traveler, thinker, adventurer: Zane’s specialist Eco and Adventure Tourism career has spanned more than 20 Years and he’s often found chasing big waves or deep powder snow.

Sara Airoldi
Globetrotter, digital nomad & social anthropologist with 12 years experience in Tourism & Hospitality around the world and a long list of places still to discover...

Alessandra Mineo
Unicorn addicted, purple color lover. Always been a graphic & web designer, because that's what I love! Love what you do and you'll never work another day in your life.

To summarise

  • Amazing locations
  • Likeminded people
  • Transformational experiences, both personally and professionally
  • Organised adventurous and cultural activities whilst on retreat
  • Co-working, work comes too, the week can go unchanged apart form the location!
  • A vibrant working holiday!!!

story:
There is a very high probability that your tourist destination cannot be seen in China

Chinese people, like most people world-wide, start their plans for travel and holidays on the internet.

Chinese people searching the internet, will see about 25% of international tourist destinations given the slow responses times and blocked content.

There is a very high probability that your tourist destination content; website, video, images, social media, etc, cannot be seen in China.

WiTravel is fast to implement, available and working today, at 10% of costs to create an internet site

WiTravel “front ends” your existing internet site removing the need for a second site for the Chinese market;

  • Sufficiently reduces costs in developing a new internet for Chinese market: $400 to $600 not $4,000 to $6,000.
  • Sufficiently reduces implementation time: days not weeks or months.
  • Your Chinese internet enquiries and orders are processed by your existing internet systems and therefore removing the need to monitor and maintain a different system for the Chinese market.
  • No need to maintain two databases: product, prices, etc.
  • No need to maintain two systems: lowest operational costs.

Make your website be seen and be found on the Chinese internet

WiTravel allows you to use your existing internet site as we take a dynamic copy which enables;

  • Your travel destinations internet site to be seen in China
    • Replace blocked internet contents
    • Speed up your website response in China
    • Locally re-host multi-media allowing access in China
  • Allow your internet site to be found in China
    • Local hosting and domain name
    • Translate SEO data into Chinese
    • Chinese search engines submission

WiTravel platform is ready to give your business access to the Chinese internet

WiTravel Platform is available today. We have three packages as part of this campaign to get your business seen and found in China;

  • Early bird - 100 internet site available in China within 6 weeks from the end of this campaign
  • Summer special - Enabling your business to be seen and found on the China internet before the end of the summer
  • WTM ready - Internet site ready in China for the World Travel Market (November 2019)

Papers and on-line information

Supporting papers on trading on the Chinese internet are freely available to businesses and general public.

These papers include;

  • Chinese internet
  • Chinese internet publishing options
  • Chinese intellectual property rights
  • Testing your internet site in China
  • Chinese language on the internet

For papers and on-line information, please see www.accesstochina.com

story:
Market Need: Multitools are convenient products that offer a versatile array of hand tools and functions in a single unit. However, traditional multitools are not exactly easy to carry around every day. The products are large, sharp and too heavy to carry in your pocket. Instead, the tool is stored in the apocalyptic survival kit, the nostalgic camping bag or relegated to the car's glove compartment - defeating the purpose.

Solution: SUPRA is a Credit card-shaped multitool that offers several convenient tools and features in a compact design that fits in your wallet or keychain like any other key. The end result is a multifunctional tool ready to fight off spontaneous outbreaks of zombies (even the scary ones that run really fast...no one cares about the slow ones).

STATIC TOP FEATURES

 

 

The one piece tool offers the following: 

Tough and lightweight –  The blade is RWL34 Steel and its Handle and plier jaw is Titanium 

Tech Friendly –  used as a usb holder or at the back of your  phone 

14 tools in one – gets you out of trouble 

Adaptable – swappable handles and hex tools to customize your carry 

Airplane Friendly – * TSA compliant for carry-on ( Blades must be disassembled before boarding plane)

Compact – credit card format

Advanced Material – TITANIUM used in aerospace and military 

Pocket Friendly – perfect for everyday carry 

Australian – designed + manufactured in CHINA

 

 

 

How often do you find yourself in need of a tool for a quick fix? A loose screw, a non-twist bottle, a package to open. Often, the tool you need is buried in a drawer or lost in the garage, turning a 20 second job into 5-10 minutes.

Or worse, you find yourself in a tricky tool situation away from home.

TAG is the tool you keep with you. It's lightweight, compact, versatile and just might be your new best friend.

 

Designed by alexander Barak, the SUPRA is the perfect balance of design and function. Not only does the TITANIUM make it ultra lightweight and strong, it's the secret to SUPRA's patent pending design.

SUPRA is truly unique. All titanium.

Its design resulting in increased strength, stiffness and badassnes

 

 

 

The SUPRA is a world first patent pending design with a number of unique features:

 

All the tools you need The SUPRA comes with 14 tools featuring 5 metric wrenches, box cutter, bottle opener, standard with phillips and allen, flat head hex drives, wire cutter, usb flash memory, plier and knife.

with an Integrated socket The SUPRA makes using the screwdriver a pleasure by putting you in control. SUPRA will help you get the job done quickly: tightening screws, loosening bolts, prying things open and popping the top on your favorite beverage.

The SUPRA lets you store 2 standard hex drives within its body. A removable rubber bit holder secures a TAG bit. keeping the tools locked in place and ready when you need them.

 

All titanium the SUPRA is perfect to go where ever you do. Compact Packing over 14 tools in a pocket sized carry. 

And, since you'll barely notice this super slim multi-tool in your pocket, it's perfect for everyday carry. with out the blade It's also TSA-compliant so there is no need to worry about it when you board your next flight. 

SPECIFICATIONS WEIGHT 2.01 oz | 57 g The size the TAG credit cards tools are 85.60 × 53.98 mm (3.370 ×2.125 in) and rounded corners with a radius of 2.88–3.48 mm, in accordance with ISO/IEC 7810#ID-1, the same size as ATM cards and other payment cards, such as debit cards.

 

 

Tooling commenced! Yes that's right. Normally campaigns wait till the funds are received but we made the decision to launch into the production process. As a result we are already a number of weeks into tooling the molds needed for production and expect them to be ready in the next few weeks. As a result we will be delivering the SUPRA in time for September .

 

Back this project and you will be the first to receive TAG SUPRA. You also get special reduced indiegogo-only rates. Check out the rewards below and make your selection in the rewards list. 

We believe in the products we make, and have worked on perfecting every subtlety to make tools you can use and love. We hope you enjoy using them.

DEAR VISITOR - A WARM WELCOME The world of TAG dates right back to the year 2014, My idea was to manufacture a compact knife with an array of practical functions gave birth to the credit card multitool. As customer needs and technologies have changed over the years, the SUPRA fits into the requirement of a practical but durable tool capable of being handy at any time. For ultimate multi-tool that you can take with you everywhere you go, look no further than the SUPRA. no other tool enables you to do so much from such a small package. 

ALEXANDER BARAK CEO TAG (Tactical accessories and Gear)

 

WARRANTY INFORMATION

At TAG we pride ourselves on making responsible, durable goods. We guarantee your TAG to have the utmost quality in craftsmanship and workmanship for the life of the product. Our guarantee covers all production defects and failure of materials due to everyday use or typical wear. If any TAG multitool fails in its intended use, we will repair it for you or provide store credit in the amount of the purchase price.

 

We are very proud to work closely with our manufacture. They have been involved with the project since its concept so understand our requirements in detail. This ensures quality product is made and ready to be shipped in time. 

Unforeseen problems: 
One thing we've learnt after designing many products is that no matter what problems are presented there is always a solution. We always work hard to find the answers and the solutions that work.

We have always dealt with our customer service issues in a way that leaves every last customer happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.

Please email us at info@TAG-AIR.com if you have any direct questions or concerns.
