Compact Packing over 14 tools in a pocket sized carry. And, since you'll barely notice this super slim multi-tool in your pocket, it's perfect for everyday carry. with out the blade It's also TSA-compliant so there is no need to worry about it when you board your next flight. SPECIFICATIONS WEIGHT 2.01 oz | 57 g The size the TAG credit cards tools are 85.60 × 53.98 mm (3.370 ×2.125 in) and rounded corners with a radius of 2.88–3.48 mm, in accordance with ISO/IEC 7810#ID-1, the same size as ATM cards and other payment cards, such as debit cards.  Tooling commenced! Yes that's right. Normally campaigns wait till the funds are received but we made the decision to launch into the production process. As a result we are already a number of weeks into tooling the molds needed for production and expect them to be ready in the next few weeks. As a result we will be delivering the SUPRA in time for September . Back this project and you will be the first to receive TAG SUPRA. You also get special reduced indiegogo-only rates. Check out the rewards below and make your selection in the rewards list. We believe in the products we make, and have worked on perfecting every subtlety to make tools you can use and love. We hope you enjoy using them.DEAR VISITOR - A WARM WELCOME The world of TAG dates right back to the year 2014, My idea was to manufacture a compact knife with an array of practical functions gave birth to the credit card multitool. As customer needs and technologies have changed over the years, the SUPRA fits into the requirement of a practical but durable tool capable of being handy at any time. For ultimate multi-tool that you can take with you everywhere you go, look no further than the SUPRA. no other tool enables you to do so much from such a small package. ALEXANDER BARAK CEO TAG (Tactical accessories and Gear) WARRANTY INFORMATIONAt TAG we pride ourselves on making responsible, durable goods. We guarantee your TAG to have the utmost quality in craftsmanship and workmanship for the life of the product. Our guarantee covers all production defects and failure of materials due to everyday use or typical wear. If any TAG multitool fails in its intended use, we will repair it for you or provide store credit in the amount of the purchase price. We are very proud to work closely with our manufacture. They have been involved with the project since its concept so understand our requirements in detail. This ensures quality product is made and ready to be shipped in time. Unforeseen problems: One thing we've learnt after designing many products is that no matter what problems are presented there is always a solution. We always work hard to find the answers and the solutions that work.We have always dealt with our customer service issues in a way that leaves every last customer happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.Please email us at info@TAG-AIR.com if you have any direct questions or concerns.

story:
Meet Wigl!

Wigl is an interactive educational robot with a musical ear. 

Wigl hears notes (from any instrument) and responds with real-world movements, lights, and special dances! Kids, and adults, are motivated to practice their instrument. 

Through sequenced musical notes, you can program special dance moves for Wigl! The combination of right brain creativity with left brain logic makes this a unique robot for any family!


How does Wigl work?

Wigl has a microphone, a microcontroller (brain), and some motors for movement. Wigl is ALWAYS listening for musical notes, and through some complex math, it can hear individual music notes. There are two (2) modes built into Wigl:

(1) Auto Mode

When Wigl hears a musical note that it knows, it moves and lights up! Specific notes make Wigl move in specific ways. For example, an A might move Wigl forward, while a D could move Wigl backward. If you play a series of notes together to form a song, Wigl celebrates with a special dance!

(2) Programming Mode

Instead of Wigl moving once it hears a note, it stays still and stores it in its memory. Every note played is memorized, like lines of code in a computer program. Then, to run your Wigl program, you play a special "ENTER" note, and watch Wigl go!  

This is a fun way to problem solve (e.g. Wigl'ing out of a maze) and teach kids the basics of coding: notes as pseudo-code! 


Wigl is born

My 3rd grade music teacher gave me my first musical instrument, the recorder. Learning to play clean notes, practicing mundane songs... none of this was fun. Plus it was frustrating since I had to practice in a room, by myself. I wished I had a musical buddy that would enjoy my attempts, and dance to my music.

Flash forward 20 years later, and I still have that same desire (now with the ukulele). But this time, Wigl was there to help me out. If I didn't play a note correctly, Wigl wouldn't move. This motivation to see Wigl dance around kept me practicing, and even led me to learn songs!

After the first prototype was built in July 2013, we started testing the unit with the Renaissance School in Portland, OR. The kids loved the robot, but it didn't have a name (or a face) yet. 


With the help of some wonderful designers, we began implementing the kids' input and creating the outer form that you see today. From sketch, to clay mold, to 3D print, Wigl was born!

The past 16 months have been spent testing Wigl with hundreds of children and parents at local schools, museums, and children's events. We've taken all of that feedback and input and invented what we believe is a truly unique learning experience.

In November 2013, we entered Wigl into the Oregon Technology Business Center's (OTBC) Electronic Systems Pitch competition and were awarded the grand prize for our technology approach and business model.

A few months later, in March 2014, we entered Robohub / SV Robo's international Robot Launch 2014 competition and won two awards. The first was the "Crowd Pleaser", awarded by Indiegogo, for having the best chance of going viral. The second was the "Leanest Startup" award for frugal use of funds and updating Wigl through continuous customer feedback. 

The positive reception, both from the kids and the startup community, has given us the confidence to bring Wigl to classrooms and homes everywhere.

Let's make little engineers

I'm an engineer, and I can see that there is a worldwide shortage of quality engineers. People seem to believe that strong Math skills are the most important prerequisite for being an engineer. However, I think that creative problem solving is far more important, and is really the foundation of Engineering. With Wigl, we can develop this skill and get kids excited about Engineering!


Think outside the tablet

Today's robots for children require a separate screen interface (e.g. computer, smartphone, tablet) for control, and this causes the majority of their attention to be focused on that screen. We want to reduce screen-time, and I believe that direct interaction with an educational robot will enhance their learning and creativity. 


Wigl Perk Levels

The Wigl T-Shirt will be produced locally, navy blue with a white logo:


How will your funds help?

Our team has gone through five (5) different iterations to bring you the version that you see today. Each of these iterations included additional features/functionality that parents and children helped us identify. We've crossed major hurdles in note recognition, noise cancellation, and even majorly altered the internal components to bring the cost down.

With this current prototype, we are at the final hurdle. And we need your help to get Wigl out to children everywhere! 

Your funds will be used to cover the costs of production-quality plastics, professional PCB (printed circuit board) design, and improved functionality. We will be working with wonderfully talented Industrial Designers to prepare Wigl for mass production, and a quality Electronics Manufacturing to ensure high reliability circuitry!

Most of all, your donation will help us create a new type of educational robot. One that explores the creativity of children, without requiring a separate smart device / screen for control. 

Let's create a new generation of educational robotics for children!


About Wigl's Creator

Hi! I'm Vivek Mano, the creator of Wigl. I'm an Electrical Engineer from the University of Florida.  While at UF, I created my first robot, an autonomous tennis-ball retrieving robot. Since then, I've had fun building various other hobby robots.

For the past 8 years, I have been involved in Sales, Marketing, and Business Development within the Industrial Automation industry (big robots). But my background, and my passion, is in embedded electronics and robotics (smaller robots). Being able to combine both experiences is what led to Wigl.


Wigl in the News

GoLocalPDX: http://www.golocalpdx.com/lifestyle/wigl-a-dancing-robot-that-teaches-children-to-play-instruments. 

OTBC (Oregon Technology Business Center) Hardware Pitch 2013 Winner: http://otbc.org/node/600. 

Robohub Robot Launch 2014 "Crowd Pleaser" and "Lean Startup" awards: http://robohub.org/meet-the-winners-of-robot-la.... 

  


Risks and Challenges

Manufacturing

Creating the plastics tool (mold) takes anywhere from 20-30 weeks to be built. There is also a risk that first series articles will have slight abnormalities that need to be fixed. By using local manufacturing for both plastics and electronics, we will minimize those risks! 

Ambient noise

Since Wigl listens to everything, it's best used in a quiet environment. Having a TV on in the background, or in a group setting with people talking, causes Wigl to "hear" non-musical notes. Just like most sound-recognition devices (e.g. Siri), the quality of sound is paramount. 

We'll be working hard to minimize that through creative software and circuit designs. My Electrical Engineering background will come in handy! 


Frequently Asked Questions

Will Wigl work with any instrument?
YES! Wigl listens to everything: recorder, guitar, ukulele, flute, fiddle, bagpipes, a singer's voice... anything that produces musical notes can control Wigl.

Wigl cannot distinguish individual notes from percussive instruments, such as drums. 

How is Wigl powered?
Since Wigl is propelled by high quality DC motors, a 9V battery is used.

How does Wigl hear songs?
Just like the celebration dance to "The Lion Sleeps Tonight" in the video, Wigl dances when it hears complete songs and song snippets! Wigl listens for the correct sequence of notes, and if it likes what it hears, you'll know it! 

For which notes does Wigl listen?
Wigl listens for E5, F5, G5, A5, B5, C6, and D6. 

Credits

Huge thanks to the folks that make Wigl look as great as it works!

Ali Greer - Video

Sage Warner - Graphics

Adam Horbinski - Industrial Design

story:
中文版                                               

Have these ever happened to you?

Having your backpack soaked in the rain?

The laptop in the backpack being damp?

Your important documents getting soggy?

Having mold-growth in your backpack due to humidity?

Now your problems can be solved!


The world’s most useful rain cover for backpacks has been generated.

From now on, you can leave all your previous problems behind. 

Whether you are biking, traveling, going for an outing, or going to work, you no longer need to worry about the contents in your bag, because R-Cover takes care of everything.

How to get Your R-COVER For Free!

What is R-Cover?

R-Cover is the world’s best backpack rain-proof cover. 

Unlike the ordinary rain cover that only protects one type of backpack, R-Cover provides protection to backpacks ranging from 16L to 34L in size. 

We intend to provide an option for waterproof and protection of backpacks for activities in the city, hence the design of R-Cover. 

It is now a satisfaction to participate in any outdoor exercise in the city.


To achieve this goal, we have equipped R-Cover with the following features:


Water-proof        easily stored       and easily used


We ran tests for a total of 49 backpacks and received excellent protection results.

Maybe you can use your backpack to run the 50th test for us!


Waterproof process is what R-Cover cares the most.
The water resistance of R-Cover fabric is as high as 3000 mm.

1,400 mm and below—For typical rainfall in the city for which an umbrella is needed

7,000 mm—For heavy rainfall which hurts when hitting on the skin

10,000 mm—For water pressure equivalent to that of a firefighting water jet


Therefore, a water resistance of 3,000 mm is more than enough for any outdoor activity in the city


Apart from essential waterproof processing, we also prepared R-Cover with water repellent for protection against splashing.


How R-Cover Works 

R-Cover is simple to use. 

You only need to fasten the three Velcro pieces, pulls down the fabric, and cover your backpack. 

Storage of R-Cover

It only takes 30 seconds to store R-Cover or get R-Cover ready for use.

Any backpack owner can easily get R-Cover ready for use.

Easier and Faster Way to Protect Your Backpack

If you hold on to the tag with the logo on it, storing R-Cover becomes a quick and easy job.


R-Cover gives you an option to quickly protect your backpack in rain. 

When it suddenly rains while you are on your way to work or to an outdoor activity,you only need to take out R-Cover and shield your backpack for a quick and efficient protection.

Moreover,the Velcro design helps R-Cover to secure any backpack ranging from 16L to 33L in size,helping you carry out any activity in the city problem-free.

The product can be used in the following activities:







What other features does R-Cover have apart from covering any backpack?

Giving your backpack another layer of protection and preventing you belongings from being stolen when traveling with crowded public transportation on a rainy day.

Allowing quick and convenient access to things stored in your backpack.

Able to serve as a seat cover on a damp surface.

Long words short:R-Cover provides you with quick ways to solve various problems on a rainy day.


The Inspirations of R-Cover Patterns

We hope that R-Cover gives encouragement to its users every day, 

and therefore select the following three elements from many other ideas:


Ninja—We hope that this pattern gives you strength and patience of a ninja

Astro—We hope that this pattern inspires you to explore the world like an astronaut

Camo—We hope that this pattern helps you adapt to environmental changes like a soldier


Most importantly, we hope these patterns bring you passion for living as the previously mentioned professions.


Accessory—Carabiners

Maximum Weight Load: 400 lb

With extra accessories, it is even more convenient to carry and store R-Cover around—hanging R-Cover on your backpack as an accessory wherever you go and never need to worry about losing it.

You may also clip other personal belongings with your R-Cover!



Our Story

Treasure's is dedicated to manufacturing waterproof products. We hope to provide better waterproof care for your outdoor job tasks and activities, and R-Cover is our first creation.

In the past one and a half years, we studied the texture of different fabrics as well as the styles and characteristics of different backpacks. We hoped to create an item that can provide waterproof care to all kinds of backpacks. Multiple prototypes were created after many adjustments and discussions with experts and friends, which finally led to the birth of R-Cover. Despite the many challenges we experienced in the past one and a half years, we felt extremely happy and proud when we saw the final product. Our ideal product is finally completed, and we believe it can help more people better protect their precious belongings.

FAQ

Q: What are the key features of R-Cover?
A:R-Cover provides protection to backpacks ranging from 16L to 34L in size. 

Q: Can I wash R-Cover?
A: Yes, you can

Q: When will I receive my order?
A: You will receive your order in August/September  2016. For more details check out our timeline on the campaign page.

Q: Is shipping included in the perks?
A: Shipping costs are not included in the perk prices.When you select a perk, and advance to the contribute page, the shipping price is added when you select your country.Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries (only applicable outside US/EU).

Q: Is R-Cover available in my country?
A: Yes, we deliver to all countries in which Indiegogo is available, unless your country is an embargoed nation.

Q: How can I complete my order?
A: After choosing a perk, you will be directed to the payment page.Here you can fill out your shipping and credit card information or choose paying with PayPal.

Q: I don't have a credit card.What now?
A: If you don’t have a credit card, you can set up a PayPal account.

If you have any question,you can use indiegogo's message or emil to us.
our email:passionkey580gmail.com
If you have interest or any question. we look forward to hearing from you. :)

story:
Why did we make it?

We at Nobleman decided to create something totally unique. We offer a helmet that provides lots of safety while being different. Most helmets are one color or multiple colors but they do not change color. Meaning over time it becomes boring in all situations. We took a different approach, during sunny days the color is fun and different. When riding in the evening or at the dark time the color goes back to its natural habitat (white). During different times of the day (depending on the light exposure) the helmet will vary in shade, resulting in a unique and special experience. You can even impress others with such technology by covering the helmet then exposing it to the sun. Making special and fun shapes that disappear is oddly satisfying with our K2 helmet. By using our helmet you can bond and start conversations with new people which will always lead to great and special experiences.

Main features:

  • The brightest color works best from 10 am to 3 pm on a sunny day, but it varies slightly depending on your country and season.
  • Multiple vents for the best ventilation during hot and sweaty days. 
  • The removable and washable interior liner also aids in comfort. 
  • Multiple adjustments are available. Speed dial on the back and all straps are adjustable. 
  • Futuristic buckle system with magnetic locking mechanism it's easy and super simple to put on even with thick gloves. 
  • Straps are strategically placed to minimize injuries during a fall. Also comes with a removable, washable, and comfortable strap cover that sits perfectly under your chin. 

A breathable and comfortable helmet that can react to sunlight. The stronger the sun, the brighter the color change, and when it is night or cloudy, it will turn back to white. Includes a magnetic locking strap, super durable and super convenient. Currently, we provide five colors. After the crowdfunding is successful, we will provide more colors and sizes in the future.

Regarding the narrative of the NOBLEMAN, the original intention of establishing the NOBLEMAN brand is to make the NOBLEMAN the most cost-effective, high-quality, protective equipment. So users of NOBLEMAN can enjoy the fun of outdoor riding so that your love is no accident. Along the way, we have received thank-you letters from many users. This is the most sincere recognition of the NOBLEMAN team. NOBLEMAN will maintain its original intention to make the most cost-effective protective equipment while offering the safest protective equipment.

NOBLEMAN has a production plant of 10,000 square meters, a fully automatic assembly line, more than 30 intelligent injection molding equipment, 10 robotic arms and other top production equipment, and hundreds of sewing machines.
NOBLEMAN has experienced product designers and production personnel. From raw material research and development, product design, production to a complete set of processes, NOBLEMAN product categories cover helmets, protective gear, knitting, outdoor clothing, etc., to ensure that the best quality and most cost-effective High-end protective equipment.

  

 

NOBLEMAN team is a group of young people with original ideas. Our common vision is "you ride, we protect". Our cognition of products is based on our love of outdoor sports, we go deep into the community, understand the needs of the community, and make better designs.
story_txt:
Why did we make it?
We at Nobleman decided to create something totally unique. We offer a helmet that provides lots of safety while being different. Most helmets are one color or multiple colors but they do not change color. Meaning over time it becomes boring in all situations. We took a different approach, during sunny days the color is fun and different. When riding in the evening or at the dark time the color goes back to its natural habitat (white). During different times of the day (depending on the light exposure) the helmet will vary in shade, resulting in a unique and special experience. story:
Help us help you make more informed and personalized product choices. No more cheap thrills and expensive regrets!

We have developed a fully functional recommendation engine for the smart phone category of products as a prototype. 

Our software delivers recommendations based on customer’s word of mouth describing their product experiences. Enter your own priorities to get a better choice than one based on marketing hype and technical specifications. Sort of like Match.com for smart phones.

Our algorithms are able to discern the most important attributes of customer experience from the language people use to describe it, so you can choose which Smartphone suits your needs best based on your personal priorities. You are happier with your phone and there is less garbage on the planet. YAY! 

We need your support to take this project to the next development stage – a 15 product category portfolio. At this stage the project will become self-sustaining through membership support. 

Help us select the most relevant product categories - products that would be purchased more than once a year, have a relatively large number of online customer reviews AND/OR are expensive enough to care about their reputation.

Until now the project has been self-funded. Your financial support will fund software development, knowledge engineering and processing costs. $30,000 will get us there. Every dollar helps! Since we plan to crowdsource product experiences in an open and transparent way, it only makes sense to use IndieGoGo to crowdsource our initial funding.

  • Back us!

Please make a donation by clicking the red "Contribute Now" button on the right side. It's easy. 

  • Spread the word:

Post to Facebook, Twitter, Google+, send emails to friends. Visit our prototype and share this link!

  • Join us!

Give us your recommendations for product categories to include into our initial portfolio, contribute your personal experiences with these products.

story:
What is the TRAK XL?

We're excited to be here on Indiegogo to introduce our newest model!  The patent pending, TRAK XL, is a compact and lightweight everyday carry knife & tool featuring our secure grip design.  TRAK XL is proudly designed and handcrafted in the USA.  

Our Story:

In 2016 we launched our first knife design on Kickstarter for: "TRAK - Titanium Runner's Anywhere Knife".  Backers loved it and TRAK quickly became a success. 

The original concept for our TRAK design, was to function as a backup or "last ditch" knife for scuba divers caught in fishing line. We chose titanium because it was the perfect material for the job.  These design features also happen to make it the perfect knife for runners, hikers, camping, fishing or simply anyone looking for a personal, compact utility knife, which can be carried daily, securely.

Following the completion of this successful TRAK campaign, we soon started working on our next model.  Based on feedback received from backers, we knew  this new model had to share the same great features as the original design (lightweight, rustproof, compact, secure, and easy to carry), but at the same time stand out on its own.  We wanted something slightly bigger and with a larger cutting edge.  We also wanted to improve the sheath system so that it could be mounted in multiple positions depending on desired use. 

The new TRAK XL:

After nearly a year of developing, testing, and refining different variations, we’re incredibly excited to be back on Kickstarter and introduce this new model: The TRAK XL.

 

Blade Material Options:

The TRAK XL will be offered in 3 different blade steels:

1) Titanium:

Titanium - Recommended for runners, fishing, boating, scuba diving, or hikers looking for a 100% rust proof knife with good edge retention.  Non-Ferrous/Non-Magnetic.

The TRAK XL is available in military grade titanium (6AL-4V), which is typically found in military aircraft and aerospace. Some of the benefits of titanium are that it's lightweight, twice as strong as steel, rust proof, anti-corrosive, and non ferrous. The TRAK XL will hold up to any harsh conditions such as salt water, sweat, high humidity, or dirt without any sign of rust or corrosion. In fact, leave it at the bottom of the ocean for 100 years and it'll still look just like the day you put it there!

2) Z-Finit Nitrogen Steel:

Z-FiNit - Recommended for runners, fishing, boating, scuba diving, or hikers looking for excellent edge retention with above average rust/corrosion resistance.  Magnetic.

What is Z-FiNit Steel?

Z-FiNit (Zapp Fine Grain Nitrogen Steel) Z-FiNit super steel is a high nitrogen, alloyed tool steel (similar to Spyderco's H1 Steel).  The advantage of adding nitrogen to steel is corrosion resistance. The nitrogen frees chromium to provide this corrosion resistance. You will find this steel used by NASA for its excellent wear resistance for machining ball bearing.  Z-FiNit is an excellent material for knife steel due to its corrosion resistance, hardness, and overall ease of sharpening. The Z-FiNit TRAK XL will be hardened to 59HRC by one of the world's leading heat treat facilities experienced in working with this material. 

Z-FiNit has been used by many of the top knife makers around the world and has proven to make an excellent knife steel for its ability to withstand corrosion better than most knife steels, as well as, its edge holding characteristics. Similar to AEB-L, but with a much higher corrosion resistance. Unlike titanium, Z-FiNit is ferrous, magnetic, and not 100% rustproof, however it does have greater corrosion resistance than typical knife steels such as 440C. Z-FiNit makes an excellent choice for those that wanted a TRAK XL with stainless steel properties, but with a much higher corrosion resistance.

3) S35VN Stainless Steel:

Perfect for Hiking, Camping, Every Day Carry, and Utility.  Superior edge retention with good corrosion resistance.  Magnetic.

 

S35VN Stainless Steel is made in the USA by Crucible Industries specifically for specialized cutlery and long wearing industrial machine parts. Known for being 15-20% tougher than its predecessor and four times tougher than 440C and 154CM cutlery steel. S35VN is the perfect stainless steel for those looking for a knife edge that can withstand repeated usage with minimal wear and less frequent sharpening. S35VN does require heat treat, which will be done by an experienced HT facility.

Carry Options:

All of the TRAK XL models come with a thermoplastic Kydex sheath. This material (commonly found in aircraft bulkheads), is the standard sheath material for fixed blade knives.  Kydex is heated until soft and pliable, then vacuum formed around the knife.  Once cooled, the Kydex hardens and will fit your knife like a custom made glove.  Kydex is waterproof, lightweight, retains its shape better than leather, and can last a lifetime.

The TRAK XL sheath features two eyelets at top, which allow you to attach the included stainless steel ball chain.  You can also attach TRAK to a backpack, runner's arm band, belt, or anywhere you need it handy. 

*Optional belt clip with mounting hardware will be available.

Available Colors/Finish:

All of our TRAK XL knives will come with our standard finish : Natural Stonewash.  This is our toughest finish since the titanium is tumbled in a vibratory tumbler with ceramic stones.  These stones create thousands of tiny scratches/etchings on the surface.  This type of finish is the best type of finish for a knife that will be used as it hides any sheath rub marks, scratches, or use marks.

 

-Titanium TRAK XL Color/Finish Options: 

Standard Finish: Natural Stonewashed

Anodized Color: Blue, Purple, Bronze, Flame Anodized ($5 Extra)

Painted Color: Cerakote Black ($10 Extra)

**Please Note: Color anodizing is only available for the Titanium TRAK XL

 

-S35VN Stainless Color/Finish Options:

Standard Finish: Natural Stonewashed

Color Options: Cerakote Black Only ($10 Extra)

 

-Z-FiNit Nitrogen Steel Color/Finish Options

Standard Finish: Satin Finish

Color Options: Cerakote Black ($10 Extra)

 

What is Cerakote?

Optional Cerakote Black ($10):

A satin black, thin film, ceramic coating using Cerakote. You can choose this option by adding $10 to your pledge.

Cerakote is extremely durable, corrosion-resistant and provides unparalleled levels of hardness and adhesion. These coatings are also resistant to most solvents and chemicals. The foundation for Cerakote coatings is a unique ceramic technology that imparts both flexibility and excellent wear resistance to the final baked on finish. Cerakote is applied similar to automotive paint and then baked in a curing oven for up to 3 hours.

 

Misc Images of TRAK XL:

Risks & Challenges

This is our 7th project that we have launched and managed on Kickstarter!

(The Fly Pry, The Fat Fly, The Dice Tool, Two Bit Fly, TRAK, TACK, and TRAK XL)

With your help, the funding received for this project will allow us to get better pricing on raw materials, as well as, meeting minimums on water jet services for cutting of the raw parts. It would also allow us to order the many consumables required for a project of this size such as sanding belts, anodizing supplies, and most importantly, tooling,

We feel that the risks associated with this project are very minimal and fairly low. We've put together a very experienced team and have already gone through the build process with our current prototypes and suppliers for this project.

We have used our suppliers in the past and have established relationships with them.  We'll keep you updated on project developments or of any unexpected delays during our weekly updates. We have done our homework and do not anticipate any other risks or challenges.

story:
We worked starting from sustainable fabrics as we believe that the story behind the product should be good like the product itself!

The awareness of the enormous amount of plastic wastes accumulated on the Earth & in the Ocean (the Great Pacific Garbage Patch is the biggest evidence) persuaded us that we all need to do something to preserve our Planet.

We started trying to bring our small contribute to recover some of these wastes to be used again. So we please ask you to support our campaign to made this contribute bigger as possible & to develop products with the highest possible attention for the costumers & for their Planet!

Imagine if all plastic wastes become a resource to create new products... 

Fabric 100% CORDURA® EcoMade

This fabric is made with recycled polyester yarns that are specifically engineered to meet the fabric performance and durability specifications of the CORDURA® brand.

The process to make CORDURA® EcoMade fabric reduces energy consumption & extends the useful life of polyester.

Harcle - Made in Italy

 

Risks and challenges

We have spent a year developing this project. It has been a big challenge to find the right suppliers and to make them accept small orders (over twenty fabric samples ordered and hours spent over the phone and writing emails) but we eventually found agreements with all the suppliers.

The bags will be locally produced in a very small factory in Italy, hand made by experienced artisans.

We have been planning all the process in order to minimize the possible unforeseen events in the manufacturing chain.

story:
Demo:

Open bottle cap

shotgun a beer

open the tab

The Story:

“My name is Hugh(Zhaocheng Huang), a second year Art & Design student in University of Alberta. I have lived in Henday tower residence for almost 2 years ( 4 Henday 2012-2013, 9 Henday 2013-2014) . I have always been an observer of my surroundings, and that’s where my love for Henday began. I conceived, I draw, and I designed. I am inspired by the Skulk and all the Henday residents that give unity about residence life in Henday Hall. Skulk image, the significant inspiration to the design. Today, I try to reproduce skulk in my design and let you to take it home.”


The Inspiration:

Basicly, the inspiration was from Henday's residence life. We drink, we skulk. Why not combine these two things together? Bang! When the beer meets Skulk beavers, here it comes the BeSkulker!  


The Campaign:

Dear Henday residents and alumni, 

This is an opportunity that you can own one of these stunning pieces. My passion drives me to bring this design to reality, and to you. Your contribution will makes you crucial to this project. I appreciate your support. 

Genuinely, I want it fabricated locally in Edmonton. However, the cost and delivery are not the best for this project with small production. Even in the early stage market research survey, the majority of people who are interested in this product, they more care about the price. Therefore, my job is to find the optimum manufacturer overseas to deliver you the best results as I can.


3D Modeling and Rendering:

Mockup and Prototyping:

The first prototype (top) and the third prototye (botton):

3D printed case:


Add some music to your booze


Specifications (Final design): 

Length: 8 centimeter

Width: 4 centimeter

Thickness: 0.5 centimeter

Weight: 24 grams

Material: Aluminum Alloy 6063

Process: Machining ( Laser cutting); Finishing (Anodizing with silver/gold/blue color)

Blue and gold color:


What I need:

Most of fund goes to the cost of manufacturing and international shipping. The other fund will cover the cost of prototyping.

What you get:

BeSkulker is a unique keepsake that embodies the pride of Henday – Skulk, an important part of Henday tradition and heritage.

It's not just about the your bottle opener, it's a dream that we can make it come true right here, in residence. It's about the faith for us and for other people to believe that everyone can actually do something!


To people who have no clue about Skulk culture:

There is no other animal as meaningful for Canada as the beaver.The beaver has been a long standing symbol of Canada, representing its unique history and economic development. For the sake of one of Canada’s most important national icons: the beaver. As long as you are a Canadian beaver lover out there, you should get BeSkulker!


Bring it home


ATTENTION PLEASE!

Currently no shipping involved with this project. Sorry for people who lives outside of Edmonton. For more details please contact hughture@gmail.com. Thank you for your invaluable support!


Proudly presented by:

Hughture Design


Huge thank to everyone who helped me along the way!

Please spread the word and share your love!

Thank you for checking out this project!

Drink responsibly!


SKULK IS COMING!

It's about the faith for us and for other people to believe that everyone can actually do something!To people who have no clue about Skulk culture:There is no other animal as meaningful for Canada as the beaver.The beaver has been a long standing symbol of Canada, representing its unique history and economic development. For the sake of one of Canada’s most important national icons: the beaver. As long as you are a Canadian beaver lover out there, you should get BeSkulker!Bring it homeATTENTION PLEASE!Currently no shipping involved with this project. Sorry for people who lives outside of Edmonton. For more details please contact hughture@gmail.com. Thank you for your invaluable support!Proudly presented by:Hughture DesignHuge thank to everyone who helped me along the way!Please spread the word and share your love!Thank you for checking out this project!Drink responsibly!SKULK IS COMING!

story:
Four years ago we had a vision, to create a online marketplace, allowing surfers to give their old surfboards, fins and wetsuits a new life.

Surf Bunker was born.  A surf specific online marketplace making it super easy to buy and sell surf hardware.

 

Whether you’re a surfer, shaper, shop or surf camp owner, Surf Bunker can make your life simpler.

 

For you, the individual surfer...

Everything you need. Quickly and easily.

  • Local surfers - find all the hardware near you.
  • Traveling surfers - find used boards before you go or know where to get board repairs when you're there.
  • Find exciting new boards from shapers you never knew existed or from the ones you already know and love.
 
How can we help Surfboard shapers, worldwide?

 

 

For you, the shaper...

You don’t need a website.

Use one of our business pages tailored for shapers. From there you can upload all the boards you have for sale and talk with new customers about future orders.

Haven’t got the time?

You can do it all from your phone in five minutes. It is working. Right now. And it’s free.

 

 

Improving Surf Bunker for Everyone...

Now we need your donations to take things to the next level. Help us build exciting new features into the marketplace such as:

  • An Artificial Intelligence to help you list surf hardware - making it simpler and faster than ever.
  • Postage Automation - Instant global delivery price for boards and suits
  • Direct Secure Payments - between buyer and sellers
  • Automated Translation - no more language barriers
  • Instant Messaging -  Peer to peer direct communication.

 

Donating and help us...

This is best way you can help us. Your entire donation will go towards improving Surf Bunker. Just hit the ‘Back It’ button at the top of the page and make a contribution.

We have opted for an ‘All or Nothing’ Indiegogo campaign. If we don’t reach our target of 80k you will get all of your money back.

 

 

Buying something and help us...

We have created the Surf Bunker ‘Founders Edition’ range of products via a massive collaboration with the best in the surf industry.

All the profits from these sales will go towards improving Surf Bunker for everyone.

You can choose from:

  • Custom made surfboards
  • Wetsuits
  • Surfboard fins
  • Wax and surf grip
  • T-Shirts and hoodies

 

If you buy any of the items we have for sale (called ‘Perks’), the profits from these will go towards reaching our Indiegogo campaign goal.

If we don’t reach our target of 80k, you will get your money back.

 

 

We have collaborated with the some of the best surfboard builders in the world to bring you these unique wave sliders.

Each will come with a ‘Founders Edition’ logo never to be repeated. A true ‘one-off’ collector’s item.

We will use all the profits raised to meet our crowdfunding goal and improve Surf Bunker’s marketplace. Making selling and buying surf hardware simpler and easier.

  • 5’4” Flexar Fish - is for wave pools by Joshua John Dimery. (left)
  • Flax Eco Fish - eco sensitive and speed out of the gates by NOTOX. (middle)
  • The Golden R - An asymmetric small wave performer by Will Baylis. (right)

 

 

  1. New - An AI to assist with listing your items for sale - you snap a couple of photos of the item you’re selling, Surf Bunker’s AI will work out what the item is. We’ve already partially built this and it just needs refining.  
     
  2.  New - Instant Messaging - talk directly with the seller / buyer / provider about items before you make a sale / purchase.
     
  3. New - Postage - An automatic postage feature which generates instant pricing from seller to buyer on a global scale. 
     
  4. New - Payment Options - allowing you to make the sale or purchase directly through Surf Bunker. As a collective the more transactions we process, the lower the fees we can demand from providers. We can then pass these savings on to you.
     
  5. New - Multiple Languages – Our vision is that Surf Bunker will work across a variety of languages, automatically translating listings and instant messages between buyers and sellers and removing the barrier of language.
     
  6. Improve - Surf Business Finder. The benefits will include more categories of businesses and an improved feature to import mass amounts of boards for local shops and online businesses.
     
  7. Improve - Matchmaker function – Currently one of the most popular features on Surf Bunker. If you can’t find the specific surfboard you are looking for, just log it with MM (Matchmaker) and let it do the searching for you. Receive notifications when when your dream item becomes available at the price you want.
     
  8. To help us launch a European Funding bid for further investment and continue pushing the platform’s development and growth with many new, exciting features yet to be mentioned. 

     

We have reached this point with the support of some forward-thinking companies that have sent us products to review with no say in the outcome. They had faith in their products and believed in our idea of honest, informative reviews.

In addition, we would like to thank all of our reviewers, writers and photographers who have contributed to the magazine over the past four years. None of you have ever been paid and are doing it with the same vision as us.

 

We want to give back. In our hearts, we have a deep and long-lasting respect for our oceans. As a responsible surf company, we must help tackle the pollution issue in and around these bodies of water. This is our way of doing what we believe is right.

  • By definition, our reason for being involves the recycling of your surf hardware giving it a second life and helping to reduce harmful, polluting waste in landfill and our oceans.
     
  • Donating to a charity that actions real change in cleaning up our oceans and waterways. We want to throw this out there to you, our readers and backers. We will be inviting you to guide us as to which charity you want us to support and will be making a percentage of profits payment to them every year. Our way of giving back.
     
  • Surf Bunker is a marketplace that will continue to promote and elevate genuine eco-surf products, spreading awareness of real issues and the actions we can take to make things right.

 

If you like our ideas, please give us a shout out on social media #surfbunker and share any of the perks with friends who you think might be interested.

Got any surfboards, wetsuits, fins, board bags, bodyboards you want to SELL?? - any surf hardware really, please help yourself to free listings on surfbunker.com - go on, it's FREE!

Got a surf related business? get a FREE business listing on surfbunker.com!

Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign, if you are interested in talking to us, send us a message and we will get back to you as soon as is humanly possible.

story:
Our Story

We are two guys from Nothern Michigan who developed a friendship through spending time together in the outdoors. Driving back and forth to the woods, we would bounce ideas off of each other of products we had concocted in our minds while in our deer stands...let's just say you've got a lot of time to think. Kevin approached Dan and proposed going into business together developing the products we had discussed. Both agreed it would be a great match between Dan's mechanical background and Kevin's marketing/sales background so ScentFree Outdoors, LLC was established in December 2001.

ScentFree Outdoors' mission is to design and develop innovative products for the outdoor industry with a focus on hunting, fishing, and camping.  We have been working on the R&D of our first product for the last 11 years in total, but in January '05, we started completely from scratch with a new and revolutionary technology.   We hired a senior research engineer from a Tier 1, southeastern, research university to first prove the idea would work.  Once we had the initial lab test results, we knew that this technology needed to get into the hands of people all over the world. Kevin is married and has 5 beautiful children ranging from 16 to 2 years old.  Dan is also married and has 5 amazing children as well with ages ranging from 31 to 5 years old. That's right, he has two adult kids and five-year-old triplets!   

Safe, Efficient, Odorless Heat

We wanted to design a portable source of heat that would be safe, efficient, reliable, and odorless.  We've always known we wanted a classy design that people would be proud to use in any setting outdoors or around the house. But, we didn't stop there. We wanted to offer the world the first portable source of heat that accurately measures the surrounding area for harmful levels of CO and low levels of oxygen. If the oxygen level lowers and the CO level rises to unsafe levels, the heater will automatically shut off. nuDAWN HEAT was designed as a 2-in-1; it can be used as a heater or food/beverage warmer. Let's just say this is the "Lexus" of portable heaters. 

We are so passionate about nuDAWN HEAT because we want to offer individuals and families a brand-new technology that will give them the security of knowing they are safe. We've worked endless hours designing a product people will be able to use for years to come. Early on we set a high standard and have never waivered from it...we want the nuDAWN Heater to be the last heater a person will need to buy.

As a backer of the nuDAWN Heat project, you will play a major role in launching this revolutionary technology to the market.  As indicated in the video, people around the world are tragically losing their lives every year to carbon monoxide poisoning. With your support we can do our part to help reduce those statistics by offering people a safe and reliable way to stay WARM!

Revolutionizing Portable Space Heat: what makes nuDAWN different

JetCOrrect Technology. Other infrared or catalytic heaters currently being offered only use pure fuel, LP, directly from the tank. There are certain additives and impurities in the gas that don't burn off, causing CO and other gases to saturate the environment.

Our JetCOrrect Technology mixes the fuel with outside air which creates the optimum mixture of fuel and air. This fuel mixture then enters our combustion chamber. The chamber recirculates a portion of the hot exhaust emissions which then increases efficiences even more.  To put it plainly, we are burning off nearly 100 percent of the harmful exhaust gases as a result of creating a fuel mixture and keeping the exhaust in the combustion chamber just a fraction of a second longer. Therefore, by burning off these impurities in the fuel, the heat becomes odorless.

The combustion chamber faces extreme heat. Originally, we were going to use a stainless steel combustion chamber, but it became apparent that it wouldn't be able to withstand extremely high temperatures over a long period of time. Inconel is used in jet engines because it is able to withstand jet engine exhaust systems. We decided it was worth the additional cost to use the best material for our combustion chamber, because we knew it would hold up over the life of the heater increasing the heater's reliability.

Stainless Steel Shell.  Since day one, we knew we wanted nuDAWN to look classy and be durable.  Plastic can break easily and it doesn't take much to dent aluminum. We selected the optimum gauge of stainless steel to help with the overall weight of the heater, while not compromising the durability. A bonus feature about using stainless steel is that it radiates the heat long after the heater is shut down, similar to a radiator in the home.  

Smart Sensor Technology. One of our suppliers, SST Sensing Ltd based in Scotland, was very flexible in their approach. They adapted their sensor design as our product evolved, and they were always eager to provide advice and support. nuDAWN HEAT will offer the first portable source of heat to incorporate smart sensors that accurately take readings of carbon monoxide and oxygen. Different from other heaters currently offered that have an ODS (or pressure sensor), nuDAWN is engingeered to take readings of the surrounding air. The smart sensor is calibrated, or programmed, to the exact levels required by the CSA (Canadian Standard Association) to be marketed "indoor safe."  Why is that significant?  nuDAWN will be the first heater to take readings and automatically shut down based on carbon monoxide levels. 

nuDAWN HEAT: its many benefits and uses

 The nuDAWN HEAT can be used in many different applications: hunting, fishing, boating, camping, garage, natural disaster preparation, are just a few of them.  In addition, there is a growing trend in America of people that are downsizing their homes to much less square footage and nuDAWN HEAT would be a perfect compliment to their home heating needs.  

Since we designed nuDAWN as a 2-in-1, the user can heat a food or beverage on it. This comes in handy when outside weathering the elements.

"Green" technology has been increasing in awareness and importance in recent years, and we are proud to say that because of nuDAWN's nearly 100 percent efficiency, less emissions are being released into the atmosphere while reducing fuel consumption.

The MSRP on nuDAWN HEAT is $449.95.  

Why We Need Your Help

We have committed over 10 years to the research and development of nuDAWN HEAT. Now that we have a finished prototype and tooling is complete, our vendor in Bangalore, India is ready to begin the first run of production.  

We have committed our lives to this project and are so passionate to see it become available to people all over the world.  By supporting nuDAWN HEAT, you'll be saying that you believe in it, too, and we thank you for that.

We'd love to use indiegogo as a "presale" like other companies have been able to do. We wish we could give all of you a heater for the lower perk amounts. Unfortunately, we're sure you understand that nuDAWN is a higher end item and we can only offer a discount to those that can't support us at the $449 Platinum level perk. Please know how much we appreciate your support no matter what the amount.

What we are raising money for


The funds that we raise are going to go towards the production of the first 200 heaters.  Our manufacturing vendor in Bangalore, India has already produced the tooling.  Now we need the funds available to have our component supplier in Edingurgh, Scotland (SST) begin producing the first 150 "smart sensors".  SST will ship the sensors to Bangalore and our component supplier, Hurricane Products, in California will ship compenents to India as well.

We also need to pay off a small balance of money to our vendor in India to go towards the final tooling costs.  

The package design has been started, but we will also need to use a small portion of the money to pay a local graphic design company to design our final packaging.

 

 

See how the nuDAWN Heater does NOT go out even during high winds. Click on the link below to watch the video. 

nuDAWN and the TORNADO TEST video

story:
Short Summary

Are you tired of being inconvenienced by airlines delaying your luggage days, weeks, and in some cases never returning it? As a former airline agent, I dealt with the lost/delayed luggage issue for many years.  For me, there was nothing more troubling than to tell a passenger his/her luggage would arrive on the next available flight.  Honestly, we never knew if this would be the case.  After seeing the frustration this was causing, and the poor customer service ratings we were receiving, I began to assemble a team of airline ramp agents and software engineers to form PBX.  We created a supplemental luggage tag and mobile platform, that when combined, opens a direct line of communication between you and the carrier. We were recently accepted as a strategic partner in the International Air Transport Association.  Here is a look at why the industry has responded to our solution…. 

 

There are several reasons things like this occur, but the main reasons are: 

1) Lack of technology in the baggage handling industry 

2) No direct lines of communication between you and the carrier 

3) Time constraints

Our product provides critical data that is essential in initiating the recovery process.  If your luggage is not scanned at your final destination, you can jump start the recovery process using your mobile phone.  By simply touching the last scanned airport code on your smartphone, you will be provided carriers’ direct contact information at that particular airport!  No more calling multiple 1-800 numbers!

Agents, whether their tag is on the bag or not, can log in our service site, enter your PBX ID, and send you a text notification requesting you to call them DIRECTLY.  PBX has made it just that simple! 

What We Need

In order to become "recognized” by the entire airline industry, we need your help!  Meeting our campaign goal allows us to sign our IATA strategic partner certification.  The certification requires a payment of $20k before we are given access to industry wide API’s and the luggage handling software used by carriers.  Meeting our goal provides you a superior customer service enhancement no matter who you fly with.  

What You Get!

Our unique perks allow contributors to take advantage of our product and services before distribution begins.  Contributors, that pledge $25 or more, will have the option to auto renew their subscription every year for $10.  No matter the future annual subscription price, our patrons will never pay a dime more!  Contributors, that pledge $99 or more, can renew their subscription for only $5 a year for life!  So the next time you’re in the airport and others ask, “Where did you get that?” or “How much did that cost?” just tell them it’s our little secret!

 Impact

Our team was built to make traveling with luggage, strollers, golf clubs, and the other necessary items, easy and stress free!  Your contributions not only allow us to take a stand against delayed/lost luggage, but provides everyone around the world an effective tool that gets results!  A successful campaign means you will no longer depend on airlines to provide critical luggage information.  Our one-click research tool encourages the industry to use the system YOU built, rather than the ineffective system they currently have available.

Stretch Goals

Other Ways You Can Help

Our campaigns’ success depends on you!  Reaching our goal, can only be accomplished through getting the word out to your friends, family, and colleagues!  Together we can change the way we travel with luggage; one tag at a time!
story_txt: Short SummaryAre you tired of being inconvenienced by airlines delaying your luggage days, weeks, and in some cases never returning it? As a former airline agent, I dealt with the lost/delayed luggage issue for many years.  For me, there was nothing more troubling than to tell a passenger his/her luggage would arrive on the next available flight.  Honestly, we never knew if this would be the case.  After seeing the frustration this was causing, and the poor customer service ratings we were receiving, I began to assemble a team of airline ramp agents and software engineers to form PBX.  We created a supplemental luggage tag and mobile platform, that when combined, opens a direct line of communication between you and the carrier. We were recently accepted as a strategic partner in the International Air Transport Association.  Here is a look at why the industry has responded to our solution….  There are several reasons things like this occur, but the main reasons are: 1) Lack of technology in the baggage handling industry 2) No direct lines of communication between you and the carrier 3) Time constraintsOur product provides critical data that is essential in initiating the recovery process.  If your luggage is not scanned at your final destination, you can jump start the recovery process using your mobile phone.  By simply touching the last scanned airport code on your smartphone, you will be provided carriers’ direct contact information at that particular airport!  No more calling multiple 1-800 numbers!Agents, whether their tag is on the bag or not, can log in our service site, enter your PBX ID, and send you a text notification requesting you to call them DIRECTLY.  PBX has made it just that simple!  What We NeedIn order to become "recognized” by the entire airline industry, we need your help!  Meeting our campaign goal allows us to sign our IATA strategic partner certification.  The certification requires a payment of $20k before we are given access to industry wide API’s and the luggage handling software used by carriers.  Meeting our goal provides you a superior customer story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Meet the FT Aviator

With the FT Aviator from Fluidity Tech, command the sky with more precision and control than previously possible. Engineered to simplify drone flight, Fluidity pilots can pick up the FT Aviator and fly right out of the box - professionals and hobbyists alike.

Compatible today with almost all DJI drones, this unique controller works collaboratively with the native DJI radio, and Fluidity app for both Android and iOS.

When an astronaut designs a drone controller

Using an astronaut’s perspective on intuitive motion through space, we have patented a unique and intuitive drone controller that anyone, whether they’re eight or eighty, can pick up and begin using immediately.  The FT Aviator is designed to incorporate the relevant 4 degrees of freedom of movement (x, y, z, and yaw) to drone flying, eliminating the awkward interface and steeper learning curve of existing dual thumb-controlled drones. It intuitively unlocks human potential to fly and capture stunning imagery. 

  • Intuitive flight control in one hand eliminates the complexity of dual thumb controllers
  • Smooth, controlled flight, virtually eliminating aircraft instability
  • Advanced camera controls for high quality photo and video capture
  • Situational display indicators so you always know your drone's location and orientation 
  • Easy to use, right out of the box
  • 5-hour battery life
  • Compatible with most DJI drones, including the Mavic, Phantom, Inspire and Matrice series* 

 

Plug and play

The FT Aviator is a durable, premium grade, quick-to-assemble drone flight controller consisting of a joystick, a base and a smartphone holder.

Freedom to move

The FT Aviator precisely enables the four degrees of freedom of flight applicable to drones: forward and backward (X-axis), left and right (Y-axis), up and down (Z-axis) and turning left and right (Yaw).  

Focus on what matters

The FT Aviator reduces the “cognitive workload” for drone pilots by putting flight control in one hand along with natural and cognitive translation of hand-to-device movement, allowing focus on the image capture, and not the mechanics of how to get there.

Fly like a pro

The FT Aviator is not prone to cross-coupling, or inadvertent movements, enabling precision flight.

Adjust on the fly

Drone flight control can be modified “on the fly,” maximizing a pilot’s time on the scene while optimizing the drone and camera system for the smoothest video while shooting. 

Control your camera like never before

The controller has dedicated buttons to slow the rates of tilt control to get smoother video sequences, as well as other commonly accessed camera functions, without having to dive into multiple layers of the app.

FT Aviator Product Photography

The Anatomy of the FT Aviator

Tips from Scott: How to Fly with the FT Aviator

 

 

The FT Aviator is compatible with most DJI drones* and leverages the native DJI transmitter-receiver radio, which is considered very secure, with frequency hopping and other security measures.

*Current compatibility includes Mavic Series, Phantom 3 & 4, Inspire 1 & 2, and Matrice Series.  We will continue to work on compatibility with other DJI models as our technology and the DJI Air Force grows.

How FT Aviator works with DJI

1.) Bluetooth connection from FT Aviator to the smartphone app, with return telemetry for display, LED status lights, etc.

2.) Wired smartphone app connection to the DJI radio (Micro-USB, Lightning, USB C), with return video and telemetry.

3.) Radio transmission of command and control from DJI radio to drone, with return data telemetry.

 

Scott Parazynski, Founder & CEO

Dr. Scott Parazynski is a highly-decorated and broadly-experienced U.S. Astronaut Hall of Fame astronaut, physician, pilot, and technology entrepreneur. He founded Fluidity Technologies to focus on the development of revolutionary input devices powered by machine learning to intuitively move through physical and virtual space.

 

George Guerrero, Co-Founder & CFO

George brings more than 20 years of extensive and diverse experience delivering cost-effective financial, operational, technology, and human resource solutions. He has significant experience leading strategic transformation and integration initiatives in companies ranging from $10 million to $2 billion in annual revenues. 

 

Carolyn Scott, VP of Marketing

For more than 20 years, Carolyn has led innovative marketing initiatives for a range of companies– from established brands to technology start-ups. With a passion for building collaborative and impactful teams, Carolyn has successfully partnered with leadership in the food and beverage, retail, consumer electronics, and technology industries to help transform brands, launch new products and achieve business goals.

 

Keith Brooks, Director of External Manufacturing

Keith is a proven leader and manager, with more than 20 years of experience in global supply chain engineering and operations, delivering measurable results for multi-billion-dollar hardware and software businesses. Keith has led large cross-functional teams globally, managing budgets of $10 million and more, and has directed management of operations at the top four Tier 1 EMS providers.

 

Prototyping is the most fun part of the innovation process, and usually involves cobbling together duct tape, balsa wood and spare parts! In the case of our first pre-FT Aviator models – cleverly named “v1” and “v2” – we had a good idea of the general shape and basic mechanical features we wanted, so we churned out dozens of 3-D prints to get to the refined form factor and functionality we have now. We teamed with brilliant engineers at Motivo Engineering, Spark Aerial and Innovate, LLC to apply a lot of human factors know-how, and to dial in all of our advanced features into the product.

We teamed with brilliant engineers at Motivo Engineering, Spark Aerial and Innovate, LLC to apply a lot of human factors know-how, and to dial in all of our advanced features into the product.

story:
Hi, my name is Vahit. I am a knife enthusiast and a designer. As a son of a farmer, folding knives has taken apart of my EDC routine since i was a little kid, and the enthusiasm has grown bigger and bigger on me over years to this present day. I have owned and carried many knives, but almost none of them were able to fulfill my daily needs to the end and satisfy my aesthetic preferences at the same time. Then, i realized that i need to make a knife that i would be please to carry for the rest of my life. And the idea of THE WOLVERINE has born.

 

My inspiration for this project is Wolverine, one of the fiercest beasts on the earth, which can cope with almost every environmental adversity and can defend itself from some of the most dangerous predators that are multiple times heavier and bigger than itself.

It began from a sketch and evolved multiple times thanks to the members of social knife communities all over the world. The Wolverine is aiming this key features:

 

Built to Last: The Wolverine uses the most advanced precision manufacturing techniques on the Earth and it is made to last for decades. This is a knife that can pass one generation to another.

 

Material Quality: The Wolverine combines some of the most high-end materials that can be used on a folding knife.

 

Style: The main aim of the concept was to create an interactive design which would be refined by the contributions of the other knife enthusiasts according to their needs and inspirations. The design of the Wolverine has evolved its final form with the feedbacks and suggestions of the knife enthusiasts all around the world. This is your design truly. 

 

Price: One of the most important parts of this project is to get some of the most premium materials that can be used on a folding knife and combine them with the most advanced manufacturing techniques, while keeping it as affordable as it can be. The Wolverine is designed for the most, and priced for the most. 

Features:

  • Single-piece titanium, integral frame lock handle.
  • Bohler M390 steel  provides extremely high wear and corrosion resistance to the blade.
  • Amazingly smooth opening and closing action with every flip and flick thanks to ceramic ball-bearing pivot.
  • Milled titanium pocket clip flexes while being durable, which reduces pocket wear and tear.
  • Texturized real carbon fiber pivot collar doubles as a stop plate to prevent overtravel.
  • Hardened steel lockbar insert to stand up to repeated use multiple times more.
  • Gentle, effective jimping on flipper and thumb ramp provides comfortable and optimum finger grip.
  • Extra large sharpening choil makes the blade maintenance a joy and also acts as a finger choil for managing your precision cutting tasks with ease.
  • Lanyard attachment for multiple accessories and faster deployment from the pocket.

Materials and Dimensions:

  • Overall Length: 7.598"(193 mm)
  • Blade Length: 3.267"(83 mm)
  • Cutting Edge: 2.992"(76 m)
  • Blade Thickness: 0.157"(4 mm)
  • Blade Material: Bohler M390 Powder Steel
  • Blade Finish: silver bead blast &stonewashed then brush the top
  • Blade Hardness: HRC 59-61
  • Blade Grind: Flat

 

  • Handle Length: 4.33"(110 mm)
  • Handle Overall Thickness: 0.511"(13 mm)
  • Handle Material:  6AL4V Titanium
  • Clip Material: 6AL4V Titanium
  • Pocket Clip: Tip-up
  • Screws Material: Hardened Stainless steel 
  • Washers Material: Ceramic Ball Bearing
  • Weight: 4.8 oz (136 g)
  • User: Right Hand
  • Opener: Flipper and Thumb Hole
  • Lock Type: Frame Lock

story:
CROSS SLING is a multi-purpose, adaptive and organized EDC (Every day Carry) bag that lets you carry gear in multiple ways, designed to free your hands and fit your body and style effortlessly.

CROSS SLING features unrivaled versatility to carry your gear, letting you go from a sling bag to a messenger bag, to even a fanny pack. From casual to formal, from student to businessman, CROSS SLING has you covered!

Do you often find yourselves with too many items to carry around throughout the day and the typical backpacks don´t seem to accommodate to your body or our gear the way you want?

Moving your daily essentials from one bag to another waste your precious time, and slows you down.

Imagine that you could FREE YOUR HANDS and CARRY LIKE A PRO WITHOUT ANY MESS. 

That´s why we created CROSS SLING, a hybrid bag with a unique design that adapts to your gear and lifestyle. 

Simply put, CROSS SLING is for ANYONE, ANYTIME, ANYWHERE.

 

Not Just One Bag

We realized how many bags are necessary, from a sling bag to a backpack, to a camera bag, to a carry-on or even to a fanny pack. CROSS SLING is a real game changer since you don't have to waste your time hesitating between the right one.

All you need is the one bag, CROSS SLING.

The best part of CROSS SLING is that you can carry it in any way you want! We created an angle-adjustable strap with a high-quality buckle so that the bag will automatically fit your body no matter whether it's on your chest, back, crossing your body, or just simply on your waist.

 

The pivot at the axial connection points of the strap optimizes comfort on all bodies. It adapts to any angle and position the bag is and lets you carry it comfortably.

Internal Organization, Unbeatable!

Even it is so elegant and so simple to use, CROSS SLING is still fully geared with a complete organizing system.

The Adjustable Item Retention System, which is the smartest built-in object organizer. These adjustable wires will keep everything in its right place, tidying up your life! 

What's more, there're 3 high-elastic mesh pockets and 2 zippered pockets for your various kinds of accessories, gadgets, and essentials.

180 Degrees, Everything in Sight

The main zipper can be opened up to 180 degrees, it can extend past its three sides allowing CROSS SLING to open all the way and lie flat. This accessible layout provides excellent access to all your essentials.

And thanks to the sturdy structure and tough material, No matter the situation CROSS SLING always maintains its shape.

Size Follows Your Needs

CROSS SLING can be expanded from 5L to 9L. You can adjust the capacity to fit your lifestyle anytime, anywhere. No need to settle between space, comfort or style. 

The main compartment is meant for large items such as camera gear, gym or office essentials, headphones or even your new Switch. 

With the expandable storage, you can also fit your MacBook Air 13” and an A4 document. With the 9L expansion, you get the capacity to simultaneously store travel gear and camera equipment. The CROSS SLING is the perfect shoulder bag for your city detour or photo-shooting work.

Quick and Easy On-the-go Access 

CROSS SLING features a magnetic sleeve to keep important items safe, accessible and close to you. With a simple swipe open the sleeve to look for your desired item and them simply pat it close. Because of its magnetic plate, you have a lock-free soft closure.

With a simple swipe open the sleeve to look for your desired item and them simply pat it close. Because of its magnetic plate, you have a lock-free soft closure.

Also, the magnetic sleeve keeps your keys in the right place throughout the day.

2 Side Pockets are perfect for the accessories, like your earphones or stationery.

The Bottom Strap Holder is designed to hold items such as a mini tripod, an umbrella or a water bottle.

The zipper and the lid are designed to be opened at different levels for you to adjust the open size when removing items.

The CROSS SLING not only features versatility to match your carry needs but also a beautiful and detailed design that brings every element together.

Protection

 

  • Water & Dust Resistant Material
  • Weather-proof Zipper
  • Anti-theft Zipper Pull Strap 

Style

 

  • Reflective Logo
  • Eyecatching Color Scheme
  • Knitted Texture with Glossy Expandable Layer

Durability

  • High-quality Injection Strap Buckle
  • Customized Metal Parts Reinforced
  • Non-poisonous PVC Tarp Bottom
  • Neat and Firm Stitches on Straps and the Handle

180 Degrees, Everything in Sight
The main zipper can be opened up to 180 degrees, it can extend past its three sides allowing CROSS SLING to open all the way and lie flat. This accessible layout provides excellent access to all your essentials.
And thanks to the sturdy structure and tough material, No matter the situation CROSS SLING always maintains its shape.
Size Follows Your Needs
CROSS SLING can be expanded from 5L to 9L. You can adjust the capacity to fit your lifestyle anytime, anywhere. No need to settle between space, comfort or style. 
The main compartment is meant for large items such as camera gear, gym or office essentials, headphones or even your new Switch. 
With the expandable storage, you can also fit your MacBook Air 13” and an A4 document. With the 9L expansion, you get the capacity to simultaneously store travel gear and camera equipment. The CROSS SLING is the perfect shoulder bag for your city detour or photo-shooting work.
Quick and Easy On-the-go Access 
CROSS SLING features a magnetic sleeve to keep important items safe, accessible and close to you. With a simple swipe open the sleeve to look for your desired item and them simply pat it close. Because of its magnetic plate, you have a lock-free soft closure.

With a simple swipe open the sleeve to look for your desired item and them simply pat it close. Because of its magnetic plate, you have a lock-free soft closure.
Also, the magnetic sleeve keeps your keys in the right place throughout the day.

2 Side Pockets are perfect for the accessories, like your earphones or stationery.

The Bottom Strap Holder is designed to hold items such as a mini tripod, an umbrella or a water bottle.
The zipper and the lid are designed to be opened at different levels for you to adjust the open size when removing items.

The CROSS SLING not only features versatility to match your carry needs but also a beautiful and detailed design that brings every element together.
Protection

 

Water & Dust Resistant Material
Weather-proof Zipper
Anti-theft Zipper Pull Strap 

Style

 

Reflective Logo
Eyecatching Color Scheme
Knitted Texture with Glossy Expandable Layer

Durability


High-quality Injection Strap Buckle
Customized Metal Parts Reinforced
Non-poisonous PVC Tarp Bottom
Neat and Firm Stitches on Straps and the Handle

story: -I have taken this campaign down because there is a particular campaign on Indiegogo which we find so outrageously shocking and offensive that I do not wish to be on the same platform. (All backers informed and refunded. Thank you).

story:
Short Summary

My name is Marva Gregorio De Souza, aka Pixie.  I am a writer, radio producer, filmmaker and love to travel and discover new places and things.  Pixie Stay Properties will allow me to utilise both my managerial and creative skills as well as fulfill a long term desire to venture into property development.  Naturally, I'm extremely excited about it.

The plan is to raise funds in order to purchase the first place at auction and fix it up Pixie style!  With games, curiosities and activities as well as being a beautiful place to stay.  I've decided to focus on University cities in the UK as they all tend to be filled with plenty of history, culture and lots to see and do.  Pixie Stay Properties will add to this, from the moment you put the key in the door.  And it being Great Britain, regardless of the weather you'll have a fantastic stay.  You won't be disappointed!

What We Need & What You Get

I would like to ideally raise £100k as this will allow me to purchase the first property at auction and renovate it ready to go on short-term let platforms, such as Airbnb.

There are several excellent deals on the table for contributors, the main one being a 2 night stay for those who contribute £50.  This means you could possibly stay in Bath, Oxford, London, Edinburgh or Cardiff for two nights for just £50.  And the cheap price would not be reflected in your surroundings!  As I will be buying the property at auction, I've kept the first location flexible, however there are no bad pennies on my list, and if you don't like the first location I choose you can save your reward for one of my future Pixie Stay Properties.  If you're a fan of short breaks or love unique experiences this campaign is for you!

 

Risks & Challenges

The main challenge will be to find a suitable property at auction and within budget.  If I don't raise enough funds to buy a property at auction then whatever I raise will be used as a deposit for a mortgage.  Pixie Stay Properties will be birthed!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I know £50 is a lot for some people, which is why I've included offers for contributions of £10 and trust me these are life changing offers not to be missed.  Whichever option you go for, please, please, please share the offer with your friends and family.  Indiegogo gives lots of opportunities for sharing on social media.  Any time I've mentioned my Pixie Stay Properties idea the response has been very positive and I'm sure you agree.
