Several of our reward perks also include special in-game items, such as plant pot designs from artists including Komomorebi, Maobaby, Rainylune, Cindy Xia, Bei Badgirl, Mayticks, Snowlattes, Morgan Meehan-Lam, Jisoupy and Meggy Vodušek! There are three ingredients that make Kinder World special:☘️  1. Learn and practice self-kindness in a fun and mindful wayOur vision for Kinder World comes from a lot of research and soul-searching.We’ve interviewed hundreds of folks, and an overwhelming 95% of us want to be kinder to ourselves. The problem is we don’t know where to start, or many of us have tried and failed with more ‘traditional’ tools. To address this gap, we’re using our experience as game developers to create something evidence-backed, relaxing and accessible, that helps us to be kind to ourselves and to others. Kinder World breaks down the concept of self-kindness into something accessible by pairing houseplant care gameplay with evidence-based activities, like gratitude exercises.  ☘️  2. Be surrounded by a kindness cultureOur unique approach with Kinder World brings community and interactivity together, through shared goals and values.Humans are social creatures. Through our previous work on the body acceptance game Body Posi, we validated that self-kindness is far more effective in a community setting. This makes our approach different to existing tools, which are generally solitary and disconnected experiences.☘️ 3. Enjoy building and caring for your personal plant paradiseAnd why the houseplant theme, you ask? We’re inspired by our personal experiences with them! Houseplants are the perfect way to slow down, to have a daily mindful moment, and to treat ourselves kindly. Real or digital, houseplants help people - so it’s no surprise that 2020 was the biggest year for houseplants yet!   We have partnered with kindness expert and Clinical Psychologist Dr Tara Cousineau (Ph.D) to ensure that our approach develops kindness for the self and others in measurable ways. The game design of Kinder World follows the PEPPIE framework (Presence, Emotion regulation, Perspective, Purpose, Integration and Effort) and other leading research to help players develop these skills. For further reading, we recommend Dr Cousineau's book The Kindness Cure.While playing Kinder World isn’t a replacement for therapy, our gameplay is designed as a good concrete practice alongside professional support. You can also tailor your in-game experience for where you’re at personally. In the future, we plan to add content and activities focused on stretching, relaxation skills, confidence, and more. The Community Tree is an in-game representation of the Kinder World community. As seasons change and events take place, the tree itself will change. Through supporting our Indiegogo campaign with the Kind Heart Pack or higher, you can contribute to messages that all players will see on the tree, and you can help us select charities that in-game Community Tree events will support. Backing Kinder World shows that you long for greater compassion for yourself and for others, just like we do.You’ll become the backbone of a unique kindness-focused community. Help us define what kindness means to you, and discover ways to bring kindness to the world through the game. By backing us you will directly inform our development and contribute to building a houseplant world that thrives on kindness. Our priority with this campaign is to connect with special people who care, like you. We can’t wait to meet you!If you are able to support our campaign now, Kinder World will also be able to grow to include rare plants, more customization items and new ways to be kind to each other. We will also be able to build more kindness learning resources and offer different in-game activities for players to enjoy together.Houseplant Care Cards preview!We're excited to share previews of the Houseplant Care Cards, a physical deck of mini cards including tips for raising your real life plant friends! These cards are available at the Plant Lover Pack perk and above. These designs aren't final, but we're excited to bring our past experience in designing card decks into Kinder World! Special Artist Pots add-ons!You can add special pots from our collab artists to your pledge! Take a look at a sample of pots from our collab artists, including pots by Maobaby, Cindy Xia, Mayticks, Morgan Meehan-Lam and Meggy Vodušek! Exclusive Backers-only Pot and Plant designs!Maobaby is the collaboration artist behind our adorable exclusive Flower Kitty Backer's Pot, and Meggy Vodušek created the gorgeous (and growable!) Dragon Tail Backer's Plant!Backers at the Basic Pack or higher will receive the exclusive pot, and backers at the Mother Nature perk or higher will also get the exclusive Dragon Tail plant in their game! To test our vision for Kinder World, we’ve already created a community that practices kindness together on Discord.We love the Kinder World community. Mimicking the eventual in-game community experience, our Discord members share daily messages of gratitude, kind words for one another, as well as sharing amazing ‘real life’ houseplant and pet pictures. We would love for you to join us. Being a part of the Kinder World community is a wonderful part of the game experience as well - with sneak peaks at the game’s development, special events outside of the game, and more. Already the community has shared hundreds of gratitude moments, and over two hundred kind wishes that are used in the game itself. To experience what it’s like, you can join the Kinder World Discord now! ❤️ Backers also get access to a special Backers Only channel for early sneak peeks at upcoming content! You can read more about Kinder World and the team in Gamespot, Pocket Gamer, Well Played, CBR.com, 25 Years Later, 148 Apps, Behind Gaming and more! Our all-female team is very diverse - we have migrant backgrounds, lived experiences as people of color, members of the LGBTQIA+ community, and multilingual team members. We’re fun, smart, communicative and ambitious.   Lauren ClinnickLauren is the CEO, with a focus on Business Development, Marketing and Community Management. A lot of her time is spent with players, getting feedback and input on Kinder World, as well as trying to reach those who love the vision of the game as much as we do. She has previously worked in encryption, consumables marketing, and in the tech startup space. She has qualifications in Business and Arts, and her favorite houseplant is Monstera!Christina ChenChristina is the CTO on the team, and does technical work on the game - including coding, deployment (getting it out to players!) and technical production. As well as her experience as a game developer, publisher and analyst, Christina has previously worked in supercomputing at Microsoft, as a Senior Producer at PopCap, and even worked on the payment system behind XBox Live. She has qualifications in Software Engineering, Electrical and Systems Engineering, Psychology and Data Science. Her favorite houseplant is Dragontail!Mandy BoMandy is the Designer and Artist on the team. It’s her beautiful art that you see in-game, and the player experience is shaped by her design. She’s experienced as both a digital and traditional artist, and trained as a game designer. She’s a big fan of plants and magic, and her favorite houseplant is Devil’s Ivy!We also have the pleasure of working with:James Lewis - Film and Video EditorTamara Partridge - Audio Design  Kinder World needs you. ❤️ Please back our campaign to support our vision and journey - we can’t wait to meet you, and get your help in creating a relaxing game world for healing, houseplants and practicing kindness.How to help:1) Back our campaign - choose the perk that excites you! Or pledge any amount - everything helps support our small team.2) Share the Kinder World InDemand page with your social channels - this is the best way for new folks to find us! Here's an announcement tweet to share!3) Stay connected! You can also find us on Twitter and Instagram.4) Join the Kinder World Community Discord5)  Play the demo and share it with friends! (iOS 13+ or Android 10+ required)

story:
A Family Made Game

 

During the Lockdowns of recent, My son and I , began working on 3d assets for sale, and then decided to use the experience around the industry to make a game, which has been an incredible bonding experience and amazing for his self confidence, as well as opening his eyes to the potential out there for him.


THE GAME

High paced and high scoring gaming stripped back to its arcade roots and set to a rocking and rolling soundtrack! Prepare for your new addiction!

Rock And Roll And Run And Gun!!

In a terrifying future where the bugs have decided its high time they did the squishing, only one man can save us all! Enter Jock McFacepuncher, the size 1000 slipper to your 100xl arachnid...and as far as hes concerned, the only good bug, is a dead bug.

Old school arcade game mentality and modern Unreal powered presentation! Go back to a time before DLC, loot crates and seasons, a simpler time of pick up and play. Everything unlocked by accomplishing tasks in game. Simply beat your high score, beat your friends high scores, beat that rando on steams high score! The only thing you need to know is - where they are!

Accessible Gameplay : designed for pick up and play, jump in and play a quick session. Fast Paced: Optimised to allow many enemies to spawn in and start running around, the hunter can be the hunted at the turn of a corner, the only question is which are you?  clicking. 

A return to old school shooting and scoring of the arcade games of yesteryear! As casual or hardcore as you wish!

- A points based over the shoulder shooter, featuring giant bug enemies. In the vein of such classics as resident evil mercenaries, you have two goals - survive as long as you can and rack up a world beating high score! And no dlc, no seasons, no loot boxes - hit points based goals to unlock new arenas and characters, just like the old days!

-Insane Music: Fast and heavy, a breakneck soundtrack will keep your adrenaline pumping and that trigger finger

- Ever Growing- Releasing with 6 (tbc may be more) arenas and the ultimate exterminator jock mcfacepuncher, and regular updates bringing new arenas! New characters! Our bug filled world will keep growing, will you help us fight back each wave!!

-Varied enemies! From giant spiders to hungry rat packs, what can this horror throw at u! A randomised system promises each attempt will have its own surprises!

- Weapons from bats to bombs! The tools of a pro, to kick some righteous bug butt!

- Secrets to find! Wouldn't be an old school shooter with out a few tucked away!

-Leader boards! Earn bragging rights over your friends and humiliate your enemies

With an initial release plan of 6 arenas, with more arenas added every 4-6 weeks, the plan is to keep the game up to date and fresh consistently and create an experience and community people feel they belong to!

We took the idea as with me being a working parent, and having a 4 year old as well, there wasn't that much for us to be able to just pick up and put down at will. Essentially we created a game for me and the lad, that seemed to gain a positive reaction online.  Many people out there wanted a high end experience, but without having to commit hours at a time. 

As we made more contacts within the indie music industry, it also became apparent that making the game feel like a compilation of the best game dev musicians around, was an absolute must.

 

I have funded everything out of pocket so far, however, getting the final steps to steam and full publication is slightly out of our reach.

So we ask you to join the #punkdev crew! help our dreams come to life 

 

FUNDING GOALS

We essentially need to fund 3 final factors.

If we can reach £500 - we can commission some more music!

If we can reach £500+ we can expand the scope of the characters in game!

A  £5 donation will get you a game key, and further tiers cumulate to add more goodness! 

 

The Impact

Supporting this project will help me and the Lad get our studio off the ground! And help my kids realise they can do anything they want.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Join the #punkdev discord server!

https://discord.gg/qhSGjHeTY4

Spread the word on twitter and any other outlet!

Twitter @Modular_Squared

story:
Order now to guarantee your place in Drop 002, shipping Summer 2022. Drop 001 is 100% now sold out!

Welcome to the future of fitness gaming. Founded in 2020 and already backed by some of the world's best investors, Quell is the first game to offer you a high-intensity, full-body, resistance-based combat workout at home. Travel through an exciting fantasy world fighting enemies with your bare hands and get fit at the same time.

 

 

Each fight guides you through an effective workout tailored to your fitness goals. Just slip on the lightweight Gauntlet wearable and start in under a minute. You’ll feel every punch like it’s real, thanks to haptic technology, customisable resistance, and high-performance motion tracking.

 

 

In the game, you’ll fight a huge range of challenging foes, with every fight designed to guide you through a fun, rigorous workout tailored to your goals and current skill level. No combat experience required.

 

 

After each fight, you’ll be able to see how you’re improving through clear metrics such as calories burned, punch speed, strength, and accuracy. You can also track your progress long term through benchmarking and tailored recommendations.

 

We believe that fitness games should be serious about fitness. Each session with Quell burns more calories than running, cycling, or a spin class.

 

 

We’re committed to delivering effective full-body exercise and have created a number of lower body, core, and cardio exercises alongside the core combat experience to give you a totally balanced workout.

 

As passionate gamers, we know that the game is just as important as the exercise. This is a real game—not a boxing simulator.

 

 

In Quell, you’ll discover a huge variety of environments and a rich, fully-fledged story. Our team of artists and developers are building a brand new world bursting with exciting characters and experiences. We know that variety is key to keeping exercise exciting—discover dozens of enemies with a massive range of combat styles.

 

 

No two fights are exactly alike—you’ll have to think, improve and adapt to succeed. Punch, block, dodge, and cast spells to train your body and survive the challenges ahead. As you and your character grow stronger, you’ll take on tougher challenges to earn exciting new moves and equipment.

 

 

Exercise is about commitment over time, and the game needs to support that with endless replayability. Quell will keep things fresh through regular quests and events, procedurally generated enemies, and a massive range of exciting rewards. We plan to support and improve the game for many years, with new content in response to player feedback.

The Gauntlet wearable is the secret to Quell’s immersiveness and exercise impact, and was designed in consultation with professional boxers, physiotherapists, and athletes. Our Gauntlet is also super lightweight, making it portable and travel-friendly.

 

Extreme sports-grade resistance can be set to a difficulty level that suits you. The Gauntlet removes all the hassle of a punchbag and is much more satisfying and effective than shadowboxing.

 

Resistance massively boosts the efficiency of your workout and helps you build muscular power and endurance. As you get stronger, simply upgrade your bands to keep the difficulty right for you.

 

You asked, and we delivered—haptics are coming to Quell! We’ve partnered with the experts at Nanoport Technology, and have been developing Quell to feature their revolutionary TacHammer™ haptics. 

 

Forget game controllers, smartphones, and the rest—the TacHammer™ units deliver up to 25G of impact with a latency of less than 1ms. This kicks in as you land each move, letting you feel the satisfying, physical feedback and resistance of a real punch. Their unique design allows for subtle effects such as clicks, pulses, and more. Real punches, anywhere. This is feedback on a new level.

 

High-precision motion sensors track your attacks, blocks, dodges, and spells in real-time. This data is sent wirelessly to your device with ultra-low latency, keeping you fully immersed in the action. Our high-accuracy motion capture means that you don’t need to set up any cameras or other equipment.

 

We are fully committed to making Quell accessible to as many people as possible. Our designers have been working on a design that can fit a range of body types, ensuring Quell can be played by all shapes and sizes. It doesn’t matter where you are in your fitness journey—Quell is here to make everyone’s ride worthwhile.

 

 

Our users have told us time and time again that even seemingly small obstacles are killers when it comes to maintaining a solid workout routine. That’s why we designed Quell to remove all the barriers of normal exercise, so you can get a complete workout at home without worrying about bad weather, travel time, sharing equipment, and planning your workout.

 

Exercise is more fun with friends. Team up to take down the hardest enemies, or compete to be the best on the leaderboard. We’re developing online multiplayer as well as local multiplayer—bring it to a friend's house to play side-by-side.

We’re launching Quell on PC, to begin with. Connect to your TV for the big screen experience! We are also working on importing the game to iOS, Mac, and Android devices as a priority post-launch.

Everyone who buys Quell gets the base game, for free, for life. This gives you the full single-player experience, including a horde of enemies, tailored workouts, and detailed performance tracking.

 

Quell+ is a subscription service that takes this to the next level. Quell+ users get access to all the new content—new workouts, quests, and enemies. They can also access additional fitness metrics and can save multiple profiles. All social and multiplayer features will be available to subscribers, including competitions, leaderboards, and community events.

 

All IndieGoGo backers will receive trial access to Quell+ free of charge as a special thanks for supporting Quell at such an early stage—every one of you is helping us bring the game to life! Quell+ will feature a small subscription fee to support the online platform and ongoing content releases for people buying Quell post-launch.

We built Quell because we believe exercise shouldn’t have to feel like work. We wanted to maximise fun, remove all the obstacles and help people build the exercise habits they want. We’re confident we can make Quell the best immersive fitness game in the world.

 

Our team comprises world-class game developers, engineers, martial artists, product designers, exercise physiologists, and business strategists—putting us in the perfect position to produce a unique game such as Quell.

 

Find out more about the Quell team on our website.

A special thanks to all the organisations that have helped us get to where we are today!

 

 

Play together: Gift your friends an exclusive discount on Quell

Want to invite your friends to join you in the launch drop? Create and share your unique referral code with them, and they’ll receive 10% off their Quell pre-order, exclusively through you.

Better still, for every friend that pre-orders, you’ll unlock an extra month of Quell+ on your account

Drop 002 will be shipped to:  US,  EU, UK, Canada, Australia, Singapore, China, Hong Kong, Japan, New Zealand, Norway, Israel

Note: all shipping fees will be collected separately once the campaign is over. Please see below for estimates:

Shipping estimates for One Full Quell System:  United States: $10 | United Kingdom: $15 | EU: $18 | Hong Kong / Singapore: $20 | Rest of the World: $25

Each Perk add-on: +$3/Add-On (US & Rest of the World)

*VAT/Customs duty will be pre-charged for customers in EU countries. In all other countries, the responsibility is at the time of delivery for the backer.

For EU backers only: We will be charging VAT duties in BackerKit once the campaign is over. Please see below for duties costs depending on your country.

VAT by country: Austria, Bulgaria, Estonia, France, Slovakia, United Kingdom: 20% | Belgium, Czech Republic, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Spain: 21% | Croatia, Denmark, Sweden: 25% | Cyprus, Germany, Romania: 19% | Finland, Greece: 24% | Ireland, Poland, Portugal: 23% | Italy, Slovenia: 22% | Hungary: 27% | Luxembourg: 17% | Malta: 18%

story:
About

Remember the first home computers from 70s and 80s.

This is your chance to experience these amazing machines again!

Would you like to collect all the iconic Retro Computers and learn how to use them?
or
Would you simply like to play games or practice old-school coding?

Breadbox is the first retro computer simulator to bring fully working vintage computers to your desktop.

Yes, it can simulate multiple real life retro computers in a highly realistic and accurate way. It literally brings a new dimension compared to emulators. And, because it is all software, you don’t have all the problems related to real hardware either, it will not take space, nor will it contain components that may break.

Do not let the term simulator to distract you. This is, as real as it can, as you will see. Breadbox brings so much more to the table. Or should we say... to your desktop.

It really can bring Retro Computers to the masses!

 

 

In Depth

Breadbox is created with latest Game Technology.

It contains a growing collection of fully functional – RUNNABLE – Retro Computers.

All computers and devices are interactable, beautifully rendered 3D models with realistic look, smooth animations, and authentic sounds.

Breadbox is designed to be user-friendly and easy to setup.
Included tutorials will give everybody a good start into retro computing.

Of course, you need to learn how the retro computers itself work. That is where all the fun begins and that is one of the many reasons why you would want this.

Breadbox is not really a game; it is a simulator which allows you to use retro computers as if they were real.

Different kinds of software, including games, but also PDF copies of manuals can be easily added and used with it. Breadbox will recognize supported file formats of your digital copies and they will be available for you in the simulation.

Emulation plays a big part of Breadbox. You can of course, use Breadbox without emulators, and it will then behave like a hardware only simulator, which you cannot power on.

But, emulator is the engine, which enables the system to behave and run like the original computer. In Breadbox, a high-quality emulators are seamlessly integrated to give the best possible, authentic-like experience. But in general Breadbox emulation is as good as the emulator in use. For example, with current systems, we are using a special version of VICE, which is an excellent emulator for Commodore 8-bit computers.

First release of Breadbox will contain three iconic computers:
Commodore PET-2001, VIC-20 and Commodore 64, all with essential peripheral devices.

But that is only the beginning, in time Breadbox will grow. New models will be added, one by one. Without extra charge!

 

Vision

Just Imagine it, the possibility to have ALL vintage computers, on your PC.

What model would you like to try out tomorrow?
Apple IIe, Atari 400, TI-99/4A, ZX Spectrum, SVI-728 or BBC Micro, just to mention few.

Vision of The Breadbox is not only to include the most famous home computers, but literally all of them. And if the vision comes true, why should we stop at home computers!

We hope to bring Breadbox also to macOS and Linux.

Virtual Reality, of course!

And lots of other great ideas.

Eventually we would like to say: Breadbox IS preserving Computer History.

 

Note, that these features are long-term plans for Breadbox and will not be delivered in the first release.

 

Goal

The goal of this pre-order campaign is to boost the development of Breadbox and finalize the first release into a high-quality product.

First release, priced at 59,99€, will be available in Steam and/or some other digital distribution service.

Estimated release date is October/November 2021.

The content we plan to deliver in the first release:

  • Three retro computers: Commodore PET 2001, VIC-20 and Commodore 64.
  • Essential peripherals and accessories like, monitor, disk drive, tape recorder, cassette, diskette, cartridge*, joystick* and manual**.
  • Interactivity for the key events like, power switch, keyboard presses, tape and diskette handling, joystick connections, cassette recorder and disk drive functions.
  • Interactions will contain animations and audio. Sound effects are recorded using authentic hardware.
  • Upgrades to current graphics and animations. We are happy how the product looks already, but we aim for visually more impressive look!
  • Out-of-the-box keyboard mappings, to at least US and UK keyboards.
  • Easy keyboard mapping customization, for all keyboard layouts.
  • Easy to follow tutorial mode and/or tutorial videos to show you how Breadbox works and how to start with the retro computers.
  • VICE-emulator integration and easy installation.
  • Download and install Breadbox from Steam and/or other digital distribution service.

 

* Some options do not apply to every model, so expect minor differences between models, for example PET 2001 does not support cartridges, so you will not see cartridge on Breadbox PET either.
** Some objects are only available when you have relevant digital content, for example manual will not be available without a digital copy in PDF format.

 

What You Get

Your contribution is extremely valuable for this project!

So, we have prepared two simple perks for you to choose.

Both will give you The Breadbox at a discounted price and access to digital download before public launch.

  • Buyer perk gives you Breadbox for a total price of 29 €.
  • Enthusiast perk gives you Breadbox for a total price of 49 €. And you will get your name in Breadbox credits.

 

This is a Fixed Goal campaign. What does it mean to you is that if the campaign goal is not met, you will receive full refund. And if campaign succeeds, this project will have a realistic chance to deliver all planned goals.

Even if you are unable to pre-order Breadbox you can help us by sharing this campaign with your friends and family, or on your social media.

 

System Requirements

Breadbox works with desktop PC or capable Laptop with graphics card and Windows 10 Operating System.

At this point, where the product is not ready and it has not been tested on many setups, it is too early to say exact minimum system requirements. But it will work both on Intel and AMD CPUs, GeForce and Radeon graphics cards. Breadbox has been demonstrated on a laptop (Intel i7-8550U @ 1.8GHz, 32 GB RAM and NVIDIA MTX150) and it performed well.

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 @ 2.8 GHz or equivalent AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 3GB / AMD RX 470 4GB or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

 

Minimum requirements will be somewhat lower than current recommended requirements.

 

"Team"

Breadbox is currently a one-man show, with tons of expertise though.


Plan is to get more resources and specialists involved. The lack of adequate resources is slowing the project down. This is currently the only real impediment for this project and the main reason for launching this crowdfunding campaign.


The founding father of the project Breadbox is Sami Siltaloppi. Currently working full time as a Senior Consultant and Software Developer in a large international Company. Sami is also a part-time entrepreneur as a founder of Bitfall, the company responsible of the Breadbox. And more than willing to put all his effort to this project.


“I started coding from the day one, when I got my first computer, the famous Commodore 64. Followed by Commodore 128 and Amiga. When Doom was released it was love at first sight and I moved to IBM compatibles. The choice of machines and programming languages have changed over the years, but I never really stopped coding.


In IT, I started as support specialist, then moved to software testing and later to software development. In my career I have experienced lots of different projects and the good and sometimes the ugly sides of big companies like Compaq, IBM, Nokia, just to mention few. Last years I have been developing business applications using open-source Java frameworks and modern JavaScript frameworks.


About 7 – 8 years ago I recalled that it was game development – in 80s and 90s - that inspired me to work on software. And then I started game development again, this time with modern technologies.


While still having strong enthusiasm towards retro computers, I realized there was something quite important missing in between the real retro hardware and software emulation: a simulator.


That is, the birth of Breadbox, in a nutshell.


My dream is to preserve the Vintage Computers into simulator, which will give anyone a possibility to learn and experience how they were used.” -Sami

 

Third-party Licenses

Breadbox can be integrated to selection of emulators to give you full experience with our Retro Computers.

First release of Breadbox contains three systems, and they are all emulated using a special version of VICE*.

We value and respect the amazing work and effort of others. It is our best intention and responsibility to follow the license agreements and obligations of the third-party software.

* VICE is free software. Redistributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License.
 

Risks & Challenges

Every project has risks, that’s for sure.

But let’s remember, this is a software project. It will not have same challenges compared to manufacturing and supplying hardware products.

There are different opinions for biggest risks in software projects. But in general, the commonly acknowledged top risks are poor project planning, inaccurate work estimates, budget changes, and technical challenges.


Project and work estimations

We realize the importance of project planning and work estimations. And all that needs to be re-evaluated if this campaign is successful. The project and estimations depend on the budget. Current plans were calculated using minimum goal of this campaign. But as you realize, the actual budget will be available only after the campaign is over. Project planning and work estimations are not new to us and as this project is already on going, we have a pretty good view on the specifics related to this project.
Even with careful planning, there is a possibility that not all deliverables are ready on time. But good thing about software is that it is so dynamic, some less important features can be left out, to be delivered later.

Budget and resources

Resources are commonly tied to budget. Budget changes are an obvious risk for a project, especially when its running low. Breadbox is going on with a low budget already, but with dynamic team structure it isn’t really a problem.
This crowdfunding campaign was created to raise the budget and get more resources. Yet keeping the project team as dynamic as possible.

Technical challenges

We wanted to start this campaign only after we are content with our technical quality. This whole project would not have been started in a first place, if we had not solved the first and biggest technical challenge. Then we have slowly been improving the solution and tackled some other essential issues. Breadbox already runs great and there are no significant issues we know of.
Software development is a problem-solving craft by nature, and it would be incompetent to say that there are no more challenges ahead. But currently we do not see any major obstacles in our way.

 

Follow

You can follow the progress on many channels, including this campaign page.

YouTube

Facebook

Twitter

Bitfall

story:
Type DELTA is the world's first custom-made gaming mouse to be released internationally.

The most outstanding feature of the Type DELTA is its shape customization and a wide selection of customizable parts.

Our custom-made mouse is not just a combination of pre-made modules or a change in size, but a completely new mouse created from zero through communication between player and designer. This is the kind of mouse that will give players confidence and conviction in the device, allowing them to truly demonstrate their performance.

  • Shapes and sizes of custom-made mouse
  • Customization of switches, wheels, sole, lift-off distance, etc.
  • Choice of color and surface feel
  • Paid, permanent support
  • Left-handed people and special shape requests can be accommodated

A mouse that perfectly conforms to the shape of your hand and allows you to play more consistently and aim more delicately.





 

  • The ideal mouse shape for people varies depending on the size of their hands and the way they hold the mouse.
  • Even if you feel that your current mouse is the best for your hand, you will naturally find something to complain about with a ready-made, one-size-fits-all mouse.

We want to provide you with the satisfaction by using a mouse that truly fits the shape of your hand, and the confidence to play with it.


 





 


 

One round trip of the mockup to finalize the shape.

When you share your thought of your ideal mouse, please let us know what improvements you would like to make based on your current mouse so that we can visualize them more concretely.

  • For example, make the right side of the mouse look like EC and the left side look like GPRO, shorten the overall length of FK, lower the butt of G704, etc.

We will create a mock-up of your ideal mouse shape using modeling materials based on the image you provided.

Once the mockup is completed, we will send you 2D images and 3D model data to compare with your current mouse.

After receiving the shipped mockup, you can adjust it yourself, hold it in your hand, and when you are finally satisfied with the shape, send the mockup back to us!

※Shipping costs will be covered by us, so there will no differences between countries or regions. There is no difference in product quality or ordering process between regions.

※We will take thorough measures against coronavirus infection.
We will adopt the same hygiene management system applied in restaurants.
Specifically, it is as follows

  • Wear a mask when working.
  • When working we will wash our hands thoroughly with soap and disinfect our hands with alcohol.
  • Before using equipment to cut mock-ups, clean the equipment and soak it in sanitizer for several hours.

Abundant customization elements

Surface coating

  • There are two types of surfaces, glossy and matte, and two basic colors, white and black, for a total of four choices.

Mouse wheel

  • Wheel:

Due to the difference in the bearings attached to the wheel encoders, the sensation of wheel rotation will be different. You can choose the option to make the wheel rotation smoother or harder according to your preference.

  • Wheel ring:

We have prepared three different textures for the mouse wheel ring so that each user can choose the most suitable one for their hand. You can choose silicone/rubber/plastic wheel material.

Switch

  • Click feeling:

OMRON, HUANO, GM, ZIPPY, and C&K switches with different click sensations are available, allowing you to customize, for example, the left click of the main button to OMRON and the right click to GM. The feel of the click depends not only on the microswitch, but also on the position of the finger and its relationship to the switch. The combination of the shell design and the switch provides a click feel that suits various styles.

  • Swappable switches:

In addition to the pre-installed switches, users can also use their own switches to try out the new click feeling. 

Wired/Wireless

  • In the authenticated area, wireless can be selected. Wired uses a very soft paracord, which also gives the advantage of being lighter than wireless. At least, the crowdfunded wireless mouse will be available in Japan, USA, EU, EFTA, and Turkey.

Sensor

  • Adjustable Lift Off Distance:

If the lift off distance is too high, it will be annoying when you lift the mouse and turn it around, and if it is too low, it will not be stable depending on the softness of the mouse pad. It can be adjusted in 0.1mm increments to get that balance. Also, we will define the standard distance for LOD. Please use the standard distance if you do not have special requirements or if the above is difficult.

  • Adjustable sensor position:

When the sensor is placed on the fingertip side, it can transmit delicate lateral movements at the fingertips to the PC more directly. Placing it on the wrist side also dampens mouse movement and provides the same stability benefits as lower sensitivity. The position of the sensor can be adjusted Front/Mid/Rear as long as the dimensions of the board allow.

Weight adjustment

  • If you are not concerned about the lightest weight, you can adjust the overall weight and center of gravity.

Mouse skates

  • The gliding feel of the mouse is affected by the mouse skate shape and material. There are three types of shapes: all-over type, two-piece type, and four-piece type, and two types of materials: PTFE and UHPE. Mouse skates can be a combination of two-piece and four-piece types. For example, the fingertip side can be two-piece, and the wrist side can be four-piece, and so on.

 

※If, after using the product, you still want to change to a different customization, we have a support system in place that will help you do so for a fee. For example, if you want to change the sensor from front to mid, or if you want to increase the LOD by 1mm, we can try to meet your various needs.

※Nitro Factory-Devices will set the standard options for you, so if you are not specific about a particular part, you can select it.

Using the position of switches and sensors, and the center of gravity as examples.
OMRON switches are the standard option (as they are commonly used in many gaming mice).
For the sensor position, Mid is the standard option.
The center of gravity is evenly distributed as a standard option.


If you have any questions or concerns about the differences between the parts, please feel free to contact us via email or Twitter.






 

  • We will inform you of our development progress at least once every two weeks.

We will send you information on the progress of the construction of the website, updates, component verification to maximize product quality, and testing by testers.

  • For things that can be worked on in advance, such as communication for creating specifications and mockups, we will do so before March 2022.
  • ​Delivery may be delayed due to supply stability of semiconductors and raw materials, or due to development reasons.


     

  • Can be adapted by left-handed users
  • DPI can be changed via the button on the bottom of the mouse
  • There are three options for the center of gravity: forward, even, and backward.
  • There are many options available, but if you are not familiar with them, we will provide you with a website where you can send and receive e-mails and explanations about the parts so that you can decide the specifications with ease.

 




Nitro Factory-devices is developing products with the top priority of realizing users' ideals and requests. If you have any problems or requests, even the most trivial ones, please feel free to let us know via Twitter or email. We will do our best to make it real.

 

RISKS

  • Specifications are subject to change depending on the supply stability of semiconductors and raw materials.

For example, it is possible that the high-end PixArt sensor equivalent to the PixArt PMW3370 will be used, depending on the circumstances of development and the stability of the supply of components.

  • If the number of orders received is too small, we may not be able to sell the product to the general public after the crowdfunding, but we will deliver all orders received through the crowdfunding.

 

ABOUT US


Nitro Factory-devices

A Japanese brand that develops exclusive gaming devices for eSports
The first global release of a fully custom-made mouse, "TypeDELTA"

Project Planner: nucki (Taisei Onuki)

Expertise: Precision mechanical design, product processing
I have been working on precision machine design and production technology development for about 2 years, and have released several products and managed their quality and distribution. My hobbies are gaming and making things using cutting, 3D printing and electronics.

 

Twitter
https://twitter.com/nucki_t

 

 

Type DELTAは国際的に世界で初めてリリースされるオーダーメイドゲーミングマウスです。

Type DELTAの最大の特徴は、形状カスタマイズと幅広いパーツカスタマイズです。

私たちのオーダーメイドマウスは、単にサイズを変更したり、予め用意されたモジュールを組み合わせるのではなく、1人のプレイヤーと1人のデザイナーとのコミュニケーションによって0から生み出される全く新しいマウスです。
このようなマウスこそが、プレーヤーにデバイスに対する自信と納得感をもたらし、真のパフォーマンスを発揮させるでしょう。

  • マウスの形状やサイズのカスタマイズ
  • スイッチやホイール,ソール,リフトオブディスタンス,等々​
  • 色や表面塗装の選択
  • 有償の永久保証
  • 左利きの人や特別な形状の要望にも対応

自分の手の形にぴったり合ったマウスは、より安定したプレイと繊細なエイムを可能にします。





 

  • 手の大きさやマウスの持ち方によって、その人にとって理想的なマウスの形は変わってきます。
  • 今使っているマウスが自分の手に最もフィットしていると感じていても、既製品の1サイズのマウスでは当然ながら不満に感じる点は出てくるのではないでしょうか。

私たちは、プレイヤーが自分の手の形に真に合ったマウスを使うことで、満足感や自信を持ってゲームをプレイできるようにしたいと思っています。










モックアップを1往復して形状を確定

理想のマウスのイメージをお伝えいただく際に、現在お使いのマウスをベースにどのような改良を加えたいのかをお伝えいただくと、より具体的にイメージすることができます。

  • 例えば、マウスの右側をEC、左側をGPROのようにする、FKの全長を短くする、G704のお尻を低くする、などです。

お客様からいただいたイメージと、5つの角度からの手とマウスの写真をもとに、モデリング素材を使って要望に沿った理想的なマウスの形状のモックアップを作成します。

モックアップ完成後、2D画像と3Dモデルデータをお送りしますので、現在お使いのマウスと比較してみてください。

出荷されたモックアップを受け取った後、ご自身で調整したり、手に持ったりして、最終的に満足のいく形になったら、モックアップを返送してください。

※送料は当社が負担しますので、国や地域による違いはありません。また、商品の品質や注文方法についても、地域による違いはありません。

※コロナウイルスの感染対策を徹底いたします。
飲食店で採用されている衛生管理システムと同じ仕組みを取り入れます。
具体的には

  • 作業時にマスクを着用する。
  • 作業時には石鹸で十分に手を洗い、アルコールで手を消毒する。
  • モックアップを切削する器具を使用する前には、器具を洗浄し、除菌剤に数時間浸す。


豊富なパーツカスタマイズ

表面塗装

  • 表面塗装は光沢とマットの2種類、基本色はホワイトとブラックの2種類で、合計4種類の選択肢があります。

マウスホイール

  • ホイール:

ホイールエンコーダーに取り付けられているベアリングの違いにより、ホイールの回転感覚が異なります。 お好みに応じて、ホイールの回転を滑らかにしたり、硬くしたりするオプションをお選びいただけます。

  • ホイールリング:

マウスホイールリングの質感を3種類用意し、それぞれのユーザーが自分の手に最適なものを選べるようにしました。 ホイールの素材は、シリコン/ゴム/プラスチックからお選びいただけます。またホイールリングの表面模様は4種類用意し、フラット/つぶつぶ/細かいボーダー/太いボーダーから選ぶことができます。

​​スイッチ

  • クリック感:

クリック感の異なるOMRON、HUANO、GM、ZIPPY、C&Kのスイッチが用意されており、例えばメインボタンの左クリックをOMRONに、右クリックをGMにというようなカスタマイズが可能です。また、クリック感はマイクロスイッチだけでなく、指の位置やスイッチとの関係によっても異なります。シェルのデザインとスイッチの組み合わせにより、さまざまなスタイルに合ったクリック感を実現しています。

  • 交換可能なスイッチ:

プリインストールされたスイッチに加えて、ユーザーが手持ちのスイッチを使って、新しいクリック感を試すこともできます。

有線/無線

認証されたエリアでは、ワイヤレスが選択できます。有線は非常に柔らかいパラコードを使用しているため、無線よりも軽いというメリットもあります。 クラウドファンディングで調達したワイヤレスマウスは、少なくとも日本、アメリカ、EU、EFTA、トルコで販売される予定です。

センサー

  • リフトオフディスタンスの調整が可能:

リフトオフディスタンスが高すぎると、マウスを持ち上げて振り向くときに煩わしく、低すぎるとマウスパッドの柔らかさによっては安定しないことがあります。そのバランスをとるために0.1mm単位で調整できるようになっています。また、LODの標準推奨距離をNitro Factory-devicesが定めます。特別な要望がない場合や、上記が難しい場合は、標準的な距離をご利用ください。

  • センサー位置の調整:

センサーを指先側に配置すると、指先の微妙な横方向の動きをよりダイレクトにPCに伝えることができます。また、手首側に配置すると、マウスの動きを減衰させ、感度を下げた場合と同様の安定感を得ることができます。センサーの位置は、基板の寸法が許す限り、Front/Mid/Rearに調整可能です。

重量調整

  • 最軽量にこだわらなければ、重量や重心位置を調整することができます。

マウスソール

  • マウスの滑走感は、マウススケートの形状と素材に影響されます。形状には「全面ソール」「ツーピースタイプ」「フォーピースタイプ」の3種類があり、素材には2種類あります。 PTFE」と「UHPE」です。マウススケートは、ツーピースタイプとフォーピースタイプの組み合わせが可能です。例えば、指先側はツーピース、手首側はフォーピースといった具合です。

 

※製品の使用後にやっぱり別のカスタムに変更したいという場合は、有償で変更できるサポート体制を整えています。 例えば、センサーをフロントからミッドに変更したい、LODを1mm上げたいなど、様々なご要望にお応えできるようにしています。

※カスタマイズ出来るところが多すぎて何を選べばいいかわからない、と感じる方もおられると思います。Nitro Factory-devicesが標準オプションを定めますので、特定のパーツに特にこだわりがないという方はそちらをご利用ください。

例えば、スイッチやセンサーの位置,重心位置を例に挙げますと、
スイッチはOMRON製が標準オプション(多くのゲーミングマウスで一般的に採用されているため）
センサーの位置はMidが標準オプション
重心位置は均等配置が標準オプション

という風に、こちらが標準オプションを用意いたしますので、ご安心ください。
また、パーツの違いなどに関する質問や悩んでいることがございましたらメールやTwitterを通じて、丁寧にご回答いたします。






プロトタイプ作成段階で、クレイモデリングから3Dスキャナー,3Dプリンタを使い、シェルを形成しました。クレイモデルを使用して形状を決めるという、全く新しいプロセスが有効な手段であるという確証がありあす。

  • 開発の進捗状況を２週間に最低1回以上お知らせいたします

ホームページの構築やアップデート、製品クオリティを最大限高めるための部品検証,
テスターによるテストなどの進捗情報をお届けいたします。

  • ​仕様書を作るためのやり取りや、モックアップ作成のやり取りなど、前もって取り組むことができるものに関しては、2022年3月より前に行っていきます。
  • 半導体や原材料の供給安定性または開発の都合により納期が遅れる可能性がございます
     

  • 左利きにも対応できます
  • DPIはマウス底面のボタンから変更
  • 重心の位置は 前側/均等/後側 という3段階のオプションがあります
  • 多数のオプションを用意していますが、よくわからないという方でも安心して仕様を決定できるように、メールのやり取りや、パーツに関する説明などを記載したサイトを用意しますので、ご安心ください

  • ユーザーの理想や要望を実現するということを最優先に、Nitro Factory-devicesは製品開発をしています。ほんの些細なことでも良いので悩んでいることや、要望がもしあれば、気兼ねなくTwitterやメールにてお知らせください。可能な限り実現に向けて取り組んでいきます。
     

 

RISKS

  • 半導体や原材料の供給安定性により仕様を変更する可能性があります。
    例えば、開発上の都合や部品の供給安定性によってはPixArt PMW3370と同等のハイエンドpixartセンサーを搭載するといった可能性があります。
  • 受注数が少なすぎた場合はクラウドファンディング以降の一般販売を行わない場合がありますが、クラウドファンディングでの受注分については全て納品させていただきます。

 

 

ABOUT US


Nitro Factory-devices

eSports専用ゲーミングデバイスを開発している日本のブランド
グローバルでは初のフルカスタムオーダーメイドマウス"TypeDELTA"をリリース

プロジェクト企画者   nucki（Taisei Onuki）

専門: 精密機械設計,製品加工
精密機械設計と生産技術開発を2年程度行い、いくつかの製品をリリースして品質や流通を管理。趣味はゲームと切削加工や3Dプリント、電子工作を駆使したものづくり。

Twitter
https://twitter.com/nucki_t
story_txt:
Type DELTA is the world's first custom-made gaming mouse to be released internationally.The most outstanding feature of the Type DELTA is its shape customization and a wide selection of customizable parts.Our custom-made mouse is not just a combination of pre-made modules or a change in size, but a completely new mouse created from zero through communication between player and designer. This is the kind of mouse that will give players confidence and conviction in the device, allowing them to truly demonstrate their performance.
Shapes and sizes of custom-made mouse
Customization of switches, wheels, sole, lift-off distance, etc.
Choice of color and surface feel
Paid, permanent support
Left-handed people and special shape requests can be accommodated
A mouse that perfectly conforms to the shape of your hand and allows you to play more consistently and aim more delicately. 
The ideal mouse shape for people varies depending on the size of their hands and the way they hold the mouse.
Even if you feel that your current mouse is the best for your hand, you will naturally find something to complain about with a ready-made, one-size-fits-all mouse.
We want to provide you with the satisfaction by using a mouse that truly fits the shape of your hand, and the confidence to play with it.   One round trip of the mockup to finalize the shape.When you share your thought of your ideal mouse, please let us know what improvements you would like to make based on your current mouse so that we can visualize them more concretely.For example, make the right side of the mouse look like EC and the left side look like GPRO, shorten the overall length of FK, lower the butt of G704, etc.We will create a mock-up of your ideal mouse shape using modeling materials based on the image you provided.Once the mockup is completed, we will send you 2D images and 3D model data to compare with your current mouse.After receiving the shipped mockup, you can adjust it yourself, hold it in your hand, and when you are finally satisfied with the shape, send the mockup back to us!※Shipping costs will be covered by us, so there will no differences between countries or regions. There is no difference in product quality or ordering process between regions.※We will take thorough measures against coronavirus infection.We will adopt the same hygiene management system applied in restaurants.Specifically, it is as follows
Wear a mask when working.
When working we will wash our hands thoroughly with soap and disinfect our hands with alcohol.
Before using equipment to cut mock-ups, clean the equipment and soak it in sanitizer for several hours.
Abundant customization elementsSurface coatingThere are two types of surfaces, glossy and matte, and two basic colors, white and black, for a total of four choices.Mouse wheelWheel:Due to the difference in the bearings attached to the wheel encoders, the sensation of wheel rotation will be different. You can choose the option to make the wheel rotation smoother or harder according to your preference.Wheel ring:We have prepared three different textures for the mouse wheel ring so that each user can choose the most suitable one for their hand. You can choose silicone/rubber/plastic wheel material.SwitchClick feeling:OMRON, HUANO, GM, ZIPPY, and C&K switches with different click sensations are available, allowing you to customize, for example, the left click of the main button to OMRON and the right click to GM. The feel of the click depends not only on the microswitch, but also on the position of the finger and its relationship to the switch. The combination of the shell design and the switch provides a click feel that suits various styles.Swappable switches:In addition to the pre-installed switches, users can also use their own switches to try out the new click feeling. Wired/WirelessIn the authenticated area, wireless can be selected. Wired uses a very soft paracord, which also gives the advantage of being lighter than wireless. At least, the crowdfunded wireless mouse will be available in Japan, USA, EU, EFTA, and Turkey.SensorAdjustable Lift Off Distance:If the lift off distance is too high, it will be annoying when you lift the mouse and turn it around, and if it is too low, it will not be stable depending on the softness of the mouse pad. It can be adjusted in 0.1mm increments to get that balance. Also, we will define the standard distance for LOD. Please use the standard distance if you do not have special requirements or if the above is difficult.Adjustable sensor position:When the sensor is placed on the fingertip side, it can transmit delicate lateral movements at the fingertips to the PC more directly. Placing it on the wrist side also dampens mouse movement and provides the same stability benefits as lower sensitivity. The position of the sensor can be adjusted Front/Mid/Rear as long as the dimensions of the board allow.Weight adjustmentIf you are not concerned about the lightest weight, you can adjust the overall weight and center of gravity.Mouse skatesThe gliding feel of the mouse is affected by the mouse skate shape and material. There are three types of shapes: all-over type, two-piece type, and four-piece type, and two types of materials: PTFE and UHPE. Mouse skates can be a combination of two-piece and four-piece types. For example, the fingertip side can be two-piece, and the wrist side can be four-piece, and so on. ※If, after using the product, you still want to change to a different customization, we have a support system in place that will help you do so for a fee. For example, if you want to change the sensor from front to mid, or if you want to increase the LOD by 1mm, we can try to meet your various needs.※Nitro Factory-Devices will set the standard options for you, so if you are not specific about a particular part, you can select it.Using the position of switches and sensors, and the center of gravity as examples.OMRON switches are the standard option (as they are commonly used in many gaming mice).For the sensor position, Mid is the standard option.The center of gravity is evenly distributed as a standard option.If you have any questions or concerns about the differences between the parts, please feel free to contact us via email or Twitter. We will inform you of our development progress at least once every two weeks.We will send you information on the progress of the construction of the website, updates, component verification to maximize product quality, and testing by testers.
For things that can be worked on in advance, such as communication for creating specifications and mockups, we will do so before March 2022.
​Delivery may be delayed due to supply stability of semiconductors and raw materials, or due to development reasons. 

Can be adapted by left-handed users
DPI can be changed via the button on the bottom of the mouse
There are three options for the center of gravity: forward, even, and backward.
There are many options available, but if you are not familiar with them, we will provide you with a website where you can send and receive e-mails and explanations about the parts so that you can decide the specifications with ease.
 Nitro Factory-devices is developing products with the top priority of realizing users' ideals and requests. If you have any problems or requests, even the most trivial ones, please feel free to let us know via Twitter or email. We will do our best to make it real. RISKSSpecifications are subject to change depending on the supply stability of semiconductors and raw materials.For example, it is possible that the high-end PixArt sensor equivalent to the PixArt PMW3370 will be used, depending on the circumstances of development and the stability of the supply of components.If the number of orders received is too small, we may not be able to sell the product to the general public after the crowdfunding, but we will deliver all orders received through the crowdfunding. ABOUT USNitro Factory-devicesA Japanese brand that develops exclusive gaming devices for eSportsThe first global release of a fully custom-made mouse, "TypeDELTA"Project Planner: nucki (Taisei Onuki)Expertise: Precision mechanical design, product processingI have been working on precision machine design and production technology development for about 2 years, and have released several products and managed their quality and distribution. My hobbies are gaming and making things using cutting, 3D printing and electronics. Twitterhttps://twitter.com/nucki_t  Type DELTAは国際的に世界で初めてリリースされるオーダーメイドゲーミングマウスです。Type DELTAの最大の特徴は、形状カスタマイズと幅広いパーツカスタマイズです。私たちのオーダーメイドマウスは、単にサイズを変更したり、予め用意されたモジュールを組み合わせるのではなく、1人のプレイヤーと1人のデザイナーとのコミュニケーションによって0から生み出される全く新しいマウスです。このようなマウスこそが、プレーヤーにデバイスに対する自信と納得感をもたらし、真のパフォーマンスを発揮させるでしょう。

スイッチやホイール,ソール,リフトオブディスタンス,等々​
色や表面塗装の選択

モックアップを切削する器具を使用する前には、器具を洗浄し、除菌剤に数時間浸す。

豊富なパーツカスタマイズ
表面塗装表面塗装は光沢とマットの2種類、基本色はホワイトとブラックの2種類で、合計4種類の選択肢があります。マウスホイールホイール:ホイールエンコーダーに取り付けられているベアリングの違いにより、ホイールの回転感覚が異なります。 お好みに応じて、ホイールの回転を滑らかにしたり、硬くしたりするオプションをお選びいただけます。ホイールリング:マウスホイールリングの質感を3種類用意し、それぞれのユーザーが自分の手に最適なものを選べるようにしました。 ホイールの素材は、シリコン/ゴム/プラスチックからお選びいただけます。またホイールリングの表面模様は4種類用意し、フラット/つぶつぶ/細かいボーダー/太いボーダーから選ぶことができます。​​スイッチクリック感:クリック感の異なるOMRON、HUANO、GM、ZIPPY、C&Kのスイッチが用意されており、例えばメインボタンの左クリックをOMRONに、右クリックをGMにというようなカスタマイズが可能です。また、クリック感はマイクロスイッチだけでなく、指の位置やスイッチとの関係によっても異なります。シェルのデザインとスイッチの組み合わせにより、さまざまなスタイルに合ったクリック感を実現しています。交換可能なスイッチ:プリインストールされたスイッチに加えて、ユーザーが手持ちのスイッチを使って、新しいクリック感を試すこともできます。有線/無線認証されたエリアでは、ワイヤレスが選択できます。有線は非常に柔らかいパラコードを使用しているため、無線よりも軽いというメリットもあります。 クラウドファンディングで調達したワイヤレスマウスは、少なくとも日本、アメリカ、EU、EFTA、トルコで販売される予定です。センサーリフトオフディスタンスの調整が可能:リフトオフディスタンスが高すぎると、マウスを持ち上げて振り向くときに煩わしく、低すぎるとマウスパッドの柔らかさによっては安定しないことがあります。そのバランスをとるために0.1mm単位で調整できるようになっています。また、LODの標準推奨距離をNitro Factory-devicesが定めます。特別な要望がない場合や、上記が難しい場合は、標準的な距離をご利用ください。センサー位置の調整:センサーを指先側に配置すると、指先の微妙な横方向の動きをよりダイレクトにPCに伝えることができます。また、手首側に配置すると、マウスの動きを減衰させ、感度を下げた場合と同様の安定感を得ることができます。センサーの位置は、基板の寸法が許す限り、Front/Mid/Rearに調整可能です。重量調整最軽量にこだわらなければ、重量や重心位置を調整することができます。マウスソールマウスの滑走感は、マウススケートの形状と素材に影響されます。形状には「全面ソール」「ツーピースタイプ」「フォーピースタイプ」の3種類があり、素材には2種類あります。 PTFE」と「UHPE」です。マウススケートは、ツーピースタイプとフォーピースタイプの組み合わせが可能です。例えば、指先側はツーピース、手首側はフォーピースといった具合です。 ※製品の使用後にやっぱり別のカスタムに変更したいという場合は、有償で変更できるサポート体制を整えています。 例えば、センサーをフロントからミッドに変更したい、LODを1mm上げたいなど、様々なご要望にお応えできるようにしています。※カスタマイズ出来るところが多すぎて何を選べばいいかわからない、と感じる方もおられると思います。Nitro Factory-devicesが標準オプションを定めますので、特定のパーツに特にこだわりがないという方はそちらをご利用ください。例えば、スイッチやセンサーの位置,重心位置を例に挙げますと、スイッチはOMRON製が標準オプション(多くのゲーミングマウスで一般的に採用されているため）センサーの位置はMidが標準オプション重心位置は均等配置が標準オプションという風に、こちらが標準オプションを用意いたしますので、ご安心ください。また、パーツの違いなどに関する質問や悩んでいることがございましたらメールやTwitterを通じて、丁寧にご回答いたします。プロトタイプ作成段階で、クレイモデリングから3Dスキャナー,3Dプリンタを使い、シェルを形成しました。クレイモデルを使用して形状を決めるという、全く新しいプロセスが有効な手段であるという確証がありあす。開発の進捗状況を２週間に最低1回以上お知らせいたしますホームページの構築やアップデート、製品クオリティを最大限高めるための部品検証,テスターによるテストなどの進捗情報をお届けいたします。
​仕様書を作るためのやり取りや、モックアップ作成のやり取りなど、前もって取り組むことができるものに関しては、2022年3月より前に行っていきます。
半導体や原材料の供給安定性または開発の都合により納期が遅れる可能性がございます 

左利きにも対応できます
DPIはマウス底面のボタンから変更
重心の位置は 前側/均等/後側 という3段階のオプションがあります
多数のオプションを用意していますが、よくわからないという方でも安心して仕様を決定できるように、メールのやり取りや、パーツに関する説明などを記載したサイトを用意しますので、ご安心ください

ユーザーの理想や要望を実現するということを最優先に、Nitro Factory-devicesは製品開発をしています。ほんの些細なことでも良いので悩んでいることや、要望がもしあれば、気兼ねなくTwitterやメールにてお知らせください。可能な限り実現に向けて取り組んでいきます。  RISKS
半導体や原材料の供給安定性により仕様を変更する可能性があります。例えば、開発上の都合や部品の供給安定性によってはPixArt PMW3370と同等のハイエンドpixartセンサーを搭載するといった可能性があります。
受注数が少なすぎた場合はクラウドファンディング以降の一般販売を行わない場合がありますが、クラウドファンディングでの受注分については全て納品させていただきます。
  ABOUT US
Nitro Factory-devices
eSports専用ゲーミングデバイスを開発している日本のブランドグローバルでは初のフルカスタムオーダーメイドマウス"TypeDELTA"をリリースプロジェクト企画者   nucki（Taisei Onuki）専門: 精密機械設計,製品加工精密機械設計と生産技術開発を2年程度行い、いくつかの製品をリリースして品質や流通を管理。趣味はゲームと切削加工や3Dプリント、電子工作を駆使したものづくり。Twitterhttps://twitter.com/nucki_t

story:
The Unbeatable Path is an immersive first-person horror adventure with an intricate and ruthless story in which you play as a young woman called Mia. To proceed with the story, which comprises of about 10 to 12 hours gameplay, you must solve challenging riddles and puzzles in a hellish environment. If this wasn't enough on its own, you must also make decisions that dramatically affect the gameplay and the game's ending. To make the whole game as realistic as possible we use 3D scanned assets, modern tools and state of the art techniques to achieve a photorealistic look. Together with a minimalistic user interface, you will totally immerse yourself into this harsh environment.

 

Mia is the mother of three children and is married to an abusive husband who takes delight in mistreating her.  Subjected to a series of abuse throughout her lifetime, she is finally driven to taking her own life. This is where the game begins.

Bit-by-bit, throughout the game, you will unveil the story of Mia to finally discover how she came to the point of committing suicide.

But be aware that you will only experience the full story when you uncover and explore the darkest places of hell.

 

Riddles and puzzles are another main feature of the game. In each level, you have to beat a unique riddle/puzzle to proceed to the next one. Ever played an escape room game? You will find similar elements but on a much wider scope and depth.

The riddles are very challenging in this game and the difficulty increases yet further when proceeding from level to level. Solving them will push you to your limits, but don’t give up hope, each riddle comes with clues on how to beat them. Just scrutinise your surroundings in detail.

 

Decisions play a fundamental role in The Unbeatable Path. Many of the actions you can do lead to either a good or a bad decision; it depends on how you solve them. Those decisions will influence the ending of the game dramatically so make sure to make the correct decision.

With each good and bad decision, your character (Mia) will build up karma in the game. Dependent on the karma you currently have, the game behaves differently in various situations. A hidden path will appear for example when you have good karma which leads you to different places you wouldn't usually see with bad karma. Holding good karma will be very difficult but should always be your goal because you will only survive your trip to hell with a good soul.

 

 

The graphic and style of the game itself has a very realistic look and we have high expectations when it comes to the quality and details of The Unbeatable Path.

To achieve this, we use 3D scanned assets, state-of-the-art techniques and software which is also used in the film industry to achieve a stunning look and breathtaking scenes throughout the game.

In addition, Unreal Engine 4 also provides a great set of tools to work with. This helps us as game developers to quickly iterate features and game mechanics to refine them and rapidly deliver the best result possible.

 

The gameplay mostly takes place in Mia's personal hell, the environment of which ranges from dark and dismal places to grim and gory depths. In this environment, you will be confronted with her nightmares which force you to revisit horrific actions experiences from her lifetime. It is up to you to make things better this time around: maybe you will find a path out of hell while doing so or maybe you are damned to stay there forever...

The puzzles and riddles will also be perfectly integrated in this setting to maintain the immersive gameplay.

We will also implement various horror elements to scare the hell out of you. An audio design that uses a specific frequency to trigger different emotions is just one tool. To top all these features off, we will also make sure that the good old jump scares aren't missing.

 

We are so hyped and excited about this project and we hope that you are looking forward playing this game as much as we do. That's where you come into play. We as an indie developer want to stay independent to develop the game for you and with you - that’s why we need your help to fund the project.

Without you, this project will never come to life. Thank you very much in advance!

 

To prove that it is worth investing in this project we have prepared a treat for you: right now you can already play a very early pre-alpha demo of the game.

 PLAY THE DEMO NOW!

 

Additional riddles & levels

To provide even more gameplay over the 10 to 12 hours that form the "base game", we are looking to deliver even more riddles and levels to provide additional content - 2 to 3 hours of additional gameplay.

Required Amount: 75000 €

 

Localization

The game will be released in English for both early access and final release. With this stretch goal, we will implement a full localization of all the textual content for the following languages: German, Russian, Spanish, French, Brazilian-Portuguese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Czech.

Required Amount: 85000 €

 

Motion capturing

To provide the best animations possible, we will use motion capturing to create our animations. It is a digital recording technique of objects or people to make the animations in-game look as realistic as possible.

Required Amount: 100000 €

 

Give me the demons

Throughout the story you will encounter various kinds of demons and characters which are already planned for the "base game". To have more variety and implement more badass characters and demons ready to be met in hell we have created this stretch goal for you. We will add at least 5 uniquely designed characters/demons and integrate them into the story.

Required Amount: 110000 €

 

Even more story variety

When it comes to decisions you make during the gameplay which affects the ending of the game dramatically, we have already provided quite some variety. To improve this even further and give even greater variety when it comes to the story itself and the different endings we want to achieve this stretch goal together with you to provide a different experience with each playthrough.

Required Amount: 130000 €

 

Like any other project, developing The Unbeatable Path comes also with different kinds of risks. With my experience in the past regarding game development and after planning this project properly, I can advise that we may face the following risks:

Financial risk

We have already invested a lot of time, effort, and money in the game to come up with a playable demo and all the assets which you see in this presentation. So what happens if the project is only getting partially funded? The answer is: we will do it anyway, just in a slightly different way. We are so highly motivated to do this project that the plan is to release the game in three different chapters in the event that the project should not be fully funded. Each chapter will have 3 hours of gameplay and we will release those chapters one after another so that we can continue working on the project with the money we earn from selling the game chapter by chapter.

Release date

Due to the complexity of the game and the whole game development process itself, it might transpire that we can't meet the set release date. Thorough project planning has already taken place but it can never remove the possibility of unexpected delays. Should this happen, we already have a plan to react to this. We already work a lot with freelancers, which allows us to easily scale the team up fast to reach different milestones. Of course, it can happen that we must still postpone the release but this will not be in terms of years. Should we need to postpone the game, our goal is to release within a time frame of 6 months after the initial release date.

Trust

When it comes to funding the project, trust from our community is a big factor. If we were to lose it, or should we be unable to build it, we won't get funded and the project will never come to life. To avoid this we are communicating always completely honest and transparent, that's why we have also prepared the demo for you to have a first look before investing money. We will also provide you guys with regular updates during the development process and even after release regarding the current state of the game and what we are working on. In that way, you will always know what is going on and what your money is being used for.
